It has 4” of adjustment left and right of center for a total of 8”. I had 24” studs. When you pull the latches down they spring back for safety but you can get them unhooked by pulling them alternately and pulling that side away then repeating so that you can swing the TV out to help plug cables without needing 3 arms. It feels secure hanging from the top only for that period while swinging it out the maximum that I could. I did use it on a 75” TV of 75lbs which is a larger screen than labeled for but the reviews influenced me and I am glad. We’ve come a long way when the mount is a trivial cost but where it counts this has the right features. The loops of the spring control will need to be hidden and I think the Velcro included is for that. More advice not related is to make sure your TV optical/coaxial signal is compatible with your soundbar

Two thumbs up to Mounting Dream for the way this TV mount came packaged!All mounting hardware came separated depending on your specific mounting need instead of of all being thrown together in a jumbled mess in one bag. Didn’t need to make a run to the hardware store for anything additional as all necessary hardware was furnished.
Wish it had a mounting hole in the middle that way I can put all six bolts on it.  With studs 16” apart it’s sort of an over sight.I hope the 4 bolts is strong enough.

Good, sturdy mounting system. Relatively easy to install but I would recommend using your own level as the one supplied wasn’t accurate. One part I wouldn’t recommend is the HDMI cable. The connections aren’t very good as they are loose and cause error code “ HDCP Unauthorized. Content Disabled” when using my Roku player. It’s classiias a loose HDMI connection so don’t use it especially if it’s in a confined space. A pain to reset when you haven’t the room to maneuver your hands.

This is the first TV wall mount system that I've installed where after I can pick up the TV off the wall and remove it, without pulling down on the bottom clamp cords. The bottom clamps don't lock into place and the tension keeping them engaged is not very strong. I did not feel comfortable after installing this. I've installed other wall mounted TVs where I wanted to take brute force to get the dang thing off the wall when the bottom clips wouldn't easily let go.

I was worried about installing this TV mount because I’ve never done one before. To my surprise the process was so simple. The TV mount bracket is very lightweight and easy for one person to do. I had my TV up in no time and it’s very easy to tilt the TV and lock it into place. I would definitely recommend this TV mount.

I don’t typically write reviews but as I was nervous about mounting my tv, I was especially nervous mounting it with one having such a low and affordable price tag. Well, I was wrong! This thing is incredible! My father is a sheet metal worker and as soon as he saw it, he said this mount is built incredibly well, which gave me more piece of mind. If you’re questioning it or don’t believe all these positive reviews—stop! Just add it to your cart now! Literally the only way your mount could fail is from user error—when we hung it, we literally pulled with our body weight before putting the tv on to feel how well it attached to the wood studs. Everything feels cleaner and more chic! I love this mount!

Sturdy material and very affordable.  I love the unlocking straps on the bottom hooks as well. Great feature seen on mounts these days that wasn’t common 10 years ago when I got my last mount.  I hung a new 55 inch TCL 4 series without issue. Took less then 10 minutes and the longest part is getting measurements right so it’s centered on wall. Came with plenty of different screws and spacers and had no issue finding ones that fit TV. Lag bolts appear to be high quality and I have no doubt that tv is secure and not going anywhere

This was half or almost a third of the price of the brand at the big box membership store where I bought my TV, a 55 inch Samsung UHD 8 Series. I had to fiddle with the right spacers and screws. It was way cheaper than paying someone. Would buy again! Most of the pain of installing it was my own ignorance, make sure you get it centered where you want to mount it. I had to add more structural support to my studs to mount is securely. This was due to my studs not being where I wanted them to be.

This works fine for holding a TV up. My biggest problem is that from time to time I need to adjust the things behind the TV (where I've stashed the AppleTV and antenna) and it is hard to get back there with this. There's not a lot of space between the TV and the wall, and it is hard to attach and detach the mounting by yourself.In hindsight I should have paid a little more for one with a swinging arm. That said, this is more my fault for not thinking my use case through.

Easy to install and it was easy to get the TV mounted on it. I did use 4 snap togglers that were rated for 200 lbs ( I went a little overboard) each to mount it to the wall. My new 43" LG 4K TV  weighs about 19 lbs. and is very thin and I am confident that it will we be on the wall till I take it down. Mounting dream does not recommend this and you should know what you anchors are rated for and the weight of your TV to make your decision. But I did not have the studs where I needed them to be.

It is one of the remaining mounts that holds up 130 lb.  I used it to hang my hitachi 50" plasma TV.  I had to extend the rack length by removing the eight screws in the middle and only replacing 4. Everything was mounted to studs so it worked fine.  When the TV is mounted there is almost no access to the back of the TV unless you have someone else that is strong making sure the TV does not come off the hanger rack.  Also you need 2 people to hang a heavy TV on the rack.

I installed it myself in less than 30 minutes. By far the hardest part of any wall mount is finding the studs behind the drywall. Other than that, this was an easy install. It seems to be quality materials and I have no doubts about its ability to hold my TV safely. It tilts downward just the right amount. No complaints. Good product does exactly as it says.

I have two TVs a 60" and a 32" wall mounted with this wall mount and have not had any issues so far. The mount is easy to install and taking the TV off and on the mount is fairly easy as long as your TV is not big. It even tilts a little.Just one gripe.. it's hard to get to your cords if you're trying to get to the back. You are going to have to take the tv off the mount to add any HDMI cables.

Some of the mounts were not machine threaded so when the installer tried to use the screws, they were stripped. Had to quick run out to the hardware store to get bolts, washers and nuts to actually be able to use this.

I installed this on a 60" Sony tv. The mounting holes were very low on the back of the Sony. There was very little vertical adjustment when installing the hanging bracket on the back of the TV without having them show below the bottom of the TV. The bracket was very easy to install and well made. The anchors that come with it are junk but the lag bolts are fine.

Very easy to install and mount. Love that it comes with a level and different sized washers and screws so you can have options that work with your tv. Would recommend for those looking for a no frills, easy to install wall mount.Inside you’ll get:
This is one of the best mounts I have used.  Keep in mind this is not a full motion mount.  It just tilts.Installation was simple and easy.

It’s a simple TV stand but if you look at the big square in the middle that’s where the two left and right ends connect. Ours was unlevel and we could not figure out why but it turned out to be that that was not tight so every time we would hang it up it would unlevel itself. So make sure that you tighten that up and check for level.

Very happy with this TV mount.  You need 2 people to install this mount, but it’s not too difficult.  The hardest part is finding the studs in the wall and installing the screws. Pro tip: use a socket wrench. The screws are too thick to use a drill or screw driver. This mount does NOT tilt left or right; only up and down. This bracket worked well with both my TCL TVs (49” and 65”).

This TV mount was so simple to install. The most difficult part for most people will be finding in the wall stubs but if you order a decent stub finder with this, it will make your life easier. Other you get to bracket on the wall and the two adjustments bolted to the back of the TV the final step is just sitting it in place. Took me only 5 mins after getting the bracket on the wall.

Easy to install and even easier to put up and take down your TV; thanks to the hanging straps on the retaining clips. I would have given 4 stars, but there is a design flaw. It's nothing major, but a little annoying. You can't tilt the TV all the way forward because the retaining clips won't lock in place due to them not being wide enough to fit over the wall bracket. Other than that it's very easy to use and I recommend for those that are not very knowledgeable or skilled with installing these types of things.

Have now used two mounts from this company and both are very good products. Good instructions, sturdy and easy to use.  I especially like the full range of motion on this one, even though I rarely choose to move it, the ability to do so makes attaching cables, etc very easy.  HIghly recommend.

More than I bargained for.  Comes with an impressive variety of fasteners and shim bushings for just about every type of TV mounting. The four lag screws are more than adequate for typical 2x4 wood stud applications. Other unexpected niceties are the included HDMI cable, 6" level, and velcro cable management straps.  Also props for the latching bottom rail which makes removing the tv a breeze.  A great value.

Mount has no center hole to attach to center stud on wall. Can not attach at left, center and Right sides. Did not realize this until it was to late to return.  I will have to rig something to make it work

I bought this to mount a 32” TV in my bedroom. The tilt is handy since it is mounted high on the wall. It was easy to install. I did have a problem with how close to the wall it is. My hdmi cord input on my TV was rubbing against the wall, but a right angle adapter for my hdmi cord solved that issue easily.

It doesn't move from left to right but I didn't need or want that. It tilts up or down and fits tight to the wall.This was very simple to install and easy to hang the tv on it. It does what it is supposed to at a great price. I would recommend this product and will probably be buying another one.

Honestly, this mount is great. High build quality, clear instructions, lots of hardware, etc. I’ve hung a ton of tvs and this mount is the best one for the money I’ve ever seen. I even had to cut it down with my angle grinder cause of how our fireplace is laid out and it was TOUGH metal compared to many.

Outstanding!  I ordered this CHEAP TV mount because I had no choice but to get a cheap one.  Well boy did I hit the lotto.  This is very well made, went up very easily, came with a variety of mounting hardware and a variety of hardware to attach to TVs.  On top of that, it came with a level and an HDMI cable.  Really?  At this price?  Yes!  I know I'm gushing, which I don't normally do in reviews, but I was very impressed with the product for the price.  A very rare (for me) five stars!

I was so excited to receive this wall mount for our tv. When it arrrived i opened it and found it was someone else’s reject!!! The product was partially assembled and the previous owners screw driver was in the box. Some of the nuts and bolts were in a zip lock baggie. My husband couldn’t believe it. And even worse part of the wall mount frame was dented up from the previous purchaser was dented. We really needed this wall mount and didn’t feel like returning this unit. My husband successfully got the wall mount up and it’s serving it’s purpose.Note to company: double check boxes before sending them out again. It’s not fun getting another persons reject.

This basically works as advertised. I personally had no issues. I appreciate that it comes with an hdmi cable and little magnetic level. The little pull cords on the bottom make it very easy to take the tv on and off the wall which is very nice. If you dont want to see them hanging down all you need to do is find some way to tuck them behind. All in all works great.

This took me all of 15 minutes to install. The tilt feature gives just the right amount of lean for my setup. The release cords are easy to hide and just as easy to operate to move the tv off the mount if need be. Already had plenty of HDMI Cables so though I did not need it, the included cable should be welcome to people buying a new tv.

Nice tv mount if low profile is what you're looking for. I mounted a 65" LG and it's a little tight behind the tv, in terms of plugging in hdmi cables, etc... but it's supposed to be. Love how the tv sits almost flush to the wall, doesn't stick out a foot like regular mounts. Easy to install, sturdy materials and construction. I'd buy this mount again for another room.

This was super easy to install! The instructions were very clear and everything was packed in a way that you knew exactly what part was what.Well made, solid TV mount. It was hard to believe the quality of everything for the price.

This is a fantastic TV mount.  Well constructed and the price is terrific too!  It came with everything I could have needed.  I was expecting to have to go buy the mounting bolts for the back of the TV as I don't believe there is a standard size.  I was surprised to find an assortment of different bolts for this purpose as well as spacers included in the box.  Very easy to install and sturdy too.  I highly recommend this TV mount.

An amazing $17.00 bargain!  I mounted our living room TV years ago, and it was a painful chore even with an expensive mount.  I bought this one for our bedroom TV (38 inch) and hoped for the best.  The installation process was clear and concisely laid out in the instructions, and every conceivable bolt, washer or piece of mounting hardware you could ever need was included.  It truly is a universal mount. Simple installation and a real bargain at $17.00.  Recommended with no reservations at all!

Wanted a simple tilting wall mount for my office and this item has met that need.  The materials used are solid and it was an easy install.  My wife and I had the tv up and running in short order. The kit came with a good collection of hardware to adapt to a wide range of mounting scenarios.  Nice product.

I’ve dealt with a fair share of TV mounts in my life but never have I ever seen a TV mount as convenient as this one! Not only was it extremely affordable, but the installation was easier then making your morning cup of coffee. The instruction manual is easy to understand and the supplied materials are divided up into their own sections. Also the company included some nice extras, a leveler, a HDMI cable, and a cable organizer. Lastly, the customer service is phenomenal! If you’re looking for a no hassle, easy to use, affordable, quality TV mount you've come to the right place!

This is an awesome mount for the price! It works amazing only thing is I highly advise anyone who is thinking about purchasing this to look into the details. I did not have any supplies to install this and it was a hassle getting around town to put this thing on. You need a drill, wall finder, some batteries (maybe), tools and most importantly TIME. I recommend buying your own screws because these ones that come with aren't that high quality? But Amazon does a great job it came within a day using prime. Thank you!

purchased 3 of these for my new home to mount a 42", 45", and 65". They came with all the necessary hardware, instructions, and were packaged very nicely. They are extremely easy to install, have a great tilt on them, and are easily removable if you ever want to take your TV down in a hurry! did I mention the price is so much better than anything else I could find. great investment here

Product was great.  Was looking for something cheaper than what the big boxers were offering for 3-4x the price.  Only issue I had was I didn’t confirm one of my older 50” TVs mounting size (I think it’s called VESA)- but bought 3 of these and all were super easy and work great.  I have a 65” LG in the den and it’s perfect and a 50” in my kids room and no issues at all.  Took about 30 min and most of that was just measuring and leveling.

Have bought a lot of DIY items/furniture etc in past, but never came across a product that packed screws, nuts, and other parts so well. Usually everyone just keeps small objects together leaving customer to identify which item is F (for example) to use in which step.Here smallest items were packed and marked separately that makes following instructions a breeze.

Cheap, looks good, does the job. Shop at your local stores and then come back here. Lowes wants like 60 bucks for larger mounts or more.I just wanted a tilt mount. Comes w/ a level and a hdmi cord if you need one. Super quick to pull the tv off the mount if needed. I actually wall mounted every room with these mounts. No issues.

The quick and easy nature of the mounting was the best part.Overall, the instructions were straight forward, but I had to read them multiple times to translate what was being said. But, after a bit of playing with the parts and brackets it made sense.

Be sure to measure the space on the TV for the bars (hooks). This product did not work. We now have a mount on the wall with no TV to put on it. The middle bar/plate was too wide and did not align with our TV. It would have been nice to have seen this measurement in the description.

Great value and good quality.  The kit came with everything you need, including an HDMI cable, level, different length and size screws for your TV.  Ideal for smaller TV's 32" to 52".  The wall mount plate spans exactly 16" which is your standard distance between two 2x4 studs inside your drywall.  You have up to 8" offset from the center of wall mount plate, which mean you can slide your TV up to 8" to the left or right of the wall plate.  This is because the wall plate have to be secured to the two 2x4 studs inside the dry wall, and you can slide the TV to the left or right to position it relative to the rest of the wall.

So as far as this thing goes it hasn’t sent my 65” plummeting to a bitter end. We’ve had it up for a few days now. It came in as expected and you just need to be mindful of where your studs are placed in the wall. For me set up was easy as I have a man at home who did that for me. All in all it appears to be doing its job.

This mount is awesome and works with most TV's! I say MOST because I bought a few of these mounts and didn't realize the VESA on one of the TV's was a bit narrower than this mount allows, so we had to use a different one for that. All of the other TV's we have work great with this mount and it was very simple to install. Great value for a great item - definitely recommend!

Hung up 36' TV with no problem very easy to install.  However it has bottom pull tabs so the supports click into the rail.  Mine do not click in at its full angle down like seen in the picture supplied by amazon.  The weight of the TV keeps it in place.  The pull tabs also hang below the TV so I cut them off.  The price is right and the product will work however the bottom tabs for me do not lock in.

I was hesitant to order these because of the low price. After seeing many mounts in stores for a lot more I decided to throw caution to the wind and give them a try. I ordered two of these for two different types of televisions I own. Both of the TVs are 55" and are different mounting configurations. These mounts are inexpensive, well built, easy to install (use your own level!), and support a wide range of configurations. I am very happy with this item and will certainly purchase this type of mount again.

I loved this product, the ease of installation and the fact that they include a wide variety of mount spacers. You would think Samsung would include them since most people mount their TV's now a days but nope so I would have had to order a special kit from them but because this mount contained many spacers I was able to put something together that worked perfectly and saved me the time and effort. It also comes with a level. I would purchase again.

Worked perfectly for my 50" TCL Roku TV. i mounted this above a fireplace where there was a stud one 1 inch left of center with the other two studs 24" from center. 1992 house so of course. Fortunately, the TV weighed less than 25 pounds plus the one stud was plenty. For the heck of it, I put two half decent drywall anchors opposite the stud side...completely unnecessary, but it made me feel better.

The setup was very straight forward. The quality of the wall bracket and the hardware included to mount the "arms" to the TV are good quality. I had to make a few adjustments with spacers and such, but that is mentioned in the instructions. I was missing a couple of M8 screws but Michael from customer service was great, he shipped them on the same day and I got them the day after.  You also have to consider the price for this bracket which is really nice. Better, and a cheaper than the ones you could find at Costco or Walmart.

Not the easiest to install, but for the price it’s great. There are several of these with the same design just different brands and they all work fine just depends on how much you want to pay. It carries our 65in tv. 3 weeks in and no issues, also the “tilt” is worthless. No difference there. If you want movement get the swivel.

I'm not sure whether to give a bad review to this mount or to the friend who helped me install it. He kept muttering the whole time (from the moment he saw the picture on the box) that it was a stupid design and obsolete and why did I order this one when there are better modern ones and "they stopped making these years ago". He nonetheless got it installed (with more muttering) and it seems to work fine. I've looked over the installation directions myself and they don't really make a lot of sense to me, so maybe my friend was right that it's a bad design (I certainly wouldn't have been able to install it myself). But as long as it works, I can't give it fewer stars. Just beware that if you're not mechanical, you might have trouble with the installation.

Got this for a 50’ Samsung. Fit great and installation was pretty easy. All the hardware you need is included and then some! Just figure out which size screws/ washers you need to mount the rails to your tv and your good to go. Locating the studs to mount the wall bracket was probably the longest part of the installation. That was due to multiple measure/remeasures on my part just to be sure I hit studs on both sides! Having a stud finder comes in handy. Once the wall brackets up, mounting the tv is simple.Instructions were pretty straight forward, everything you need hardware wise is included and the price was great! I would definitely order again if I’m looking to wall mount another tv.

Snagged a Walmart black Friday TV deal only to find that a mount would cost me  $75!  Screw that.  So I copped this baby from Amazon.  Works great.  I don't know why anyone would pay up to $75 for a TV mount when this one is available.  This one is very intuitive to install and use.  TV comes off the wall in an instant by pulling on the fabric loops.  Also slides horizontally about 6 inches either way while mounted, which for me is a desirable thing.  Adjusting the tilt is easy - take it off the wall mount as mentioned earlier and adjust some hew-head screws.The fact that you get a bubble level and a 6-foot HDMI cable included for $16 is amazing - you can pay $16 for just the cable!

Excellent mount, purchased a 70 inch Samsung tv and I was afraid that it wouldn’t be strong enough to support it but it is very sturdy, paired this mount up with a stud finder I also purchased from amazon and this was easy comes with all the hardware you’ll ever need. Easy fast and amazing

The hardest part of installing my 50" Vizio using this was finding 2 studs to support it, since I have an older house and the stud width isn't consistent or standard.  Part of this frame bolts to the wall, in the studs, and the front part goes on the back of the TV.  I am glad that we went ahead and attached the HDMI cable that was sent- we have used it several times since.There are two loops that are used when the TV is lifted into place. Pulling on them opens then clamps the front part of the mount with the TV onto the wall.

Wall mount worked perfectly. It is very universal, and i was able to hang my 65” LG OLED in about 20 min. It came with an hdmi cable which is nice. I have hung numerous TVs now and this mount has to be one of the easiest due to the flexibility of the mount. The directions are a little confusing but once i got the mounting bracket up, I stopped reading. Great Mount! Unbeatable price!

I bought this tv mount thinking it would he sturdy. It holds the TV up, but it definitely seems like it's on the cheaper side. Also, it has straps in the back that hang down to help it latch to the bracket and they're a pain to try and hide once the tv is up. Seems like a poor design, but it hangs the TV.

This was easy to install. The directions are clear and easy to follow. The components and pieces are individually sealed and numbered to the directions, again easy to get right. The mount is solid, stable and secure.Measure the placement, i.e. height and centering before mounting the bracket to the wall. This sysyem made hanging the TV simple and safe.

I like how the instructions are easy to understand but I wish that it was easier to attach through the wall I'm 5 2 102 lb yeah I had to ask my friend to help me install it it took about 25 minutes but I was pleasantly surprised with all the tools that it came with came with a level a HDMI cord and a lot of other tools it was really awesome for the price I paid for it

Mine is currently hold up a 50" sharp in the shop.. no problems installing it..Only bad is this... if you have to remove the tv from the mount i hope you have small hands so you can get to the spring loaded release springs..  besides that a good unit overall

Ease of installation, directions well written. The mount is level; once we mounted the tv, the tv is not level. I will have to re-adjust by placing something under one of the hooks to level. I am not sure why tv is not level when mount is; perhaps the hooks aren’t machined even or maybe where they (supports) attach to tv aren’t even.Very sturdy mount and great price.

The install was breeze. When they say it does 24 stud spacing, they weren’t kidding, not a 1/4 inch to spare, it barely makes the spread, but worked great.Came with a level that isn’t level, used my own for quality.....

Easy step by step instructions, super universal for all sorts of TVs. We have a 65” and it held it perfectly. Once you mount the back, you just screw the clips onto the tv and click it into place. It came with a nice, long extended HDMI cord and a small leveler. Highly recommend.

This is by far the best tv mount I have ever purchased.  Comes assembled.  The wall bracket is a one piece design (very strong) and the pull latches work perfectly.  I've probably purchased 20 or more of these cheaper mounts on Amazon and this Mounting Dream Bracket is perfect.  I love how stiff the tilt is.  I wanted my tv parallel with the wall and some of the other mounts dont stop the tilt as well.  47" LG LED mounted.

This was very easy to install. My husband did it in about less than 45 minutes. It tilts foward, which is great for vision sometimes. I get glares through the windows and that tilt helps a lot. There’s straps to help with quick removal for clean root accessing the back of the tv and remount is just a quick snap.

This product is awesome. It comes with a little love it took us about 10 minutes to hang it in drywall and then hook the TV to it have all the wires hidden just awesome to have it holds a 52 anti Super HD TV I recommend this hanging your TV on the wall it goes great with the shelves that I put on it. I highly recommend this product.

This worked well for our Vizio 55" tv.  The attachment was easy with a proper stud finder.  I was unable to find a stud for one location, so I only have 3 screws in the wall, and it is still holding up well.  (Not saying that is ideal, just that it did work. It will reduce the capacity that way.)All in all, very pleased with this purchase.

I rarely if ever give 5 star reviews however I was so pleased with the quality and ease of installation I will here. I will have to say however that I’m using the mount only in the vertical position so I can’t judge it’s tilt performance. I mounted a 60” LG and this mount and hardware fit perfectly. I used 5 lag bolts to anchor to 2x4” studs and it is rock solid and level thanks to the wall brackets one piece design. I wouldn’t mess around with the 2 piece brackets many other sellers offer, no way.

I had to mount a 50" Samsung TV to the wall and this mount did the trick. The build quality of the mount is good and it is sturdy. The mount comes with detailed clear instructions as well as screws and spacers for different TV's but I recommend that you use the spacers that come with your TV. I did have to use some of the small spacers in the kit to properly secure the screws into the TV. I have some additional TV's to mount and I will be purchasing more of the MD products.

The tilting mounts like this where you clip the tv the top are simply the best. It makes it easy to move sideways if you didn’t measure the spot you wanted it perfectly and you can also take the tv on and off pretty easily. I actually managed to do the whole thing myself with no struggle and everything needed was provided / labeled.

Very easy to install.  Be aware of how far apart your studs are so that you get the right bracket.  Mine were a perfect width.  Use a good level to make sure you have it straight.  It does come with a little one but I think it's better to have a large one to get it perfect.  Holds my 43" TCL TV without any issue.

I bought thi to mount my new 65” tv to the wall. The instructions were great and the mounting was straight forward. The instructions say to basically hang in. It after you mount it to the wall. I hung on it with almost all of my 180 pounds and it did not budge. I am confident that my tv will be safe with this mount.

Great Wall mount! Very strong, I can hang from it.  This is the fourth one I have purchased. Easy to install and does not need to be exactly centered behind the television. This is handy due to fact that the studs may not land perfectly, so you can still center the TV on the wall. We have a 65”, 58”, 55” and a 44” mounted using this system. I love it. It tilts forward so you can mount up high. The only conn is the mount does not swivel side to side. Mounting Dream does offer a model that does for a few dollars more. I will soon be adding one to our game room. I presume it will be of equal quality. I will leave a post once it is installed.

I bought this to hold a 55" and it does do it, however the mount is low profile so we had to shim the wall so our accessories cords could plug into the tv. It also tilts about 8 degrees downward if you want but no more.  If you are looking for a mount that is simple and does the job this is it.  If you are looking for options and to hold a lot of weight keep looking.

This TV mounting bracket is great! Very easy to install and use.  The only drawback is that it does only allows for a small range of adjustments in TV Up/down angle.  No left/right adjustment.  Perfect for locations (bedroom, corner) that don't require any other little movement.  I highly recommend this.

I bought this to hang up my mom's TV on her wall. It looks like the easiest item to purchase because it actually has hooks that you hang on to the brackets that you screw into the wall. I had my husband and still listen to a while since he's installed other ones in our own home. It took him about 15 or so minutes to get this TV hooked onto the wall and ready working. If they have others for larger TVs I may look into purchasing one in the future since I'm planning on purchasing the 70 inch. I would definitely buy this specific brand to hang up again. This does not move around so you can't pull it from the wall and turn it from side to side is a straight on up to the wall.

For what I paid I got way more than I bargained for. Do not think twice about this, it was a perfect match for our 50" LED TV. I wouldn't suggest it for a plasma, but I would highly recommend this for a TV that isn't too heavy or an LED for that matter.Very Happy with this purchase. The HDMI cable was awesome too.

Good mount BUT the level that comes along with the mount is really bad. When installing the mount the level showed it was fine, once I finished something looked off. I borrowed a larger level from a friend and sure enough it was not level. Luckily I was able to add shims on the lower side to level it up. Seller shouldn't send these horrible levels with their product.
Go with this one folks. Plenty sturdy. Read the reviews. You may opt to drill the center area for a screwhole to secure to a center stud. Used this with a 65 pound 75" samsung and am happy.

I got this for a 47" Sharp Aquos 400 x 400 VESA. It was simple to install other than not having a good masonry bit, but the product mounted well. I used the supplied level and like that they included an HDMI cable although I don't think i'll have any use for it. For the price I can't image getting a better value and it worked perfectly for my setup.
Package uncludes: Screws, washers, spacers, hex key, level, and mount template.The only tool not included is a 7/32 drill bit.
Installation was a breeze. Comes with all hardware for different options and a template for making holes in the wall.Don't use the included level though.

Amazing for the price. I mounted my 42in flat screen plasma tv. Install was easy and basic, mounts fit my tv and the free level was a bonus but I had my own. A tip for the less experinced, mount the arms on your tv and measure to make sure you place your wall mounting bracket low enough from your celling so you can still fit the tv on the bracket. Kit has an assortment of other screws and bolts for various brands and models of tv. The tilt on the bracket was just enough to be comfortable for me. A tip, set your tilt settings and screws before you mount the tv on the wall. I am completely satisfied, basic and cheap, easy to install.

We had to get a wall mount because our LO kept pushing on our TV. This is a super great product! We thought we were going to have to go buy a bunch of bolts and screws but nope, it came with everything (bolts, screws, and a magnetic level). The only thing that was not included was a stud finder. The instructions were very clear and concise!  It took us roughly an hour to hang it because we had never hung one before and wanted to make sure we did it right so our LO wouldn’t get hurt.

This tv mount works as described, i would just warn someone installing a larger tv to attach a clothes hanger or a piece of string to the bottom pull tabs so that they can be accessed. On my 70 inch TV, the bottom of the TV was too long to reach the pull tabs to complete the installation.

I installed this wall mount by myself, following the provided instructions. Instructions were straight forward, and overall installation was a breeze. The included level was nice, but i mustve rushed it because the finished product isnt perfectly level. Nice wall mount and a great price

Okay yeah, it’s a wall mount, nothing special does the job. Where this stands out is the package. Not only do they include a braided hdmi cable and level, the bags of parts are not only separated.... there freaking COLOR CODED! Here’s the kicker, they put a metric/imperial ruler on the box. I know it sounds trivial, but as a consumer, these small attentions to detail and consideration tells me this manufacturer cares because the only thing better than the product itself, is the bargain. Kudos to everyone involved. No hyperbole.

Yeah sure, it's cheap and it does it's job by holding the tv up on the wall.. But that is all it does! If you EVER want to plug something in behind the tv GOOD LUCK! There is about 1.5 inches of space behind the mount so nobody can get their hand behind there to plug something in. I will be returning this and never buy a mount like this again. This mount is good for people who install it and never plan to plug in something new to their tv for years. Waste of time.

Love the quality and I’m all about quality  especially for the price! I saw mounts at this retail store that I’m not going to mention but the prices are way over 100$ for junk and this is well cheaper price and a higher quality. But do not use the hdmi it comes with it does not support 4K And if it does it’s only for a little then you will lose signal

Great standard tv mount. Doesn’t yield much space in the back for cords. If you have an hdmi or usb hub that faces the wall instead of to the side, your cord will hit the wall. We were barely able to the the hdmi cord in. It’s touching the wall at 90 degrees pinching the cord a bit. Other than that it’s solid.

I found that this unit worked wonderfully for my 44 inch TV. Kit was full of bolts for all sorts of TVs and well organized in the packaging. Personally appreciate the instructions even though I didn't use them much. Comes included with a level, which is tiny, but extremely handy for other odd jobs so look at that as a free and wonderful little bonus.

We got a 43 LG TV for my kids room. I wanted to hang it up above her dresser so that it doesn't get accidentally knocked over.  We needed to use the spacers and all the parts and pieces worked for what we needed to do.  The quick release hang a little below the TV but it's not a big deal.

I've used two of these, one on an older 44 inch TV and another on a new 70 inch. I really like how tight they mount to the wall, almost impossible to see any of the cables behind the TV. Installation was easy on the 44 inch but the kit didn't have the correct mounting bolts for the Samsung 70 inch. I was able to make due with a dremel tool and some different bolts.

I could only rate 1 star because I never got to use it. I had to mount my TV center of a wall. My studs are too far apart for me to use 4 lag bolts and there is no way to center mount this style bracket. This mount seems really well built with a lot of mounting options.

Easily one of the best mounts I've purchased. It's properly made and extremely strong. Comes with all the hardware needed for various screw sizes for different TVs. I used it to mount my Panasonic Plasma, a 55lb TV. Once installed, I tested the load prior to mounting the TV by hanging my self off it for a few seconds. No issues at all. I am going to be purchasing a second mount to mount another TV. Will also be recommending this mount to family members that need to mount their TV.Great product!

The product is quite sturdy, and although I did have to enlist help to sort out the instructions, once we figured it out we had it up in no time. The installation was surprisingly simple and the mount feels very secure. Very good product at a good price.As others noted, the included level is not super accurate, so I’d recommend using another.

This mount is really well built and incredibly sturdy. I was very impressed and surprised at how strong/tough it feels. If you just need a mount that will angle your TV down a hair (8 degrees) then this is the one! Easy to set up and install.Since I mounted over a fire place (use to be wood burning) I used used two 2x4's that extended to the sides where studs were. Then I drilled the TV mount in to the 2x4's. I have done this before and it is very sturdy. Fairly certain I could hang from it and it wont be coming out of the wall.

Rated for TV's up to 70" I bought this to mount an older 46" plasma screen. The mount frame was 2" too narrow for the space between attachment points on the TV. To use it I had to mount the halves of the frame separately. It works, but I wouldn't have bought it if I'd known this in advance.

I had been wanting to mount our TV on the wall for quite some time, but the husband didn't want to. After installing one for our daughter, he decided it wasn't such a bad idea. He mounted this on the wall with no issues. We've had it up for several weeks now and the TV hasn't fallen down, so...I'd say it's a pretty sturdy product. :-)

Sturdy and easy to follow installation directions.  Mounted a 55in LG with no issues.  The release pulls do hang below the bottom of the television, so I just taped them to the back of the tv.  Happy with the purchase and would buy it again if we mount any other TVs in our house.

Not bad for $40. Compared to the $120 bestbuy and Walmart wanted. I bought a 75” tv and had few options. The metal plate that bolts on the wall good quality. The hooks that go on the back of the TV. Not a fan. Look and feel cheap. And the “tilt function” is a pain. You have to use an Allen wrench to adjust it. Would rather thumb screws.

Imounted mines on a concrete and brick wall the company will send you the anchor separately once requested Instead of waiting I went to the local true value snd purchased some lead concrete anchors1/2 inch for the 1/2inch screws provided because with older construction the blue self anchor screws can loosen up and drop your tv

The mount feels more than capable of holding the TV I have on it, so it definitely wins studies points. The instructions were easy to follow and now that it’s up I am very happy with it.Adjusting the angle is a bit of a pain and difficult to do if it is already mounted. It’s possible but requires two people. One to tilt to desired angle, and the other to loosen then tighten the screws.

Perfect fit for a 55 in tv. Comes with a blueprint for the wall to help mark your anchor locations without scratching up the paint. Also included a variety of spacers and lengths/sizes of bolts if you wanted more distance from the wall. The extra HDMI cord and level are nice bonuses. Took about 20 minutes to assemble and mount.

Mount went in easy, and  works well! It stretched to reach 2 studs (My house is 24" studs) But it fit right, and I had a little room to slide my TV back and forth to find the right fit. If your studs are off center of the wall you expect to hang the TV on, I would suggest buying the longer version to give yourself a little more flexibility on where to hang the TV, but for me it worked fine since my studs were centered on the wall. The level is nice because one side of it is a magnet, so it stuck to the wall plate while I mounted it to the wall. Made leveling the plate a breeze!

Came fast and looks great on the wall. Wish it would tilt more and move around but it’s ok. Came with a long hdmi cord which is great and all the tools although I didn’t use them all as you don’t have too. Would recommend. The screws that drill on the wall are huge and I only used 2 instead of 4 because it’s very sturdy so no need to make 4 holes in the wall.

Had two buy a second one since the first one proved to be great. One is holding a 65 inch samsung and the other one a 50 inch all tools needed to install all i needed was a drill. Came with level and confident tv will not fall. Came with hdmi cable too. Price was very affordable 👌

This is very easy to install with all the mounting hardware included! Very durable with a simplistic design that really works well for a great value! My favourite feature is the ease in which you can mount & remove the Television from the wall simply by pulling the two levees & lifting!

For the price, this is an excellent product. The most time consuming part of this was measuring everything out to fit onto the wall correctly. Easy to install, comes with many varying screws, spacers and pieces to make it fit correctly, a small level and an HDMI cable and easy to read instructions. I would highly recommend this product - just make sure to learn about what VESA spacing is on your TV so that you don't miss the marks/space in back of your TV with the pre-drilled holes.

I have purchased numerous TV mounts over the years, purchasing several articulating mounts and never using them.  This mount is both practical in form and cost.  It really exceeded my expectation as to its quality.  I would recommend this mount to anyone.  It can fit a 16" center or 24" center, it comes with a level, HDMI cable and two Velcro cord wraps.  It is simply an excellent product.  Don't ignore this mount due to its low price, just the opposite, buy it before it increases in price.

Great product and very easy to assemble. It was a little difficult to adjust the angle and secure the screws once it was on the wall. I don’t know how we would have done that if we didn’t use the spacers to add some space between the wall and tv. But it’s up and sturdy and looks great. Would definitely recommend.

Great tv mount. I had a handy man mount it for me for my 52 inch tv. The company was great about answering questions and helping me pick the exact one I needed for my specific television. They sent me a list of which mounts would work. Made it much easier to narrow down ! I am going to mount my sons tv and I will use this company again. Always.

I just bought the new 49" TV and wanted to mount it on the wall in my bedroom so I bought the Mounting Dream after checking out several other brands. Crossed my fingers and hoped for the best. It was super easy to install and it works like a dream. Perfect for my TV. Thanks Mounting Dream for making such a great product!

This is pretty nice but I wish I would have noticed that you can't slide the hooks all the way across the top. I needed about a 1/4 of an inch and my tv would have been centered but with that bar in the center I can't push it over any more. It's not entirely the mounts fault because the wall I hung it on is narrow and only had 3 studs in it so I placed it way off to one side. I would still buy this again if I ever needed another one.

This tilting TV wall mount works as described. It comes with all the screws you could ever need and a pretty nice level. The lag screws to screw into the studs seem pretty good quality as does the mount itself. One thing I kind of like is when you hang your TV on the mount, because it doesn't use clamping screws to attach the TV bracket to the wall mount,  you can slide the TV back and forth on the mount to center it in your wall space. I wasn't expecting that.

Bought this product to hang my new 55" Samsung.  I was replacing an older model 55" tv...so I didnt have to hang brackets to the wall...I used the existing one. I did install the mounting brackets to the back of the tv and they installed in a few minutes. Super sturdy and tilt action gives u the ability to angle the tv to the optimum position.

Holds our 51 inch in the master bedroom. Took about 5 minutes to put up and was easy to install. Definitely sturdy! Only get this if you’re not planning on moving the tv once up. It does not tilt or swivel in any way. It’s exactly what we wanted but be sure that’s what you want!

I used this mount to hang our 75" Samsung RU8000.  It assembles easy and all hardware to attach it to the TV and wall is included.  I chose to use my own lag bolts to attach it to the studs based on reviews that the hardware was terrible.  The spacers and fasteners to the TV worked out great and it made for a great looking installation.

This was one of the best purchases! I didn’t know tv mounts didn’t cost $100. I also didn’t know how awesome it feels to install your own tv mount. The tv looks great mounted! Were able to do the install ourselves but I think people should know that your gonna need tools for this. One of the things we didn’t have was ratchet. The drill wasn’t enough to screw down the bolts. Thankfully a neighbor lent me his. The instructions were easy to follow and I was impressed by all you get with the kit. I would certainly recommend to anybody

This system is easy to install. However, if you want to adjust tilt you need to do it with the tv off the wall and tighten the screws, then put the tv back on the wall. If it is not correct, you have to remove it and readjust.

Choose this mount! I purchased the mount that only tilts. HDMI cable as a bonus! All included hardware and spacers.This mount comes in two pieces. Don’t let that deter you. Simply attach the two pieces together with the provided screws. (you need a screw driver). I hung a “55 vizio and looks great and very close to the wall. Half the price of what you pay for at any local big box store that does the exact same thing. I will be buying another one soon for the guest bedroom.

Works awesome. Just wish it was a little wider so you had a little more play when trying to hook the tv onto the wall. You have to have everything lined up perfectly for it to fit. You may have 1/2” on either side once the tv brackets are mounted to the wall bracket. That makes it tough when you are lining it up.

This is a great bang for your buck. I’ve installed 30+ TVs on walls and this mount works well. I took one star off because I don’t like how you need to assemble the 2 halves. That being said they go together easily and I had no issues mounting the tv perfectly level. I would recommend using your own level as often these cheap levels that are provided don’t work well and are not accurate
This item was labeled to mount tvs over 55. However its barley wider than my house studs. I had to do some rigging to make it work. Nice hardware, I suspect it's meant for 32 or less

Installed tv with maximum tilt, didn't like the viewing angle and decided to readjust.  Couldn't get the tilt adjustment screw to loosen, those screws were made of soft metal and the screw became useless as the head of the Allen screw got stripped in the process, ended up punching the screw, wasted lot of time. By the way I didnt use any power tools on the allen screw, simply used the supplied Allen tool.

Easy install, works well. Purchased two of them for a 60” and 70” tvs. Been over a month and they’re are still on the wall! Worth the few days of shipping if you’re not in a rush. These are a fraction of the cost of in store mounts. They work just as well!

Unfortunately, whoever designed this does not realize that if a stud lies directly in the center of the wall you want to mount it on and your studs are 24" apart instead of 18" apart, then you cannot mount your TV directly in the middle of the wall. I am pretty bummed about that.

I installed this rack for a 60 inch LED tv.  It was easy to install, and the accompanying documents were good.  They also provided a free leveling tool.  I like the company that makes this.  If you're going to get a universal TV rack, I highly recommend this one.

Perfect! This TV mount would be a bargain at double the price. Such as it is, its beyond a steal, $16!! comes with HDMI cable and all the screws/tools your need. I had it mounted with my 43" but them inherited a 60" and mounted it and works flawlessly (Doubt any TV larger than 60" would work.) Easy to mount/discount with the draw string cables. Took me 10 min from start to finish to mount it to wall. Easy peasy!

This could not have been easier to install and use!! Very impressed with the simplicity. I have been installing these for years and this is the easiest and I do not have ANY concern about the sturdiness and the ability to hold my 55" TV. Very pleased, very easy, very durable! Will ONLY use this brand moving forward!

The seller or the manufacture who packaged this did an excellent job. All screws needed where organized and separated by size. It came with cables and a level to do the job right. If this is your first time installing a wall mount this seller has it all organized with easy instructions. I highly recommend buying from this seller.

Finally got our first big flat screen smart TV.  Mounting was way too easy.  Whatever you do get, get a mount that tilts slightly if you're mounting up on the wall so the picture points more toward your eyes.  This is solid - no fear of my beautiful new TV falling off the wall.  Was tempted to get a swivel mount, but seriously, when would I ever really need to do that?  Love that this is as flush to the wall as can realistically get - TV blends in more like a picture frame than a honking tech monstrosity.

It doesn't have a lot of the features of high end mounts, but this works great in my apartment. The hardware is sturdy and well made. They go into overkill with the amount of extra hardware to fit every type of TV setup. I suppose I will keep the extra hardware for when I buy a new TV and it may mount differently.

The mount worked fine but the brace in the middle is pretty wide and sticks up slightly making it impossible to attach if the stud is directly in the center.  Also where the brace sticks up it won't allow the use of a 2ft level.  It did come with a small level but I never trust a free 6 inch level

I got almost entirely through my installation process before realizing that I absolutely had to have a torque wrench in order to finish installation. There's simply no other option. Now I'm stuck here with a half installed mount in my wall and need to wait until tomorrow until I can go buy a torque wrench, which will probably cost the same as the entire mount itself. It seems like the mount will be good once installed but, if you don't own a torque wrench already , buy a different mount as you'll be spending twice the price of this mount just to get the thing installed. I'd return it if it wasn't such a hassle.

This was the first TV wall mount that I installed.  The directions were good. I'm am pretty handy.  For a non-handy person, following the instructions should still be fairly simple. I really like how the TV floats horizontally on the wall mount, so after installed, you can slide left-to-right to center it.  We centered ours over our dresser in our bedroom. The best part is the price - great value.  I would have given 5 stars but adjusting the tilt angle is a pain.  You have to take the TV on and off the wall (trial and error) to get correct angle.

I prefer this design over the swing arm design for larger screens.  I used this for a 50" Samsung.  Just understand that the wall bracket is less than 16" long so I was only able to put one side into a wall stud.  I used 60lb drywall anchors for the non-stud side.  This comes with a small level to make proper installation a snap.  Super solid and stable and the straps have adjustable length.  Easy quick installation just find a wall stud.

I’ve purchased much more expensive mounting systems that were less intuitive and included fewer conveniences. I loved that this came with a mini level!I ordered the concrete anchors and was shipped them within two days. This company is awesome and I really enjoyed the product! Thank you!

I'd describe my DIY abilities as "adequate" I managed to successfully put it all together on my own but I didn't realized that it didn't come with the screws for brick walls. The way the tilting mechanism is designed makes it pretty much useless as it's incredibly hard/impossible with regular tools to secure it once tilted.Long story short, I ended up using toggle bolts and putting it on drywall and dear lord making those holes was a struggle.

but the little cloth loops hang down by default... kind of ruins the look. Not enough to give it any less than 5 stars as you can figure out something to do with them, just seemed like a design flaw (or I didn't notice a hook to loop them on, which is definitely possible too).

I’ve bought 5 of these mounts! Over the passed few years we’ve moved and needed to reorder tv mounts for our new house. We ordered the same mounts again! Very versatile and easy to install. This product came with clear instructions, all necessary mounting screws, a level, and even HDMI cord. You get so much for a great price. Would really recommend this product!

The quality of the product is fine. It will do the job at a more than fair price. I'm impressed most with the packaging. Every  size bolt, washer, screw etc.. is in it's own separate package with a divider and labeled with a number or letter that con-insides with the instruction manual. Nice! I had to do a double take. My first thought to my self was "no way." Thanks Mounting Dream! I highly recommend this product.

This is my go to for a basic TV wall mount.  I've installed a hand full of these now.  While it does come with its own tiny level I always pitch that directly into the trash.  I've checked 3 of the provided levels against my Empire magnetic torpedo and all 3 were off the bubble by varying amounts.  I would rate this 5 stars if they would get rid of the level and tell the consumer to use their own.  I feel a lot of unnecessary frustration could be eliminated this way.

Everything was in the box that was needed. Would have liked a little more width about 2 inches more on the wall plate, with that you could attach to 2 studs 16 inches apart.  This was my 3rd purchase of this wall mount. Great product. Great directions.

This wall mount is awesome! It’s super easy to put together and comes with a ton of extra parts for anything you might need. I mounted my 60” and it looks great, you can move it side to side , I wish it tilted more but other than that I love it! OH you DEFINITELY need a ratchet to get the screws into the studs because you CANT use a drill!! Definitely the hardest part

so I think I have dry walls.. I live in an apartment in california where all the apartments are wooden. I'm no expert on finding stubs or anything. I just followed the instructions on dry walls without any drilling machine, just screw driver and screws that came with it. I made sure this thing is not loose, looked decently attached to the wall. TV is hanging for last 10 days, nothing loose yet. this was my first time installing something like this. GOOD product with reasonable price

Title says it all, I’ve installed dozens of wall mounts over the years and this was easy to put together and worked great on the 50” I had temporarily in the living room before moving it to the new 65” we got for Black Friday.Easy to adjust and great value compared to what store wanted for a similar wall mount system.

I needed to mount my 50 inch TV on a brick fireplace (unused). All the other mounts I looked at were super expensive so I bought this one hoping it'd work out but not setting my hopes too high. It was great! I did end up buying some heavy duty concrete anchors just because I wanted to play it safe. The installation was pretty easy and the tv looks perfect with the very subtle tilt.

I am really happy with how easy to setup and install this was. It comes with all sorts of different screws for different TV hole types, as well as a bunch of different spacer sizes. Included in the box was even a level for installation and an HDMI cable. It is holding my 65" TV very nicely on the wall.

This was an easy installation that took about 20 minutes to complete. It came with a handy little magnetic level, Velcro strips to manage cords, and HDMI cable. I can’t comment on the cable as I kept the existing one I was using.  They provided a number of different size screws along with spacers if you need them.Very happy with my purchase.

If your handyman skills are equivalent to that of a blind baby with no arms or legs, this is for you! I’m an idiot when it comes to putting stuff together but this was a BREEZE. You do need a stud finder and a wrench but besides that, everything you need comes with this. Very happy with this purchase and would buy again

Okay, this is amazing! I can’t believe I only paid this much for a mount for my 70 inch. In stores I would pay well over $100. It was super easy to install and I love that it comes with a level and hdmi cord. When I need to plug something else in, the release handles are easy to pull and release the tv from the wall

Unfortunately, The attachment holes on the back of my tv lined up with the tilting arm on the bracket, which basically made it impossible for the hardware to go into the bracket's predrilled hole.  This turned into a return and wait two more days for a new shipment or to work around the problem.  I chose to work around the problem, which made the job of mounting the tv a difficult task.
Mine didn’t come with one of the mission critical brackets. So I couldn’t mount it.Build quality seems good, and lots of parts for all kinds of tvs. But like a corvette with 3 wheels, not usable.

I like the mount because it came with all the hardware you need. I measured my studs before the purchase because it only works for max 16inch studs. The mount I got was a little defective because one of the silver lower hooks on the one bracket sometimes gets stuck. I didn’t think would be a big deal but after I put the tv up, that same hook is a little loose even after being engaged. So if someone pulls out on the TV, it will move on the one side instead of being tight. I wish both brackets were tight but it’s already on the wall and I do not feel like redoing the lag bolts to return it. Unfortunately, this was only something you could find out after mounting it. It is an inexpensive mount so I guess you get what you pay for.

What a great mount - seriously easy to put up...No issues at all with build quality (was sceptical due to price) has a lot of cutouts for different stud spacing and all included hardware is appreciated.

I was able to mount a 60" plasma TV that weighed about 50 lbs. with no trouble it all.  The tilt feature and the release straps all worked perfectly.  You can slide the TV left and right with no tools even after installing it so that it is perfectly centered.  Just make sure that the left and right sections are aligned perfectly before tightening the bolts.  If not, the TV will be not be level.

I was a little scared hanging our 55” Sony but my husband was able to figure it out in minutes and it’s great. We put it over the fireplace and it gives the perfect amount of tilt. Love it and can’t beat the price. I also like the “handles” on the back easy to pick to tv up and guide it to the mount once on the wall

I'm a fairly weak middle-age woman. I bought this to hang our 37" television in our bedroom. Lord, we needed the dresser top cleared. I mounted this to two studs (using an electronic stud-finder) and hung the television by myself. It took about 30 minutes total. It's been several months now, and I'm watching the TV right now and very happy I did it all by myself. Great product, sturdy, and easy to install. Cheers!

What we like most about this tv mount is it’s low profile. We have a smaller living room so we didn’t want a huge bulky tv mount sticking out far from the wall. This mount is very minimal. Easy to install. Easy to take the tv off the mount and put back in. Good quality for the price.

I'm so happy with the price. I didn't set it up for myself, so I can't speak to the ease of setup, but for the price, it's great! It manages to hold up my very heavy, ancient TV, one of the earlier generation flat screens. Definitely worth the low price.

The kit did not include all the hardware that I needed.  Luckily I was replacing another mounting with this one and was able to use the old parts to make this one work.Simple to install, comes with a very small level, you will need a stud finder.

The construction of the metal seems sturdy enough. The issue I have is that the holes are designed for a maximum of 16" studs.  If your studs are slightly closer together, that is fine.  However, if your studs are slightly wider apart (which mine are) you won't be able to get the center of the studs. That is what I had to do, which is a bit scary. If they would make the mount a little wider to give some margin of error say 15-17" this would get 5 stars.  The level is a bonus, but it doesn't work very well. The margin markers are much wider than the bubble width, so you can't really get an exact level. They offer a wide variety of screws to match the one your tv needs, which is great. However, in my sealed package, they accidentally gave me 3 of the screws I needed, instead of 4. I contacted the seller, and will see what they say.Conclusion: I bought this for around $16 which is great.  Construction seems decent. So if your studs are exactly 16" apart (or less), this will work fine for you. Otherwise, you should probably get something else.

I have now purchased 3 of these units for home and I can honestly say they have been nothing short of spectacular. The quality and reliability of these are amazing for the price. I have gone through multiple mounting kits, some have been from cheap metal and some just junked out of the box for double the price. I have hung 2 65'' TVs (flat and curved) with NO issues. Would recommened!!!!

All bolts, screws, spacers and washers for numerous TVs were included, along with a small level. Centering vertically on the wall required some careful measurements but everything went together fairly easily and quickly. I mounted a 48" Sony and the mounting hardware was more than adequate to hold it.

Such a great system and easy to install. I have purchased two and mounted our 65 and 55 tvs on them. And the 55 is an older LCD and is heavier than the new 65, yet this bracket took hold without issue.I have had to take the tv down a couple times for running wires and getting the tv released and off the bracket is simple and takes no tools or blindly reaching behind the tv for a release as they have a release line that hangs down for you to pull.

This mounting kit is solid.  It was extremely easy to assemble and install.  I love that it came with a magnetic level and a long HDMI cable to run in my wall for my game system.  The space between the frames made it easy for me to mount my cable box behind the tv and not interfere with the mounting kit.

This Mount is rock solid. Instructions are easy to follow. They included fasteners and adjustments for every installation I could think of. If you just need a solid mount with a modest ability to tilt, you cannot do any better than this.

The worry with a TV mount, of course, is that it's not going to hold and your super fancy giant TV will come tumbling to the ground. I do not have that worry at all with this product! It was easy to install and feels incredibly solid. The way it's designed makes it able to accommodate just about any TV size, and the slide-able rack means even if you don't center the mount perfectly, you can make slight adjustments. One of the best parts is how easy it is to take the TV on and off of the mount to make little adjustments as necessary. Overall very solid product.

Wanted to mount my TV so got rid of my stand, built this fireplace and FINALLY was able to put the tv up! Simple instructions, even a girl can hang this system 😉.Update: it’s been up for almost 2 months, no issues at all! For the price, you cannot go wrong!

I have been extremely impressed with this system. Comes with everything needed to mount a tv. Will not swivel from left to right but if you’re just looking for something to put out in front of your bed or man room this is great. Would absolutely buy again

I love how easy it is the connect the tv and move it side to side slightly while it is on the mount.  The mount is solid and is very flexible as far as getting it to line up with the studs 16" on center.  I definitely will be ordering future mounts from Mounting Dream as they are reasonable priced and a quality mount.  I tried a few other before this but did not like the way they performed.

I am very impressed by the quality of this TV mount and the careful, considerate and amazing packaging! First, the quality of the mount itself is very good and the design is very sturdy, I had no concern about hanging my 60” TV on it. The packaging is great, clear instructions, everything is labeled, and all screws and mounting hardware are individually bagged and labeled. They also provide a level for mounting and an HDMI cable (I didn’t need it, so can’t comment on quality of cable). First class product, especially when you consider the price!!!

This is my 4th Mounting Dream Wall mount, used all over my house.  I usually don't get the one that swivels, but I needed one for my basement.  No complaints, they make a great product that is for the price fantastic.  Just look at the wall mount prices at the box stores.  You'll be pleased with your purchase.

I had no probably getting it attached to the wall and actually getting my 55 in TV, i was even able to all of this by myself. The only part that i found to be somewhat annoying is when i was trying to replug in all the cords. But that might just be the price you have to pay to get something that sits very close to the wall. The tilting is also a nice feature.

Easy to install and plenty of screws to choose from for the brackets that attach to the tv. All parts are very well made. Great product. It's much easier to install with two people. I used a long level to draw the horizontal and vertical lines. Then used the small level when making the drill marks. Very easy to do when one person holds the wall bracket and the other person makes the drill marks. I strongly suggest that you start drilling the holes with a small drill bit just in case the stud isn't where you thought it was. Once you hit wood use the correct drill bit to accomidate the anchor screws.

I was nervous getting this mount because I thought the price was too good to be true! That is definitely not the case! This mount is perfect and I can’t believe I almost spent $100 at another store.My one piece of advice would be to take advantage of the multiple spacers that the unit comes with so that the TV doesn’t sit super close to the wall making it hard to connect cords (I have an older bulky tv so this shouldn’t be an issue with newer TVs)

So happy.  This is my 4th TV mount, 1st one from Mounting Dream.  Our TV is an older flat screen, thick and heavy.  I was worried about the huge vesa configuration and wall stud locations wouldn't line up.  This unit is great because it gives you extra room on both to give you a proper fit.  Worked awesome.  Install was easy, the bolts and screws are all separated and labeled.  Stellar unit, great quality.  Loved the little level that was included, too.

I am honestly astounded by the quality of this product and the extras that this came with. It comes with an hdmi cable, leveler, all the hardware and spacers you can use etc. And at this price, you simply cannot beat it. The installation, while requiring some elbow grease and handiness, was quite easy and the instructions were thorough enough for me to feel comfortable with installing it myself.Simply put, you cannot beat the value in this mounting system. I bought two; for my 55" tv and 65" tv, and I am extremely satisfied with my purchase. Amazing!

You can not find a easier mounting bracket,,, stud finder,,, 13mm socket,, Philips screwdriver,, your done,, just make sure you put all your tv lines in ,Before clipping to the wall bracket, And for all you single women,, YES,, you will have a LOT of parts left over,,, Theses are so nice had to get another one

Well built and sturdy. Current holding up my 58 inch tv. To release tv from mount it has 2 small chords that you pull to detach tv from mount. Mount has just enough tilt so you can get that perfect viewing angle. This is my second Mount dream purchase. Recommend

I put off trying to install this mount for weeks. But once I did install it, I couldn't believe how easy it was. Definitely need a second pair of hands and the included level could use a magnet and a lighter color fluid (hard to see black lines in dark blue fluid on a dark wall).

I used their level and mounted the top two screws only to realize it was completely wrong. I got another level and compared it was far off. I had to unscrew the large wall screws and move the mount down an inch to get a different secure hold. I now have two extra holes in my wall. The attached picture is their level on top which is saying its level; the one below, which is accurate, is clearly not level.The mount otherwise seems sturdy and easy to assemble. I would have rather they didnt throw in cheap level to give the impression it's everything you need in one kit. A couple degrees on the mount will be very obvious, especially on larger TVs.

I just mounted a 32" tv with this and the rails that mount on the back of the TV went from the very top of the TV to the very bottom of the TV. On a smaller 26" TV they would have been sticking out from behind the TV.  ALSO, the TV has to be hung on the mount with out tilting it out in order to get the locks to click into place. THEN once it is locked onto the wall plate you can loosen the tilt screws and adjust it out. LAST is the tilting AMOUNT. It says tilting but doesnt say how far it tilts. It does tilt out at the top, but only 3 or 4 inches

I have purchased the cheaper units on here but this one was a sinch to install.From start to finish, maybe 20 minutes.  Great design and everything you need (minus a drill and tape measure) is included.

I really wanted a nearly flush mount. This is as close as possible. But be careful what you wish for. Super difficult to get everything plugged in without three people. Two to hold it up and another to plug wires. But now that it’s up I love it.

Overall a good product. Easy to assemble and mounting would be easy on walls with standard stud spacing. Unfortunately, my fireplace did not have standard stud spacing so I had to attach the mount to a board and attach the board to the wall. The spring loaded clips that secure the TV to the bracket have straps on them to allow one to pull the straps and release the TV. For larger TV's mounted close to a mantel the straps are a little short. Best to make sure the bottom of the TV is mounted 6 to 8 inches above a mantel or shelf.

Almost every VESA I've ever bought comes with some drywall and masonry anchors. hardware included with this did not. required a trip to a local home improvement store to complete installation, will not buy this model again because of that omission.

Extremely easy to install.  Well designed. Fasteners were perfectly sized to match bushings for our tv. Instructions were clear and consistent. Heavy stamped structure with few if any sharp burrs. Good paint quality.  Supplied level verified proper TV appearance when installation was completed. All in all very well done.  Thank you

Seems good I have not had any issues. I use this with a 50 inch TV and it works great. I marked it low on range of motion based on the fact that it does not move but I did not assume that it would. Overall, it does a great job and there are no issues.

The manufacturer of this mounting did a great job including all the parts needed. There were many screw choices, the instructions were easy and the tv mounted perfectly.  They have these little ropes to pull to release or set the tv in place.Well done.

Love love love mounting dream TV brackets. Have several of them and all are solid products. So long as you install into studs these things will not move. Smooth motion, easy install, does exactly what you need.  Love that they provide a level,  all the possible screws you need for any TV. Great company and products.
TV Wall mount kit came with all parts and pieces to fit most mountable flat screen TVs.PROS:

System is great comes with all hardware, love the quick release , with my Samsung 6 series 2017 production it was still hard to get to plugs even with all the spacers probably only down fall but manageable don’t need to get to those that often - love the extra hdmi cable and tie straps - paid 28 $$ think the cable alone is worth that

Putting this mount together was a breeze and everything is included.  I like the spring loaded pulls that lock the panel to the bracket, instead of screws or nothing at all... 1 small issue was 1 screw was unusable as the philips slots were filled in... mass manufacturing issue... but it didn't diminish the overall quality and strength...  Would buy again for next TV...

For the price you can't beat this wall mount, I used the 42" to 84" for my 65" LG OLED, worked perfectly fine, no complaints. This unit is honestly half the price of the comparable Rocketfish brand at Best Buy  ($99.99 as of 6-29-20). If you have money to burn by the rocketfish, if you want the same thing for half the price buy this one, its a no brainer!!
All in all this is a great mount, very sturdy and nicely made. It comes with a lot of different screws to mount pretty much any TV.Any TV but mine:

mounting this product to the wall is very esy, but hanging the television, is not easy, at all. It is advertised for larger and newer televisions, but (per the expert installer) it is not for larger or newer televisions. Also, if you mount a 55 inch television or larger, it will not tilt or move, ever!

Great product. I like how you can slide it to help locating the studs easily. It works great for my 70” tv.  I paid much less than what would cost me from other manufacturers. It came in a small box but had all and extra accessories...well designed..love it.

After checking prices at BB, I couldn't resist ordering this for my Insignia 50" tv.  I was extremely happy with the ease of installation, sturdiness, and included hardware.  Came with extra screws to fit any tv, but mine were easy to pick out and fit perfectly.  The wall bracket installed simply between 2 wall studs 15" apart.  I liked that it reached the studs for the width making it very secure, and it's not so high on my tv that it shows over the top.  I had help from a friend hanging it on the wall plate, but probly could have done it myself.  I liked it so much I ordered a 2nd for my 40" tv.  Just enough tilt for good viewing while sitting.  Great product!

Easy to install. It came with a lot of hardware.  costumer service was great. I like it so much I bought another one for another TV.  Don't fprget to check the hardware that comes with your TV. This worked great for my Samsung nu6900 50" TV.  This mount is for 16" centers max.

Not good. The product was sent in a factory box, the stickers that seel the box where peeled and there were tears on the box. Basically it was used. Inside the screws where outside of their baggage and mixed together. Not to mention when I put the mount together, screws and washers were missing. Luckily I had spares of my own.  The piece that makes the tv tilt was broken. I Diyed  it to make it work properly. The only reason I didn’t return it was because I was able to make it work. If your product comes in similar conditions, I suggest you return it.

Mounted perfectly to the back of the TV per the VESA guidelines. In my home, I have 16" studs. In order to center it properly, I needed to use drywall toggle anchors for one side of the mount. Once this was done, the mount worked perfectly. Very sturdy, easy-to-follow instructions. Just know that the washers can be configured to your liking as well.
