I purchased this TV mount for my 65" Tv and it is awesome quality and holding my TV tight and it feels minimal awkward in holding my television and I likewise saw while moving the TV it is bit troublesome. by and large it is alright item

I ordered one by mistake. Returned it. When I started to hang the one I intended to order. I noticed it would not work with that particular tv. It would have worked on my other tv. Unfortunately I didn't want my tv mounted I returned!

The short story is get this TV mount! Very well made and easy to install and use. I've bought and installed two of these this month and they are working great! The little add in extra items like an HDMI cable and bubble level are nice too.

I remember paying upwards of $100 for a mount a few years ago. Can't believe this thing is so cheap. Works great and will get the job done. I was a bit overwhelmed with the amount of screws and I wish the instructions were a bit more clear on which bolts/washers/spacers to use with what part of the mount but I figured it out.

This mount saved me!!  Then back of my tv was a little abnormal and I’ve tried a few different mounts from big box electronic retailers.  None worked!!!  I was happy this had good reviews and worked like a charm!!!  Perfect and looks very sleek.

FIGURED I'D TRY THIS BRAND AND I WAS NOT DISAPPOINTED.  VERY WELL MADE AND STURDY!  CAME WITH DIFFERENT MOUNTING HARDWARE FOR DIFFERENT TV CONFIGURATIONS.  Some complained about the level, but mine was fairly accurate. ALL AND ALL VERY PLEASED WITH THIS MOUNT.

Bought this to mount my 40" TV in my bedroom. In general, I really like this mount. It is sturdy and easy to use. The release straps do hang down below my TV though, so I had to tuck them up and out of the way.Here are two tips for anyone who purchases this:

For the price I was expecting something a little less robust, but this exceeded my expectations.  It came with all the parts you would need and each was clearly labeled and separated into individual sealed sections.  The instructions were clearly labeled, and any necessary spacers are included if you need them.  I used this to mount a 55inch Samsung UHD tv to a wall.  Took about an hour to get everything mounted from unpacking to hanging on the wall.  Highly recommend if you are looking for something that can be easily assembled and put together.

This thing went up like a charm! Followed the instructions and they were very easy and clear. We were able to mount the bracket to studs that were 16" apart and not on center. But with the mounting template made it easy to get our mount centered with all the available mounting holes. My tv looks great mounted on our wall!

Bought this for my adult son for Christmas, and he started doing pull-ups before the day was through.  It was super easy to mount over the doorway, and just as easy to take down when not in use.  He commented that it was sturdier than other models he’s seen, because it braces below the top of the doorway on one side and above on the other, vs. just hanging onto the top on either side. He’s over 200 pounds and was giving it a good test run already, so I’m confident it will hold up well and be well worth the price.

This mount is exactly what you would expect from a wall mount. It is sturdy and solid, easy to install, tilts a little bit, and includes an HDMI cable as a bonus. I appreciate the little pull grips at the bottom to release the TV, even if they are a little hard to hide.

Low price, easy to work with and functions as designed. I like the simplicity of the mount and there are plenty of holes for mounting to the wall. It is always best to anchor to the studs in the wall, but where that isn't possible good heavy duty anchors can be used and there is plenty of room to use several for extra safety. I have 3 of these, on for my 40" in the bedroom, one for my 49" in the game room and one (yet to be mounted) for my 65" in the theater room. Between the light weight of modern TVs and the multiple mounting points I feel very comfortable with this mount holding all of my TVs.

I purchased this mounting system for my 55 UHD 4K Insignia TV. The mounting instructions was pretty easy to follow. One person can assemble the mount and place it. The box comes with a variety of screws to fit into varies TVs. The leveler included in the system helps because its magnetic, so it sticks to the mounting system as you install. Only downside, the degree of tilt needs to be determined prior to mounting your TV. The placement of adjusting the tilt is difficult to access once the TV is mounted.

This is more a kit than just a bracket. It even includes an (inaccurate) level.  Still I'd trade the level for two pins.  It didn't affect installation though, since screws hold it at any angle, so not a tragedy, just odd.

Great mounting solution at a great price. However don't forget to really check your stud spacing before buying. As per the usual these rely on 16" stud spacing to screw into the walls with. This is the standard. However my walls had 24" stud spacing. The solution was to get a piece of ply that could span the 24" stud distance, screw the mount to that and then mount the ply to the wall. This worked out fine for me, and may have to be your solution as well if your studs are not the standard 16" distance.And no, you cannot use drywall anchors, unless you want the TV to eventually rip off the walls.
Was easy to install,using a stud finder and my 20v Dewalt  impact driver helped a bunch tooadded a 46" TV to my bedroom took 15 mins. These things come with

While this was a great deal and the product is made of high quality materials, I unfortunately can't use this TV mount.  As this mount must be mounted directly into studs, you are limited to 16 inches and this item then has no room to adjust the centering position of the TV when mounted on the wall.  Lining this mount up to the studs on the wall does not allow the TV to be centered on my wall due to where the studs are inside my wall.  I would suggest finding a TV wall mount that is 20+ inches wide or wider, so you can adjust centering of where the TV ends up.  This Mount Does offer an extension kit to make that happen, but it's almost the same cost as the original mount.

Super easy install, took maybe 30 minutes. Read through instructions before starting so you have an idea of what everything is. Bought a cheapo stud finder to make placement a bit more accurate although the knock method works too. TV is super snug and I have no worries about it. A must have that's cheaper and built better than most in store models. Recommended 100%.

From unbox to finished install took all of 30 minutes. The instructions are mostly unnecessary, but fairly clear. Took me longer to find 2 studs than it did to install and mount the TV.Decent range of motion, could use a little bit more, but I'm more than happy with it. Seems to include various screw sizes for various TV's. I still had mine in the back of the TV but if you lost them, it should have some for you.

Good product...made with steel and bent to keep it rigid and lighter.  I needed this product to tilt due to plug in behind the TV and possible glare.  The other product tilts more but will hit the wall along the lower edge of the TV and it did not have HDMI cable.

I've mounted quite a few TVs in my day and I must say that these mounting dream mounts are the best!  They supply you with plenty of hardware to meet any given situation.  The mount is great quality.  I love the strings at the bottom that make it a breeze to remove and replace the TV.  And you definitely can't beat the price for what you're getting.  If you are looking for a mount, look no further and just get a Mounting Dream mount!

Very sturdy and inexpensive. The 10 degree tilt down is limited. It works great for a TV at eye level to cut down on a bit of reflection but wasn't enough to direct a TV hung above the fireplace down to couch level. Additionally with the TV so flush to the wall it was hard to hang. Still a good value and if it works for your situation a good piece of equipment.

For the price, this was great. Even came with a level. Hardest part was having to use a stud finder on the wall, but once that was done this was fairly simple to put on the wall. Even simpler to put the TV on the mount. And there she sits!

Well made. Easy to install. Will mount to various stud spacing. Very secure. Used in basement for a 55” LG LCD tv and works perfectly. Can not turn Or adjust for far left/right viewing but works great for my basement application. Would buy again.

This thing came with every possible screw or bolt or spacer you could ever need.  Nice to see a company dedicated to service like this.  Easy install, had the TV mounted in no time.  The new HDMI cord was also a really nice touch!

Exactly what I needed! Easy setup, solid instructions, and it includes a magnetic level and an HDMI cord. Feel very good about the strength on the wall (it is rated up to 132lbs! Tightening the screws is a little laborous, but that maybe because I didn't predrill my holes large enough. Make sure you you have studs and drywall, because this isn't meant to hold in lath and plaster walls, unless you are positive where your studs are (stud finder won't work on a lath wall). 10/10 would recommend!

Not sure why this item is so highly rated. I opened the box only the find that the holes where the wall mount pieces join don’t match, so the included screws won’t hold them together (once the screws are in you can literally pull it apart by hand).Unfortunately for me I’m beyond the return window. Still, I recommend that anyone looking for a TV mount look elsewhere.

It's weird the way they put this hanger together. Does it hang a TV on the wall? Yes. Does it not fit together all the way if you choose maximum tilt? Also yes.I wanted it tilted downwards at the maximum level, but you have to take it off the wall to adjust it, and then when you put it back, the bottom clips don't fit in.

I was hesitant because of how cheaply priced it was compared to those at Best Buys, but BOY was I wrong. Super easy to install, easy directions, and now my 2 TV's look great!! Both 2 separate mounts, and money well spent on this product! The only thing that you'll likely need that is not in the package is a 7/32 drill bit from Home Depot. Cost me an extra $2 dollars for the drill bit, but overall 5 Stars!! Couldn't be happier.

I installed this on a drywall and wanted to mount the bracet on 3 studs. Though they give 6 pretty big screws and a bubble level, it is better if you have your own of these things. The package comes with a bunch of spacers and different screws, pretty much works with all the TVs.

I like the tv mount. It is super easy to install especially when you have a kids, having this mount alleviate any hazards. The downside I don’t like is that my cable are still hanging in the wall that looks a bit ugly. I wish there come with cable cover for better management. Other than that its worth to buy.

The mounting plate is easy to install. The clearance is everything you would expect from this type of wall mount! I will definitely recommend these wall mounts from this manufacturer to my friends and family when they go to purchase one.

Easiest rack to mount.  Wish for more tilt and position options but this is what it is.  Actually replaced a rack that has the pull away from wall, large degree tilt option.  That rack just was just not strong enough torsionally to hold a larger TV stable.  I'm sure there are much pricier racks that are stronger but this works fine for our needs

This is easy to install on the wall, but we had a 70" tv and was kind of hard to get the wires hooked up once installed.  Definitely takes 2 people to hang the bigger TV, but once installed works great.  Don't expect much clearance between the wall and the TV though.  You get tilt range of motion, but no side to side (which is kind of to be expected with this type of TV mount.  Can't beat the price or the ease of instructions.  They even have a youtube video to follow step by step.

This worked great to mount our TV on our fireplace. The fireplace is stone so I had to purchase mason screws and a mason drill bit. Once that was done I bolted the mount to the stone, screwed the brace to the back of the TV and hung the TV with ease. The bottom of the TV brace is secured with a spring loaded hook that latches to the bottom of the mount. Simple solution.

Worked like a charm, easy as could be to install if you have a drill and a stud finder, I had to do the ol drill a bunch a holes to find the stud after knocking didn’t pan out to great. After I found the stud it was easy peasy lemon squeezy. I have these for every tv in the house because they are a good price and easy to install..

VERY easy to install and a great product. Comes with cables, brackets for TV, bracket for the wall, and all screws you need. This is inexpensive and can hold up to a 70" TV. Get a studfinder, drill with a philips bit, or a socket set if needed. Not a bad install compared to other mounts.
Super easy to install. Does the required job.My only complain is it would be great if it could lock in position, with little force it slides sideways.

Great product.  Excellent installation instructions.  Enough hardware included to mount any TV imaginable.  Multiple screw sizes and spacers.  One downside, the straps for the release catches is too short for my 75" TV.

Well made excellent tv mount. I got 2 and they hold up both my 43 in and 50 in tv's well! Also SO easy to install!! Unlike a few other mounts, this one you can do with 1 person. (Very helpful, especially during corona). Overall very happy.

The connection arms are way longer than they need to be so on a 32" LCD they are almost visible extruding past the top or bottom.  Good otherwise easy to install and when attached to the wall studs works like a charm - easy

This wall mount is nice and sturdy. It comes with the best setup of hardware I've ever seen.  All of the screws, washers, level, etc. are in individual labeled pouches! How cool is that!!  All I needed was a drill, drill bit, and philips head screwdriver. This was so easy to install.  The only issue I had with this mount was the method for adjusting the angle. After I installed my 55" 89LB TV  I couldn't access the allen wrench screws to adjust the angle. I have to take my TV off the mount to adjust the angle, and since it's 89lbs I won't be taking it off.  If you want an angle,  make your adjustments first.

Just like editing the registry in windows, install this yourself at your own risk!I installed these myself (bought 2), have had no issues in the two years they’ve been in use. Sturdy, fits cleanly behind the tv, just does its damn job. Love it. We used these on two 50” Sharp 4K Roku TVs that we’re a Best Buy doorbuster 2 Black is Fridays ago.
I had to send this back because although it said it fit all 65 inch TVs the mounting brackets that go on the back of the TV are too short for the pre-drilled holes. Be sure to measure before ordering

It was incredibly difficult to install. I had to have two people to help me figure out the instructions and then to mount it evenly on the wall (still a little crooked though but meh). However, it is holding up my tv well. Once you do it once it's easier the second time around. I like how it came with a level as well.

Great mount for the price, seriously! I was shopping around for different mounts, most starting close to $80 or they seemed cheap. This one was the perfect price and is very sturdy. I could easily dangle from it (having mounted it using studs) and I am more than confident that it's not going anywhere. It doesn't rotate, and it can only tilt just a bit using a couple screws. If you aren't needing a mount that has rotation or quite a bit of tilt, you just found it.

It was very easy to install on my wall using the studs. The best part of it is when you putting TV on the mount. Basically, my son and I pick up the TV and just put in on the slides. It's also easy to remove the TV.

My second one. I bought the first for the television in my guest bedroom. It was so easy to install and looks so good on the wall, I bought this second one for my room. I did go to the expense of having the electrical and cable outlets relocated, but it was well worth it. I am very pleased having my television on the wall opposite the bed. It makes for easy night time viewing before falling asleep.

It is what it is. For the price you cant be too mad. The left side spring loaded latching device is too wide, or the frame in which it sits too narrow, preventing it from reaching its full range of travel and locking onto the frame.

Strong mount. Holding my 60in tv without issues. The pull tabs on the back have a nylon strip that you pull to open the bottom of the bracket to mount the tv. They are a pain in the butt to reach when the tv is on the wall because the offset if not very far from the wall. Had to hide the strips when the tv is up.

I had it put together by the BF. When I opened the box it was scary the number of parts. So many screws but fear not, you will not need all the screws. You will only need a few for your tv. Worked great, tv is up and looks great.

I purchased this wall mount because of it's close distance between the TV and wall. For my application it was perfect: TV in a built-in wall cabinet with hinged doors. I have plenty of clearance to open and close the doors with the ability to allow the TV to tilt slightly down-ward. I was initially skeptical of the two-piece bracket, but after constructing it, the bracket felt very firm. Attaching the mount to the back of the TV was painless. The addition of an HDMI cable and level were nice, but not necessary in my application. I would give this wall mount 5 stars if the tilting mechanism was easier to access, but this seems to be a typical issue with low-cost TV mounts. One other nit-pick, the quick-release pulls show below the TV, but this can easily be remedied with two piece of tape.  For the price-point, I will be buying additional Mounting Dream wall mounts for additional TVs in our home.

For such an inexpensive wall mount I am pleasantly surprised and how stable it is! We have a 55” tv and needed to use the wider spacers to allow it to tilt down, but that was a TV issue, not the mount. The mount itself is extremely light and I was able to hold it up, make sure it was level, mark it all up and drill all by myself. Doesn’t feel cheap at all.

Had my tech from work come install it and hang the TV (he’s hung several TVs for me over the years) he said this one had a lot of parts and wasn’t the easiest one he’s had to assemble- it took him a little linger but he finally got it

Awesome product.  I have a 55 inch sharp that i used with this wall mount.  Fit perfect to TV and holds to the wall studs with heavy duty lag screws.  Only issue i had with this item was since it is a slim wall mount and my TV being 55 in, was a little bit of a task getting my hands to the back of the tv to connect wires or pull the safety latches to remove/mount tv from the mount, didnt think about that before i bought it.  But i do like that it doesnt stick out that far from wall, witch was my ultimate goal.  Little bit of enginuity will do the trick or just have smaller hands.

A bit cumbersome to install. But holds our tv well. A small level is provided, but you may want a bigger one. I needed to bring in an extra set of hands. Would suggest hooking up all your components before hanging tv on the wall... not a lot of space to fit your hands back there.

Big box stores charge so much for these little brackets... and there’s zero difference in quality or functionality. This one is perfect when all you need is a slight tilt - we hung this in a bedroom. Done and done!
The easiest to assemble tv wall mount in the world.  Put together and hung in less than 20 minutes.  The price was too good to be true and I wish I had found it prior to the over priced wall mounts.

So I waited a while to do a review but to be honest I've never hung a tv. I built up some confidence and with some help managed to get it in the wall and my tv in the air. It seemed so simple and so overwhelming. I advise you read and reread everything. The instructions aren't step by step it's more of here's this diagram and figure it out. You'll have tons of left over screws, washers and spacers. The seller got the product to me fast but the process of putting this thing up is time consuming. I wish anyone that buys this the best of luck and loads of patience.

Works well and easy to install.  Would give it 5 stars but couldn't center it because of stud placement and the width of th bracket. We had it centered between 2 windows and there was a stud centered behind it. Didn't reach the length of the 16 inch studs for us to attach it on either side. Had to cut out dry wall and replace it with 3/4 inch plywood.  Couldn't find a mount that would extend this distance.  Seems to be a common problem for others as we researched.  Need to know the distance of your studs and where you are placing it.Be prepared for a project! We did make it work and it looks great. It is holding our giant heavy plasma well so far.

Best mount I have ever used! High quality , great assembly instructions with each screw, bolt , nut, metal arms numbered according to assembly instructions and individually in plastic pouches with extra sizes if yours is a little out if normal. Don’t but anywhere else when looking for wall mounts! No plastic parts all heavy gauge metal!

I have a 65 inch tv hanging on my wall with this mount and it is very sturdy.  Not the most versatile in terms of angles etc but if you just need a low profile mount it is hard to beat this and the price is great.  Would recommend

My neighbor installed it for me because i had no idea how.  He did use stronger and bigger nails and screws, with that it set up perfectly for my 50 inch LG TV. This is definitely at least a 2 people job and make sure you know what you’re doing so you don’t drop your TV.

This is one of the most underpriced mounts ever made. I used it for a 55" 45-pound TV and it holds like a dream (no pun intended). It comes with enough screws, washers and spacers to ensure that it's almost impossible for a TV NOT to fit and the added HDMI cable and level are a huge bonus. I can't recommend this mount enough. Skip the $100 mounts at BestBuy that are half this one's quality and trust me on this.
Didn't work for my TV, and they didn't supply the correct screws or spacers that I would need.  They did include a lot of parts, but for my TV, it just wouldn't work.  Seemed to be heavy duty though.

It was easy to install, and works well on our fireplace.However, I wish I got one that tilted side by side and not just up and down. I can only adjust the vertical angle, and cannot turn it to see it from the next room.

Excellent quality wall mount. Was very easy to set up, especially with a level included. Instructions are clear and easy to understand. Mounted our 40" LG on our wall. We have non standard 19" wall studs so this was a perfect kit. Very heavy duty. Loved that it comes with a braided HDMI cable and a flush adapter, other kits don't include them and so that would of been an additional cost. Excellent value priced mount compared to others, would highly recommend.

Good sturdy flat tv mount.  Mounted a 42 inch tv up against the wall.  Only thing I wasn’t thrilled about were the two straps that hang down from the mount to release the TV.  It almost invites little hands to pull on and release the tv from the mount. It still won’t fall as it needs to be lifted up but still wish for a better design.
Directions were clear.  Probably took me 20 minutes at most to install.  Didn’t run into any problems at all.  Installed on 2 - 50” Vizio flat screens.

Good range of motion and easy install. Bottom clips can pop off with very little force. Not a good solution for heavier tv, especially if you have little ones in the house that the TV could fall onto.

Definitely liked the price of this TV mount.  Installation was a breeze! The wall bracket was perfect for the studs in my wall. Even better that I was able to slide the TV with this mount to center it on the wall. (the studs in my wall did not allow the wall mount to be perfectly centered.) Worked perfectly with a 2017 Samsung 40in 6 series.

I’m not a total stranger to DIYs but this was simple to install and seems very sturdy. I gave it a good tug to ensure its integrity before mounting my 35 lb, 50 inch tv. You will need a drill bit and socket wrench which are not included, and a second person to lift the tv in place.

Check the specs, you may need to buy drill bit pieces for this installation, but once you have everything it was pretty easy to install.  My TV is mounted pretty high over the chimney so I like that it angles down.  Also came with little velcro cable to organize your TV cords, a level, and I think even an HDMI cord if I remember correctly!  Super nice for the price :)

I am using this as a wall mount for a 4 inch LED television. It is relatively easy To install and allows a kilt down word which was exactly why I purchased it. It is very sturdy and acceptable. Reasonably priced

This worked for our application of hanging our 55" tv.  We didn't want it to protrude from the wall too much and we didn't require it to swivel.  We just needed it to slightly tilt down.  Good price for a sturdy tv wall mount.

I mounted a 49" LG hdtv and it worked great. It is easy to place on the wall mount  and easy to remove if you need to. Though you need to remove it from the wall mount if you want to change the angle of degrees of tilt. Well made, easy to Mount, great directions, great buy

Very nice and easy to install a mounting bracket. I like that they have extra pieces to match any TV, mine is 55" Samsung. Took me almost 15 min, just you have to find the studs in your wall. Also, the distance between the wall and the TV is minimal. looks great.

ONE great feature that sets this one apart from others is the screws to level it AFTER It HAS BEEN INSTALLED.  that is a great feature  I have not seen on any others.  This is the second one I've ordered.

This is second one I have purchased.  Very good quality and very strong.  Large back bracket makes it very versatile and easy to find studs. Used on a heavy 35" Visio (older LCD model) and a 2016 55" Samsung UHD LED Smart TV (model UN55KU6290FXZA). Allowed Visio to be tilted down perfectly in bedroom and allowed flat (close) install of Samsung on playroom wall.

Works great. Looks like it is attached directly to the wall. I like the release straps too as many of the close-to-wall fixed mounts are near impossible to unlatch. It worked great for my 70 inch with 400x400 VESA TV. I've found Mounting Dream and Mount-It to have quality product lines at decent prices.

Worked well but it really is the limit of this mount. I have a 55" and lucky for me the studs in the wall were just perfect because with the 55" there is no left -right adjustment. If the studs were off at all I would have had to send it back.

This is a great mount. Super easy to assemble, clear instructions, and mounts very solidly to any studwall with the included hardware. They even included a level in the package to make sure you get it right. The tilt functionality works well too. If you need a good basic TV mount, this is it.

Fantastic TV mount. I've used others in the past, and this one is leagues better... and comes with everything! Even an HDMI cable. Once the wall plate is mounted you literally click on the TV in seconds and adjust from there. Adjustability virtically as well as horizontally is really good.Grab a recessed wall power outlet box and you've got an extremely inexpensive combo that's better then mounts I've used that were twice the price.

It's a breeze to install if one has a stud finder.  Included are many different machine screws and spacers for a variety of TVs.  Make sure you extend the lower locking straps to their full length before hanging the TV if you're going to install at the full angle.

Ordered the new version; recieved the old version - so I couldn't mount our TV to 3 studs, only 2. Mounting to 3 studs was the only reason I purchased this particular one, so we returned it. Very frustrated.

This mount works perfectly for our 65 inch tv. My only complaint is that while installing it, it was not easy to get installed straight the 1st time. Other than that is works awesome at holding large TVs!If you found this review helpful please click below. 😁

TV mount was great for what I need it. My only issue is either the bracket to small or my wall didn't have enough 2x4 so I had to find another spot, so I'll leave it on that but since I was able to find another good spot. One thing that I really like was the pull string lock pins instead of having to screw or unscrew them like other tv wall mounts in case you need to bring down the tv for any reason. So in all I'll give this a 5 of 5 stars and would highly recommend.

You won't find a simple, easier to install mounting frame for the money!  Purchased 3 and the instructions and hardware made these easy to install and to mount my flat screen televisions.  Very happy with this purchase.

I was actually very pleasantly surprised at 1. how easy this was to put together and 2. how easy it was to mount my TV to it. 55" TV and had no issues using the included hardware. Very strong and sturdy mount.I didn't use the included level and hdmi cable.

My husband installed this mount in my daughters room. The mount came with a magnet level perfect for a one person job. We also love the handy lock-in pulls to easily attached tv.  Nice HDMI cable included as well. 5 stars!
I used the hardware provided and my brand new TV got cracked.

Truly a great product. Next time I buy a new tv I will be buying one of these too. The customer service for the brand is amazing. I needed to check if the mount fit my tv so I sent an email; I received a response back within the day that had no only the answers but also the installation drawing. Two thumbs up!

What started out terrible was VERY QUICKLY resolved by Mounting Dream’s email customer service team. I received what I can only assume was an already opened previously returned package that was missing bracket screws, the advertised level, and lag screws.However, I had what I needed to connect the hooks to the TV and their customer service emailed back within 30 minutes that new wall mount equipment was on the way.

The tv is mounted and hasn’t fallen yet so that is pretty good in my book. Haven't figured out how it tilts yet, but Hat hasn’t impacted my life as drastically as one might guess. I would 100% suggest/remind any buyers to pull in their power cord to their tv prior to mounting it. Very difficult to plug it in probs because I can’t figure out how to tilt the dang thing. I broke out in a little sweat but felt v accomplished after I plugged it in the back of the tv.
The quality is there and it was super easy to install. It was nice to have the hdmi and cable ties.  I’m the least handy person I know and I was able to mount the tv so If I can do it anyone can.

Great mount simple and effective. Fits very tight to wall for a clean look. Hardly see and cables or brackets once mounted. Had all the proper hardware in the box ready to go. I mounted to studs only, if I were to hange from drywall (do not recommend) I would purchase different drywall anchors. The slotted holes didn't line up with my studs so I just drilled new holes in bracket, easy adjustment for me since I had the proper tools. Great mount at a great price!

Not as much functionality in this mount as in Mounting Dreams full range of motion iteration. I have both and highly value the ability to rotate the screen one way or another. This mount is stationary and only rotates a small degree in the vertical plane to minimize glare.

Finally put this up over our fireplace versus the full motion one we had. One complaint is the bracket in the middle limited if we were able to use it due to the outlet placement. Overall great mount.

I never understand why people pay bestbuy or other electronic companies $400+ dollars to mount their tv (unless they want to hide there cables) when it can be done on your own for less than $50 if you have a few tools; a power drill, socket wrench and drill bits. No mount is more superior then another, its just a piece of metal with holes in it, that mount against studs in the wall, that attaches to the back of your tv.... thats it!! My 10 year old nephew found this 30 minute task very simple. Do yourself a favor and avoid Bestbuy and just buy a off brand mount and do it yourself.

I liked everything about this mount, the instructions the ease of installation the included level. The quick release levers at the bottom of the mount for easy removal of your television. The last man that I purchased seven or eight years ago from Best buy was the better part of $100 and this is by far equal quality.

It's a cheap TV stand but it does the job very easily. All the bolts and screws are well labeled and the included level was a must when trying to get it just right. Most flat screen TV sets are light and this will do the job for much less than what you'll find in A/V stores.

I cant believe i found a tv wall mount for this cheap that’s great quality! My best friend came over and mounter for me in about 30 minutes cause I wouldn’t have known what to do. But he did it quick and easy. Definitely recommending purchasing this

This was surprisingly easy to setup and install.  I had never done one before and I bought this based on reviews.  I am very pleased.  The cable ties are an added bonus.  If I had to mount another TV, I would absolutely buy this one again.  It only tilts up and down though, so if you need one that also goes side to side, I don't think this one is it.

I had went to Costco to orginally purchase one but didn't want to spend $80. I ended up checking Amazon and the reviews on this product were amazing! It was pretty easy to install! The directions were kind of difficult, but that's because I do better with words than pictures. Love it! It looks great on the wall!

I had a great experience when I bought the older version of this mount a year or two ago and I KNEW I had to purchase a mount from this company again because it's much more heavy duty and higher quality than the ones with the same price range at BestBuy, Target, Walmart, etc. SOLID. HEAVY DUTY. Will DEFINITELY get the job done and will not let you worry about it falling.

Super solid mount. It was easy to install and is rock solid. It’s always a plus when it comes with an hdmi and a level to help install it. For the price you can’t beat this mount. We mounted our 65” Visio with zero problems.

Mounted my Sony 65” tv to this with ease. The straps are more than hidden behind it, but remain easily accessible. The whole system works flawlessly and everything came well-built. Slightly bummed it didn’t come with drywall anchors, but I was able to use studs

Out of 8 screw holes on the two piece wall mount bracket that supposed to be put together, 2 have no thread or not threaded the right way. I have to buy new screws and tap the 2 screw holes to make it work.
Over all a good price for a mount that tilts up and down. The box included a bunch of goodies... All different types of screws for different TV’s as well as an HDMI cable. Overall a good buy.

Excellent stand. Easy to set up- comes with all hardware including a bubble level with good instructions.Update: the supplied level is useless. My 55” set is slightly tilted and the only way to fix is to remove the mounting screws and redo installation. Missing is a tilt adjustment. I have removed one star for this. Make sure you get a proper bubble level prior to drilling holes.

Really pleased with this purchase. Everything needed (other than hand tools) is included, even included a 6" level and a new HDMI cord. Easy to assemble and install. Very well designed kit with a safety lock system to make hanging the TV easy and to ensure it can't come off the wall. Complete set of hardware to adapt the mount to any flat panel TV. The tilt option is great as I mount in a bedroom and the tilt gives a great picture lying in bed. For $28 bucks you can't go wrong on this one. 5+ stars in my book. Bob/ATL
Fairly easy installation took less than a half hour and I had my tv mounted on the wall. Seems like a solid product, installation instructions were clear, would definitely recommend.

Got a new TV for the holidays and needed a larger mount.  This was was listed under Amazon Choice at its price point.  It was easy to install and went up in under 15 mins.  I would buy again if I got another large tv

This mount was an easy install. I bought and installed it as a mother's day gift. I expected it to be much more complicated, but I was surprised when I finished in 15 minutes! It's functional and is very easy to mount and unmount the tv. The added leveler and HDMI cord was a nice addition too!

Love this!! Needed a reasonably priced TV mount for my guest room.. Now the furniture has some extra space and it looks FANTASTIC on the wall. Very easy installation it came with everything but the screwdriver!!

Most mounts cost over $100. So, I found this mount for 70in TVs at a very affordable price and decided to purchase it. I had a professional put together and install into the wall and mount my TV, but it seemed pretty easy to do yourself. It definitely works for 70in TVS! Great buy!
It is a good mount for the price.  The confusing part in the install is the extra parts.  We installed it using only few of them and discarded the rest.  Hope it will stay mounted for long :(

Great product. The flexibility to choose how far from the wall the tv can be mounted is a great feature. The only one thing I suggest to be improved is the screw that is used for tilting position is very soft and damaged easily. Over all a great product and it does what it is supposed to do

I am a small woman, only 5 feet 6 inches and I completely installed and mounted my 65 inch tv myself, granted I am stronger than the average woman, but it was surprisingly quick and easy to install. It was a little confusing with all the extra pieces but it was nice of them because they are acknowledging that all tv's aren't the same, it was also nice of them to include free "gifts." A great value!
This thing is exactly as described. Took about 15 minutes to install. Highly recommended!

I have wanted to mount my TV for a long time but have always been nervous that I'd buy the wrong thing. This product was easy to select according to the needs of my specific TV and I got it mounted in less than 30 minutes.

This is a solid and decently priced tv wall mount. However, my Roku tv can only be attached when it is tilted due to the middle metal plaque on the actual mount. May not work with some TVs if the mounting holes are narrow
Easy to install.  Wanted a slimmer (close to the wall) mount, and this fit the bill perfectly.So far (3 months) it’s stable and we’ve had no problems.  Came with many screws for different TV’s.

Easy to install. Used drywall toggle bolts because stud spacing on non-load bearing wall is not aligned with the mounting bracket. Not a big deal though and it's still very sturdy. One person install.
Easy install  very low profileIf u need the tv mounted but you don’t need it moving this is the mount for you

This came with all the needed hardware, but took a bit of assembly that was frustrating. It is made of light metal, likely a low grade steel, but our 65" TV has been hanging for a couple of months with no problems. Certainly a cheaper option than what is available in stores.

This does not move from side to side, which is fine. We weren't looking for that. We just wanted the tv up and out of the way. And this does that perfectly. It is very secure. And was very easy to install.

I didnt want to spend an insane amount on a mount at a regular cause if you know, you know for bigger tvs they run pretty expensive. This was Easy to install. Came with everything you need minus the tools of course, just used a drill but came with a leveler and a hdmi cable which was cool. Holds our 58” just fine in our apartment.

I purchased this TV mount 'USED' for my brother's 44" tv for his bedroom and it was the best decision I ever made. Absolutely worth purchasing and I plan to purchase another when I purchase my TV for my room :)

A perfectly adequate mount. Allows you to hit 2 studs that are 16" spaced.NOTE: Before buying this, check the connection jacks on the back of the TV/monitor you are hanging - this mount will leave very little space between wall and TV. Make sure there is enough clearance for power cables, HDMI cables, etc to be plugged in.

Works excellent for our 40" RCA flat screen!  I didn't want any tilt, and wasn't sure if this was capable of that, but it is!!  No concerns for it sliding off the rails as some mounts seem to, as it has built in stops on both sides.  The only possible issue is that it does still slide side to side, so if it is within children's reach, or anyone's really, it could be bumped, and move...we fixed this by cutting pencils to size, and put those along the track behind the tv.  Lovely mount!!
Holds a 70 inch tv with ease. Most difficult part was ensuring stud location but that had no bearing on design which was well done. Loved the hook and latch hanging design.

I am a professional TV installer. The mounting dream is a decent wall mount. The only problem being is, that it does not include enough of a variety of bolts to attach the mount to some brands of televisions. There have been several times that I've had to look elsewhere to match whats needed for some televisions.
Excellent product but didnt fit the size of the TV on the back of it. Had to return but great deal! Make sure to measure the holes on the back for the proper measurements.

Great wall mount.Everything was in the box that I needed to securely anchor this to the wall. Secure and safe. Took less than an hour start to finish. I did need help with our 50 in tv due to size and weight otherwise its a 1 person job.

Super easy to install. Strongly recommend. The vertical brackets were mislabeled but I realized this before mounting it. The holes to tighten the angle are nearly impossible to reach if you have a 50” tv. Other than that, I’m very happy with this mount.

Was able to install this pretty quickly. Love how all the parts are separated and labeled. Made the install a breeze. Did not use the included level though. It seemed to be a liitle off. Seems to be very sturdy with my 65” TV mounted on it. Also was easy to take the TV off so that I could install a sound bar mount a week after initially mounting it. Very solid product for the money.

First off, I would absolutely buy this again. The frame is sturdy, mounts are great. It fit our 32" really well, and the quick latch system is super easy to use. I'm only giving it three stars because of the cheap lug screws and the misinformed directions.The instructions say to use a 5/32 to pilot the mounting holes. Not a chance. Far too small, especially considering that the screws are so cheap. Because they are cheap, when using a socket wrench to install, it stripped them within 3 turns.
I got this for my daughter. I decorated her home for her 30th birthday and everything turned out great. I was surprised this item came with everything I needed. Loved the product!

Great design allowing someone the ability to remove the tv off the wall easily. It is very easy to install and keeps the tv a lot closer to the wall than other mounts while still having enough room to hide your gaming console or tv provider’s box behind it by using command strips.

Given the price, I was a tad skeptical of this at first, but the reviews convinced me. I’m glad I got this because it’s every bit as good as expected! It holds my old plasma TV (which is quite heavy) in my bedroom. For what I need it to do, it was worth every penny.

Super easy install on the wall. Easy to install on the TV and get the TV mounted. Sits close to the wall but still has enough space to mount a couple boxes behind it, like streaming devices. Tilt and lift off work awesome.

I purchased this item to mount a TV in our bedroom and didn't want any chance for it to tip over.  The mounting was relatively straight forward and only had a couple small problems performing it but otherwise seems very secure to mount.
It was perfect for our 50" screen. We have other mounts that stick far from the wall and turn, but for our garage we really need the tv snug against the wall. Very easy install and it is secure.

Very nice, mounted the TV, but it took 2 hours... really? Maybe I was having an off day, cause I’m good at house projects, but man... It was mostly my fault for not realizing the studs were off center, so I had to attach some 2x4’s to the studs to mount this to the wall securely, but still. Lots of tweaking... not intuitive at all. But yeah, it holds our big ole TV, and I’m not afraid it’s going to fall, so, great!

I bought this mount for a 32” tv but the arms are too long, I had to cut them so they would not protrude over or under the tv. If your tv is bigger that that I don’t think you will have an issue. I did like that it included all necessary hardware to mount. Like I said for anything bigger than a 32” it’s a great item

It does hold the TV to the wall securely. But if you have outlets high on the wall where the TV sits, it doesn't leave room for the plug to go into the outlet behind the TV.  We made this one work in our bedroom, but had to buy a swivel mount for our living room TV.

Simple to install, and looks great holding my 55inch tv on the wall.  Only issue I ran into was my power cable stuck out too much, but this kit had longer bolts and spacers so I could make the room I needed the 2nd time!

You can not beat the price and quality.  Granted it bas only been a couple of hours but so fat I must day I love it!  I will update at the end of the month.  If all is well I will update with 5 stars.

The main thing that attracted me to this TV mount was the easy attach and remove methods to the wall mount, however, i had the most difficult time attaching this mount to my wall. First, i was not aware that i would have to buy a drill but attachment for my power-driver, once i completed that and attempted to attach this mount to my wall, two of the screws for the mount stripped and i had to go out and buy a hex driver to remove them from the wall, and 4 new hex head screws to replace and the ones that came with this mount. I like the design of this mount and how easily hidden it is behind my tv, but the screws and hardware that came with it are cheap and un-usable, and i ended up spending a total of abt $25 extra to even be able to hang this on my wall

Was able to put it all together and hang the tv up in about a hour. The hardest part was finding where and what height I wanted the tv to be. But the way the mount is set up taking it off and putting it back on the wall is so convenient.

I honestly returned the item because we changed our remodel at our home, and did not require the mounts.  If we decide to eventually do the TV mounts we most definitely would purchase this model again. Thank you
It's very easy to mount if you have the right tools, it comes with everything it needs to be mounted, but you also need a stud finder, and a socket wrench to tighten up the bolts with ease.
Great mount. Easy to install and holds my TV up perfectly. Instructions were good and package came with all screws/bolts/spacers. Not flush to the wall but I knew that going in. Will buy again!

Had 2 Samsung 48 led tvs from moving from old house to new. They were never wall mounted so I bought two in case I could mount as the new house was prewired over the fire place and in the garage. Luckily for me when my satellite tv installer showed up for my install, he actually only lives a few miles up the street and was so nice he installed both brackets and hung both tvs then hid all boxes and wires behind tvs. Looks fantastic and should last for years

My bf who is a fix-it guy installed it and says it was super easy. He said even I could do it (im not mechanically inclined). The guide was very straight forward. We had to move it once and it wasnot difficult to reinstall.

These mounts are perfect and are very easy to install.  I purchased two, one for a 55" 4K Smart TV and one for a 32" flat screen and they work great for both.  The HDMI cables that came with the mounts are great.... We can only use a satellite service in our area and we have DirecTV and have ZERO issues with these cables.  I even bought other cables of the same brand to use as my connectors from my devices to my outlets and those cables came with angle adapters that you could use so that your cables lie flat behind your wall mounted TV.

As others have noted, I'll chime in here.  My power outlet is recessed in the wall but is dead center where this mount has to go.  The center plate that holds the two brackets together covers the outlet, thereby making it useless.  Item returned.

Running this mount on a 50" 4k.  Surprisingly, the wall mount portion came in two pieces, a left side and a right side.  I was skeptical on this design, but it works great.  Very sturdy.  Its non adjustable tilt means you are going to have to get the right height / angle on your wall, however.

Mount comes with a multitude of hardware options for ANY TV.  It even comes with a level and an HDMI cable. Extremely easy to install.  I got the first one for my 82" QLED and then a second one for an older (and heavier) 55" 1080p model.  Very versatile mounting scheme allows for any stud spacing and you just lift hook and click, you're done!  I don't write many reviews but this product deserves praise.

I bought this mount for a 55in Vizio smart TV for my mom. Set up was pretty easy. The mount itself came in two pieces which you attach together. I then use a stud finder to locate and pre-drilled holes onto the wall. I use the balance that came with the mount to make sure the mount would be straight and balanced. Next was just screwing the screws into the wall with the mount. We put the TV on and it was rock solid.

Super easy to hang my 40" Flat Panel TV . Had all possible bolts, spacers to hang any TV. Saved all the additional hardware in the event I swap out to a different TV in the future. Just used drywall to hang my TV as it only weighs about 20 lbs. Included laq bolts were over kill for my application.

Measure the back of your tv first to verify The width where to screw in the hook brackets.  For our 47inch my husband had to saw the wall mount in half to to give enough width apart and be able to hook the tv to the wall mount.
The mount is sturdy, it comes with a great install kit that included a level and even a guide to know where to put the holes. Holds my 65 inch tv well. Recommended!

This was so easy to install... Especially thanks to the kit they provide. All types of screws, spacers and washers... I just had to pick the ones for my Samsung 55" 2013 model TV.They even provide a magnetic level.
Great product and did the job I bought it for, was also to use, assemble....and the price was fair and it came ontime.  What else can I say, I recommend this for anyone to use .

I hate to write a review like this, but there is absolutely no way I would hang my 65” with this mount let alone anything bigger. It might work well for smaller TVs but for me..no way! It’s flimsy, thin metal and straps.

Installs easy and gave me just the right amount of tilt to get the glare off of my TV in the Garage with it still being slim and close to the wall.  I also like the easy release pull straps instead of a screw that is hard to get to.
I was very apprehensive about installing this unit on my new tv as I did not want it falling off the wall. Directions made it so simple.  Most highly recommend product.

This is a good mount.  I used it to hang a 50" Sceptre TV with no issues.  It had lots of screws included to accomodate lots of different TVs.  I was able to align it with 2 studs and then used toggle bolts for the very end where there was no stud to screw into.  I liked how it had a large area to fit over the wall outlet and a/v jack plate.

Bought this to mount a new 55" Tv in our bedroom. This came with clear instructions and all hardware needed to install. Even includes a level. I love the pull down release at the bottom to quickly remove Tv from mount! Perfect in every way!

Great mounting system. Installed onto concrete block wall, holds my weight (190lbs). I tried to do pull ups :)  Using for 55in TV. Everything needed for installation was installed, although I added couple concrete screws.
In this price range, I was surprised to find a product that was so well made, sturdy, easy to install with clear instructions and dependable. This was a great purchase.

Assmbly is very easy, even comes with additional hardware for different size tv's and a level. Very solid frame, especially for the price. Cons: the level is cheap, use your own. Use the the supplied spacers because if you need to reach behind the tv space is limited. You will need to reach behind the tv to make adjustments to the tilt. I would give 4 1/2 stars.
Rather lightweight for the size of the TV's that it is rated for.  For a large TV investment I would recommend a more substantial wall bracket.  It did function ok though.

It was easy to install. Didn’t like you have to set the tilt position prior to installation. We had to adjust a couple of times. Do you like it is very close to the wall, however it’s difficult if you need to get to the cords to unplug.

Easy to install and worked great for my 42" TV.  Like the tilt action and the release chords at the bottom.  Lost of hardware included however, none included for wood furring strips over Concrete Masonry Units.  I had some 1 1/2" screws from another project used them with washer included and it worked out great.

Perfect for what I needed. I bought 2, one was for my 65" Vizio, one was for my 50" Hisense...I BELIEVE this was the one I used for the 65" Vizio....they were the same brand, but for different sizes. They both worked great and were easy to install.
Was most impressed by customer service.  I had inquired about comparability on a newpurchase.  Representative replied quickly and factually.  He even sent me a photo of how it
All in all a good product at a reduced price compared to big box stores. Figuring out what combo of spacers and hardware would work took some figuring out and reason for 4 stars over 5.

My home, as well as many others, have 16" studs. Our fireplace has a centered stud. Therefore, math says that I need a 32" wall plate so I can mount it to the studs on each side.Sending this one back.

Purchased based off of reviews and cost. Had looked online at other retailers and was a bit skeptical given how cheap this mount is compared to others we considered but so glad we took the chance. Sturdy and well made. Holds our 58” perfectly. Fairly easy to put together (or so my husband told me).

I've purchased and installed 3 of these, and found them to be very easy to install, and secure. I don't think you can get a better mount for the price. I've also got a more expensive Mounting Dream mount for a large tv which allows you to rotate the tv as well. Very pleased with all of them and would highly recommend to anyone!

It works!  The only thing I didn't like was that the TV slides on the rails, only stops at the ends.  I just put a screw into the wall on both sides of the rail and it keeps the TV in the same spot so it doesn't slide when I dust it.For the price, this is so worth it.  Don't spend tons of money on others when this will do what you need.

This wall mount is very sleek and works terrific. My TV is super close to the wall so there is no awkward gap in space. I also feel like it is very secure on the mount and will not fall (phew). I really wanted the TV mounted but I did not want to pay $60-80 for the wall mount at Costco, this mount is perfect.

Bought this long mount because the studs in the section of wall I chose for the tv were not in a place to center the TV. The extra length allowed me to have offset mounting points while still maintaining a centered TV

Quick delivery, Easy assembly, installed by self, single handed, fairly easy to do one person, with 50 inch TV would have been nice to had lift help as TV bulky, but handled it. I placed this above Fireplace, working out well with slanting screen down, comfortable to watch.
I actually had a 32 inch TV so I only used half of it the nice thing is you can use only half and it still works fine. Has a nice tilt for comfortable viewing from my desk.
El producto es de buena calidad, viene con todo para instalar y un cable HDMI bastante largo !Recomiendo

It does a fine job but there is an issue I've ran across after installation. I have my tilt out as far as it can go and then when I went to latch the tv to the wall unit the latch will not latch. The pull down strap to the latch is just fine but the latch needs to be dropped down about another 1/4 of an inch before it will latch. I will probably modify the bottom of the frame so I can latch the tv to the frame. It won't latch even with the tv not attached to the mount. Love the mount. seems to be sturdy and it was easy to put up. The only thing is if you need to tilt it forward like I wanted mine to be it won't latch. straight (flat) it will latch.

Works great. Mounted a 60" lg tv. It was so easy, comes with 4 lag bolts, different size screws to attach the tv to bracket and a level. The only thing you need is a stud finder and tools to put the bolts into the studs. Will buy again when I get a tv to put over the fireplace.

1) no instructions came with this, and it comes with several different screws I had a moment where I was at a loss. So I did watch the recommended video and from there it was pretty simple.2) it seems pretty sturdy!

This mount is as simple as they come. I have zero experience in mounting TVs and this was simple and easy to do. Simple instructions Add the brackets to the back of the TV Drill holes for the wall bracket, attach wall bracket and mount the TV. It took me less than an hour to do.

Because this wall mount does not swivel, and does not have too much space between the unit and the wall, its quite difficult to get your hand to set a cable or AC plug while its mounted.  The release mechanism is also frustrating, as it comes with 2 straps that have to be pulled at the same time for the unit to dismount.  Great if your job is a one and done event.  if there are any occasions where you have to connect wires or cords to the TV, its a hassle.

The description of this wall mount is lying. They say it's can be tilt 10 degrees. But instructions say 8 degrees. Believe me, there is a difference. Other ways it's a good product. But I hate being lied to.

This is my first ever tv mount! It was easy enough to install with the help of my wife. We just bought a new 65" tv and was quoted 150 to 200 for mount plus 200 install. That about matches the price we paid for the tv! Price for this tv mount you cannot beat.Need drill and drill bit. I used 1/2 inch bit and it worked out fine.
This was easy to install very fair price comes with tons of screws for different types of TVs. Fit my 65"LG  perfectly and allows about 6" to move it so if you installed it off center no big deal.

This was really easy to install and came with a level for accuracy. The biggest issue I had was mounting the brackets to the tv so I could hang it and I had to "phone a friend" to figure it out. Overall I am happy though.

Used on a 32-65 inch TVs. I have 4 of these mounts, comes with hdmi cord, wire straps, leveler. Wonderful and easy to install if you have patience and can find a stud without stripping the screw. Our hardest part was not stripping the screw.

This is a great product. No sense in purchasing the high end, expensive TV mount. This is all you need, and for the price it's a great value.I was quickly able to mount my 55 inch Samsung with no issues at all. The mount is sturdy and secure. I've never actually done this before so I was surprised at how easy it was. I especially loved the magnetic level that came with the install kit.

This was not an easy install, especially with the screws that are included. Either too big or too small or wouldn’t latch to my wall.. thankfully I had other options at home that for well. Other than that, it is a two man job. Great for what is needed and price worked swell as well.
I highly recommend this wall bracket if you are needing one. It is just as good as all the expensive brand you would buy from Best Buy for a fraction of the price!

Not much needs to be said, but it's a pretty standard wall mount for LED TVs. We put a 70 inch TV on the wall with this. TV weighs about 55 lbs, but it seems to be holding onto the wall without any problems.

This has to be one of thebest wall mount package i ever came across. Not only you get the braket and so many different screw , they give you a level, HDMI cable , wire strap, for the price you cant go wrong. compare to what they want for them this is made just aS GOOD AS ANY!!!! Graet product good job packaging, you are awesome

I’ve owned a few of these tv mounts (from mounting dream) over the years, and it doesn’t matter if it’s the stationary or the ones that move around, they are solid. It is easy to install and unlike other mounts they don’t leave to much space from tv to wall. I would recommend to use your own level tool to make sure it is straight. The one they send are hit and miss.

Very impressed with this product. It’s sturdy, decent instructions, well packaged, and it comes with a level, a couple Velcro cable straps, and an HDMI cable. It also comes with a card that explains where to find mounting videos on YouTube. All of this for a lot less money than anything else out there. Very well done.
Does what its needed to do. Easy to install.  Using it for a 65" tv, had to buy my own lag bolts due to the nature of my wall, but the ones supplied would normally work fine.
In looking for a TV mount, I wanted something cheap, sturdy and with enough room to hide all of the cables behind the TV where our outlet was located. This did it all, so I'm pleased!
I would raise the easy to install rating to a five if they found a way to eliminate need to find stud in walls. Other wise it was easy enough I could have let my girlfriend figure it out.

So happy with this purchase!  Extremely easy to install. It comes with everything you need whether you’re installing on regular wall, cement or brick.  Even comes with a level and the box has a ruler on it.  Definitely recommend and will purchase again!

I was going to buy a mount from Costco for almost twice the price. I gave this model a shot after reading the positive reviews and I'm pretty happy so far. My 55" Sony mounted just fine and all the hardware that came with it means it could be installed pretty much anywhere. It was a nice touch that it came with a level and velcro straps for cable management.

It was very easy to install, and the additional accessories made it easy to line it up perfect.  Comes with an assortment of screws, a level, and some velcro strips for tying wires up.  Would highly recommend.  I used it on a 55" Hitachi TV.

It looked a bit cheap but it works and is surprisingly solid. It came with an hdmi cord, a bubble level, and two velcro straps as well. Sells cheaper than comparable in-store tilt-only mounts so I didn't mind waiting a day or two for delivery.

It works well but it will not lock in place if you angle it before you hang it.  You need to hang it straight and then lock it in place and then angle it but at that point tighten the screws that will keep the angle of viewing is practically impossible.  We made it work but it could have been design better.

I purchased this for my 75” LG and I love it. The mount feels secure and sturdy. Would definitely recommend. Actually, I purchased this after I put up another brand’s full motion mount which I clearly wasn’t a fan of. This mount here, is great!

The mount worked perfect on my Sony 32" TV. I was able to mount the TV in around 20 minutes. I was just wide enough that the bolts on both sides screwed in the wall studs. Good price, good quality and easy to use. I also like the quick release loops which make it easy to take the TV off the wall. My one criticism is they give you a small liquid level which is either filled with a thick oil or the ball is extremely light. Basically it was slow to respond and I didn't feel it was accurate. I recommend you use your own level.

Very easy to install. Comes with a paper template to align on wall first to mark where to drill holes. My studs are 16.75" apart (non-standard spacing) and this fit perfectly. Installing brackets on TV was simple and mounting to wall was easy, just follow instructions and mount to studs or concrete, not dry-wall alone. This was for a 42" tv.

I love when a product works as advertised. This mounted to the wall very easily with the included hardware. I would suggest using an impact driver to help get the large hex screw in the stud.It holds my old 80 lbs, 47 inch plasma without difficulty. I have had no issues. It does rotate up and down but not sideways so you will need to remember this when you mount it. It comes with level which is nice to make sure the piece is level when you hang it.

I ordered two of these and they worked perfectly for both a 40 inch tv and a 65 inch tv. Some much less expensive than other mounts I have purchased and just as good or better quality. The mounts came with many spacers and screw six options including the ones I needed. I haven’t used the hdmi cable as I have those already. Not sure about the quality of those. The included level is too short to be useful. I used a four foot one to make sure it was level.
Práctico para instalar y nada que envidiar a productos similares en tiendas que tienen un costo elevaso

The mount does exactly what it claims to. It's very low profile and sturdy. Unfortunately because it's so low profile, there isn't enough room to organize cables or adjust the mount's tilt. We had to carefully measure the tilt adjusters before mounting it to get the TV at the angle we wanted.

This mount worked perfectly for my 32" Sony TV.  I mounted it in my kids playroom and the tilt angle is exactly what they needed to not strain their necks when watching from the futon across the room.  It was easy to mount with simple instructions.  My only complaint is the necessity to remove the TV from the wall to attach the cables to the back.  If your TV has ports on the side then it will not be an issue for you.  I would definitely buy this again if I need to mount another TV.  It comes with plenty of mounting hardware and every screw size imaginable to fit your TV or wall.  The price point is unbelievable as well, I looked at Best Buy and it would have cost me 4 times as much to buy it there.

We love this wall mount, we purchased it when our toddler decided he like to climb and we got scared it would fall on him. With this wall mount,  we have the piece of mind that he isn't going to get hurt or push over and break our TV. It's also easy Installation, my husband installed it in around 30 minutes.

The mounting bracket works great, slides in and locks without any movement. I still prefer a singular vertical mounting point system and opposed to having to drill two lines of holes but this is a great buy for the price, highly recommend.
This bracket is made very well. The kit did not come with Drywall anchors.  Had to spend almost $8 for 3/8" anchors! Seems sturdy and well made.
Arrived and was installed within 30 minutes-very easy to install, easy to follow instructions and allows the TV to be mounted on the wall with out a lot of fuss, even includes a level!

This works for our tv; have had it up for about two weeks and it hasn’t fallen off the wall yet lol but one of the spring clips was faulty that hold the tv in place. It works with just  one, but I wish both worked for peace of mind.

So, this is normally something I run out to Home-D and get.  Which I did try to do.  But when I got there this little beauty was $98 bucks.  I really wanted/needed it, so I stood there and started at it.  Took me a sec, but I jumped on Amazon and found it for way cheaper.  Less than half the cost!  I ordered and waited a day or so (Prime is indeed magic) and then installed it.  It is a high quality product that went up easily.

Whoever writes these descriptions should be fired. Nowhere does it say that you need to assemble the back bracket before you can mount it on the wall. I do so many of these I don’t need to waste time assembling the bracket before I can work with it.
Mounted a 82" Samsung QLED tv on this and it is holding solid.  That was a heavy TV, had to get a friend to help me get it mounted and the mount is holding strong.
the wall mount and 2 tv mounts are very solid.  significantly less in cost than purchasing it at a big box store.  i would highly recommend this product to anyone who is needing to hang a tv.

I graduated to a pretty sweet 70” 4KTV. I followed the reviewers into this deal and now I’m a reviewer. It’s a good deal.. it does the job well and doesn’t shake you down to have it. It sits behind the tv, you never see it but it’s always there- working like an unpaid donkey. I’d buy it again
No way to mount the brackets onto the back of the tv so now it’s just a frame on my wall.The screws are horrible.

Over the years, I’ve installed several units.  This unit is by far the best!  The unit is a heavier gauge steel.  All of the hardware was included.  It contained easy to follow directions.  If I could make one suggestion, substitute the socket head screws that tighten the tilt adjustment with a cap head screw.  This way you could use a a socket on the end of an extension bar to tighten, especially on a larger TV
Pros:  Strong construction, good instructions, easy to assemble, free HDMI cable.  nice.  There was plenty of extra hardware for mounting various sized TVs.Cons: None.

Well, we received the TV mount and it is very well made.  I would definitely buy again if I needed another.  The only downside was...it should have come with a mounting template as described in the YOUTUBE video . (I use youtube allot ^_^)  It would have saved me some time from all the measurement calculations..  PS. it also comes with a small level..
My son installed the bracket and he and husband put my tv up.  I LOVE IT! I'm not using the tilt though so I can't comment about that but it's sturdy and I don't worry about it at all.

I’m not going to lie... I was skeptical about this product, and even more so when the box came. It was smaller than I expected, but once installed I’m a believer! Amazing mount. Super easy to install. Looked amazing on the wall, and I wish I had ordered sooner! Truly worth the money.

This is a great quality product, with a great price.  The rails (attached to the back of the TV) clamp easily and securely onto the mounting bracket (screwed onto the wall).  Tip - do not tilt the unit until the lower clamps are in place, or it will be hard to connect.  The one caution is if you have a smaller TV.  The add says it is for 26 - 50 inch TVs.  I am using this with a Vizio 32 inch, and the rails of this unit are the same height as my TV, so I would think that the rails would extend beyond the top and bottom of smaller TVs.  The rails are 17 inches long.  Measure your TV height before buying.

Overall a nice utilitarian mount with simple install.  If you have 16" centers then it is a great value.  If your studs are more than 16" centers, then the addon extension bracket pushes this well over the cost of the comparable Cheetah.  I bought two and had to get the extension as one room has 18" centers.  They are strong and fit many tvs.

This mount is exactly what we were hoping it would be. It holds up our 65" TV very nicely. Instructions were very clear and only took about 1.5 hours to put together and mount to the wall. It can move horizontally which is perfect if the studs in your wall are off-center, like ours were. It's thin and doesn't cause the TV to stick out too far from the wall. We are very happy with this purchase.

Easy enough to install but it takes two people to raise the TV high enough and align it.  For some people, it would be money well spent to pay amazon the $99 fee for hassle-free professional installation.

Overall it fits my needs and was a good price however the level that comes with it is not to be trusted, mine reads differently if you measure the same surface with the level pointing opposite ways. I did not notice the problem with the level till it was too late and I had the 4 large bolts already into the wall, it would have been better if they did not included a level at all than include one that is wrong.

Was a little too long for my TCL 65”. I had to trim about 1/2” off the bottom of the TV bracket as you can see in pic. Other than that it went up quickly and easily. Seems to be very strong (I hung from it first).
If you looking for good wall mount , I recommend this one they pretty much give you everything to mount on the wall and they give you a small leveler make sure your mount is level.
For the price it excelled. Excellent value for money. I was dreading it since I struggled so much with our other TV. But this was a pleasure.
Looks good and was easy to install now that I've done a few of these installs. Of course I wish the mount was thinner, but 1.5" seems to be the thinnest you can get right now.
Very easy and secure to attach the TV to wall frame. As advertised, TV sits very close to wall. Incline adjust once and then you have to secure it with a screw, so no frequent changes.

I include these in my rental units so I have installed several now. They are super easy to assemble and mount. They also give you a huge variety of screws and mounting hardware. So you can bolt to wood, brick, cement, ect. And it should have screws to fit any tv out there.

Mount is very solid and not flimsily made of thin metal like some other lower priced mounts. The installation instructions were clear and the variety of hardware included for various applications was more than sufficient (including a magnetic pocket level). The unit is made very well and was a breeze to install. I installed my tv with the #8 spacers (biggest) with about a 6 degree tilt. If your television has no obstructions at the bottom to clear- go ahead and install it with a tilt from the beginning as I did. Will save you the time and hassle of having to remove the tv from the mount- making adjustments and then reinstalling. Quick release pull cords for tv removal from mount- 2 thumbs up!
this is a very cheap and high quality compared to what the stores offered, it got installed in no time and hold a 55' TV with no problems, I highly recommend it
Held this 60 inch tv well. Moveable, durable. Husband literally hung from it to make sure it wouldn't fall in our kids room. It's great and well priced.
Holds the TV strong to the wall.  It is hard to pull the cords to release it from the bottom supports and to plug accessories in because it mounts so close to the wall

The mount is well built and comes with a very large variety of screws and spacers that should allow for it to work with almost any TV.  However the bullet level is a piece of junk.  Just throw it away when you get it.  I made the mistake of using it and mounted my TV crooked on the wall and didn't notice it until I had finished and sat down in front of it.  I had to move the mount completely resulting in 4 unnecessary holes in the wall.
Strings use to pull the locks is too short and is very difficult to mount. Wish they could've made them longer. Quality is sub par, tv still wiggles after locking the tv in place.

Mount is extremely easy to install.  the instructions aren't exact but its pretty self explanatory when you start looking at the parts.  so far its working great! we didn't need the tilt on it but it seems to function if we were to ever need it! would purchase another if we ever needed another wall mount!
easy to install, glad to have finally hung my TV. I like the tilt function too. We loosened it just enough to be able to tilt, but so it wouldn't move on its own.

impressive at everything that is included on this mounting kit for the price , the level , the hdmi works perfect, the wide range of bolts included for different types of tvs, I mounted a 42 inch LG, and highly highly recommend this product, it even included the washers which i did not had thought of , and some  plastic stuff in case the tv is too close to the wall for the connections, i ended up using all the items included
Great design and easy install. It doesn’t come with brick mounting hardware and you have to call for them. I called But never heard back. Had to make a hardware store run. Only complaint.
This was a dream to put up, the template was spot on and they added velcro ties to manage cords. I don’t usually review things, but this required a glowing review.

I installed this completely by myself with no help except the directions that came with it. That being said, when it comes to hanging the actual tv on it, it would be very helpful to have an extra set of hands for stability, but otherwise, great product, far less expensive than what was available at Best Buy, easy to install, and have had no issues.
Love it!  You need a drill and a stud finder to install this but otherwise super easy and it looks great!I think it’s a fabulous purchase at this price. I have a 65” tv.

Was my first time doing this so it was overwhelming at first. But I got it up and on the wall.It took me 5 hours only because i made a few mistakes ie I broke my drill bit had to get another one then later I realized I needed  a socket wrench for the big screws
I had ordered a different brand prior and had to return it. But this unit worked perfectly, was easy to put together and install. I would recommend it highly.
The anchor bolts could be a better style. The person who helped me install it ended up using mounting bolts that I had from a microwave wall mount bracket.

Works great. I have this in my camper & it works great holding my tv up. It holds up during moves, easy to take tv off if needed. Comes with everything you need besides the screws that need to go into the tv.

This product was easy to install. I have concrete walls and they didn’t include the anchors for safety reasons. I emailed the company and they sent me anchors and explained why they were not included. The delivery was fast and they were very courtesy. The product is great.

was an easy mount, My 43 inch tv had a narrow mounting pattern so I could only use half the wall bracket.  the metal center was blocking my mount brackets that attach to the tv hole pattern.  No big deal since the tv is light.  be nice if they told you that you may need to use half for a small set
Worked great; exactly what I was looking for!  Low profiles so tv can be seen from all angles of the room. Plan to buy another one for a different room.
