Pretty much the headline. I installed this thing super quick for a 65" TV with the wrong tools for the job and it is rock solid. I can't recommend it enough. Cheap, easy, and strong as can be - but enough about me. This thing is great!

Great wall mount that is super easy to install.  There is a bit of wiggle room to make sure you have it perfectly centered in the stud for secue and safe mounting.  I like how you can tilit it up and down for just the right viewing angle that works best for you.  Durable and doesn't leave huge holes in your wall if you decide to move it.

Super easy to install and very easy to take the TV on and off the mount (we needed to multiple times so we could do cable management and what not). We liked it so much that within hours of having the living room TV mounted, we had already ordered another mount for the bedroom. Love it!

Gotta love the price for the mount with pulldown releases, level and HDMI. The one short coming of this mount is that typical TV mount holes make this an exact edge-to-edge fit for mount to bracket. This poses an issue with mounting with little wall play. My 55" TV was a perfect fit for a bedroom wall section. Problem is I could only use one stud and the rest is a hope and a prayer with sheet rock support. Still worked out for me and easily worth the cost.

Instructions and parts bag laid out nicely with multiple pieces of hardware to fit different TV hanging setups.  Even came with a small level whick I thought was considerate.Bracket works just as one would expect.  Centering and mounting to studs is the important part and they do a good job explaining how to do it.  However a certain amount of common Sense and experience help.

As far as mounts go, this one is as good as any tilt mount you're likely to find.  It is just big enough to mount my 65" curved Samsung, and it comes with enough hardware options to fit just about any TV on the market.  If you need a tilt mount and your TV is 65" or less, then pick this one.  Then laugh at your friends who paid 5 times as much for one recommended by the "professionals" at Best Buy.
Exactly what we needed to mount a five year old tv on our son’s bedroom wall. Worked great since the cord was blocking the traditional style mount

The wall bracket has a clear design flaw. The installation instructions require 2 bolts on each of 3 studs.. (for 16" stud spacing)  The problem is that there is not a hole or slot in the center. I called and their technician and he said that it was ok to just use 2 bolts on 2 studs.  Get the instruction CORRECTED!
Simple instructions.  Easy installation.  Very sturdy.  I put in a 2x4 wall, with T1-11 covering.  You could do chin ups on this thing.  I used it for an old 80+ pound plasma monster.

Great! It is sturdy. The only thing I didn't like was the instruction manual and the included leveler (it was not a good one). Also, if you are mounting on brick, you will need additional materials not included in this kit.

It's well made but poorly sized. The width is really too narrow. It should be a little over 36 inches so it catches standard spaced wall studs. This is 24 inches so if the studs are offset from the center line of your room the TV is offset too. Poor design.

Mount works well but make sure you don’t need the extender before purchasing! If you need the extender it is sold separately and you would be better off purchasing a different, wider mount to start with!

The bottom bracket attached to tv has straps that open and close a latch attaching it to the secured wall mount. I found it difficult and not alot of space to put my arm thru and be able to pull/open both latches at exact same time.
Yup. It works. TV’s on the wall. Easy for DYI-er to install. Mounted above the fireplace and on a plaster wall both of which Amazon installers and many Pro’s won’t touch. It was easy peasy!

Very simple but sturdy mount. The bracket only measures 17 inches so make sure there are two studs located where you want the tv to be or it wont work. It came will 4/M8 25mm bolts which was perfect for my 40” Samsung 2017 model year. I think most Current Samsungs use M8 25mm or 36mm bolts and alot of mounts dont come with the 25mm

I mounted a massive tv on this and it has held for 8 months so far with no concerns. I made sure to read the instructions very closely, but in the end it seems like it is quite simple. Love that it came with an HDMI cable and level.

So, the wall mount works great. It’s pretty easy to install, easy to mount but it is really not good if you have a TV with ports the stick out from the back. We thought the couple inches would be fine for one of our HDMI ports that came straight out of the back, but it ended up damaging the port when we mounted the TV and we can’t use it anymore. So, that sucked, but if your ports come out from the side, then this would be great!
Very sleek, low-profile tilting mount. Easy to assemble and hang. Can’t be beat for the price. Comes with everything you need including an HDMI cable, velcro straps for hiding cords, and a level!

Wow! I wish I had done this sooner! I bought one for my older kids room and fell in love with it so I added one to my room too! Then ordered another for my youngest kids room! Very sturdy and easy to hang with two people. Gets the tv off the dresser or desk to free up surface area for other things and you can see the screen better from bed!
Does what it's supposed to do.  Everything was there and it's solid.  I've installed plenty of wall mounts and this is just as good as the rest.  No complaints.

We finally hung our new 55" Sharp television. It was an easy install. Hook the top mount and pull strings at the bottom and it's attached easily. Make sure you have an extra person around to help. We also ran the wiring behind the television. Awesome product!!!

Works great! Tv looks awesome mounted up on the wall. Sucked finding the beams and leveling the stand but overall it was great! They provide almost everything you need for installing so all you need to buy yourself is a beam finder and a screwdriver

Works exactly as I wanted it to. Was able to install the TV in ~20 minutes and I feel confident it's secure. Came with lots of extra hardware for different mountings, but had everything I needed. Feels VERY secure.
Mounted two TV's with this screen.  Comes with everything you need including a nice HDMI cable, Velcro zip ties, and even a balance bubble.

The pull straps seem like a good idea at first, but they are just awkward to work with unless you have a friend available to help. If you don't mount the TV high enough on the mount the straps hang where you can see them. Also, if you want to dismount the tv by yourself, you have to awkwardly hold one hand in the tv to put tension on it, while pulling down on BOTH straps at the same time. Otherwise, it just snaps back in and locks. Bottom line: I don't like this mount and I don't entirely trust it.

The studs in the wall were slightly off center. But because the anchor is so well made, I was able to center the tv with the wall and not worry about weight distribution. I added more drywall screws for reassurance, but wasn’t needed. The tv might weigh all of 40lbs. This is a great product. If I ever need another I will definitely buy this again.

I've used 4 or 5 of these now and it's by far the best mount you can use. They are so easy to install and literally include everything you need (except a drill) to install them, all the way down to a level.

Sturdy.  Well-machined parts.  Nice, easy install.  All the screws labeled nicely in separate pouches.  Hoisting our massive 52" up there was not a problem.I wouldn't trust the cheap plastic level though - thoughtful to include it, but it was off according to my two carpenter's levels.
This very reasonably priced mounting system was perfect for our needs. It was easy to install and we mounted our large flat screen TV without incident. Best to use a stud finder before you install.
I installed this in 5 minutes. I love the spring loaded bottom latch. It allows one to simply tilt the tv up to plug things into the back while the top is secured.
This is a solid one piece frame wall mount. It is wide enough for you to mount it to wider stud spacing with room for you to slide in either direction.
Could tilt a bit more, but otherwise it's perfect. Hardwareis included for every possible situation, even a level. Great.
Like it overall. The design is smart and the manufacture includes various parts which made the installation on your own a breeze.

At full tilt the bottom hooks will not snap in properly. The unit comes with all the screw sizes and options to install any TV. The quality and strength are also great. Since I could not get the right tilt I wanted I took away 2 stars.
I ended up returning the product but it was still excellent product. It was well packaged and the instruction was well explained. Thank you.

This was very easy to install, just make sure that you use your own level.  Also, this may not work for older TVs on the larger end.  Be certain to measure the distance between the holes on the back of your TV.  I actually bought 2 of these, one for a new 40" LED TV and another for my older 50" plasma.  Needless to say, the bracket that is bolted into the wall wasn't even wide enough to reach the holes in my 50" plasma. It worked just fine for the new smaller TV.  Would definitely recommend this product.
The kit itself if good. The bolts however are dainty. Snapped one of the bolt heads with a pilot hole and not much torque. I'm lucky i've got a random bolt box with an extra stud lag bolt.

Hung 2 TV's using this, but ended up changing one to a full motion bracket because this one didn't swivel.  The tilt was very limited, but if you're looking for an affordable and easy way to mount a TV, this works perfectly.
Great product.  We've installed 5 TVs with these. Disclaimer: paid a professional to do the job but he had absolutely no problems with the brackets.
Well... its a TV mount...Easy to install as far as mounts go. Easier for me since my husband did it!! LOL

This mount is simple and easy to install, the only hard part is getting your measurement right but that’s not the fault of the product. I mount my Sony XBR-75X940E and it seem to hold it pretty well. I mount it using 4 lag bolts and 4 snap toggle as a back up since the tv weight 90lbs
It is a wall mount bracket for you larger TV. Easy installation. Good instructions. Well put together. Multiple fasteners for any type of TV within recommend sizes.
It was slightly complicated to install. The cords to take the TV down hang several inches below the TV, but it gets the job done.

Everything is great, I already install mount on my TV. Only problem is. I have concrete wall and I thought they would include screws for wall but they didn't. But still that's not a big problem. For price I get amazing quality, and too much screws for wooden walls. So if your wall is concrete, buy before or order special screws for wall.
Easy to install and works great. Feels sturdy. There is no side to side motion, but if you dont need that then I recommend this mount.

Just right, took a little work to assemble. Was nicely packaged and holds my 49" TV for gym area perfectly. Slides back and forth along wall which is great, would recommend moutning into studs - then if centering is an issue, use the sliding function to accommodate. Definitely worth the price!
Pretty easy to mount. The instructions are on point. Just follow them through.55 inch TV and went with the measurements on description. Good quality. Would recommend.

It's OK. The latches on the bottom will not engage (i.e. the TV is not secured) if you set the angle to tilt all the way. In order to get around this I had to loosen the tilt screws, attach the TV, tilt it to the angle I wanted, and then tighten the screws after. The problem with this is you need to reach quite far behind the TV to access the screws, and you cannot tighten the inner ones. Also, when the TV is mounted, you can still slide it sideways across the rail.  Fortunately the edge is made so the TV cannot slide off.

Much easier to install than I anticipated. There was one point I had to switch out TVs and the anchor would hook on one side, but good thing I had a 2nd person to hold it upright while I adjusted. I’ve had it a month and no complaints
The product provides great value, and holds great my 65 tv. Be aware that it does not include the concrete anchors, that got on installation pause until I get some anchors to properly mount my tv.

This mount is NOT conducive to larger TVs. It’s  practically impossible to get to the HDMI inputs in back of the TV without dismounting. It does sit flush against the wall which is good, but if you ever want to add or remove HDMI, USB or aux components, you should look elsewhere.Next time, I will spend the extra money to purchase one of the mounts that pulls out.
This mounting system was very easy to install: four bolts on the TV and four bolts in the wall and you are done.  Quality material. I would recommend this product.
This is a good wall mount and I have multiple of them, but every time I need to plug something new in I wish I paid the extra for one that can pull away from the wall.

The instructions were clear and the mount is great for the price - plus, it includes a level to make sure the TV is even as well as a really long HDMI cord that we used to connect our hidden PS4 without it having to sit on the mantle. So great that I’ll stick with this brand if we decide to mount another TV!
We were unable to plug in the amazon stick after installation
The instructions were easy to follow and the mounting template was a great help.  Make sure you have the tools ready before starting.
It was great and super easy, don’t spend your money at Best Buy, they try to sell you something worse for $100 and if you don’t they get mad,Same with TVs,
Very sturdy. Came with just about every size mounting bolts you could want. Also came with a magnetic leveler. I bought two and they both work great.

Bought two of these to hang 60” tv in living room and 42” tv in bedroom. Was easy to install and after several months of use, neither TVs have fallen off the wall! Haha. I like how flush they get the TVs to the wall compared to other wall mounts

This is exactly what works for hanging tvs. No need to go buy a more expensive name brand tv mount. it's bent metal..it's very sturdy and has all the hardware to work. save yourself lots of money and buy these instead of the high priced options at best buy and other places.
Quite easy to install and well designed.  Able to hold a much heavier TV than mine
Holds a 65 inch samsung curved on a brick fireplace just fine
This stand is good but the only thing is that you can’t move it around in different positions it only have one position but other wise it’s sturdy and protects your tv well
This is holding my 65" flat panel and was very easy to install. I have the tv in the corner of our bedroom and the motion allowed me to put it in the perfect position.

Well thougth out design.  Assembly was not at all complicated and they provided an array of bolt/fit options for the tv sizes.  I really like the ability to move the tv horizontally on the rails without any disassembly.  Good value for the money.
Overall an easy to install wall mount.  My one complaint is that the straps to release the locks are a bit to long on smaller TVs (47”) and hard to get out of the way.
Used it with a 50” and absolutely perfect, no less no and no more than we needed. A graceful design and heavy duty, reliable construction.

This wall mount is easy to install and includes a lot of different size screws and accessories needed to install, quality feels good, I installed an older 55” Sony TV that’s definitely heavier than most newer models, at the end I didn’t need to tilt the TV but it’s always nice to have that option just in case I need it.
Works great. It’s an easy install if you are handy. We’ve had it for over a year now and the TVs still on the wall😂. So I say it works well.
Manufacturer was very thoughtful. A cool little product that fit both TVs in our house. Has a ton of extra equipment so it meets every need
I am sure my large screen TV is secure. They thought of everything in the packaging even to a level.Great instructions even a few extra parts  not needed for My TV
Easy to install. Holds up my 50” LCD TV just fine. Also the straps that lock the mount in place are easy to reach if you need to move your TV for any reason

This value-priced mount arrived in timely manner-- it was well boxed and included and HDMI cable.  The magnetic level (also included) was nice touch  and helped out considerably in the placement of the mount.  If you're one of those people that needs detailed instructions in order to assemble a product-- this mount is NOT for you.  The cartoon-like manual was... sub-par from that perspective.  The manual makes mention of mounting wood brackets and a plywood backing and.... waaaaaay to much information for the day-to-day user.  Buy a package of nice dry-wall toggles, do you best to hit at least one stud, and this bracket will work wonderfully for you.
Bought 3 of these to mount different sized TVs. It fit a 49”, 55” and 65” tv. Having the TVs mounted in my apartment made the rooms look so much bigger. Good buy.

This a great mount for a budget. Love how there is a quick disconnect function. High quality and very sturdy! Although the wall mounted screws i think were a bit overkill. They are soo thick and long. But with the right tools still easily mountable.

I was able to install this product mostly by myself in about an hour. The only help I got was from my wife to hold the bracket level so I could plot out the drill points for the lag bolts. I cannot imagine any reason to buy a similar mount from a brick and mortar store for double the price. Super happy with this mount and it really has transformed the look of my entertainment center.
Very easy to install, the instructions explain everything you need to know.  The hardest part is drilling it to the wall. Very pleased with the price.

I thought I was going to have to hire a TaskRabit, but was able to easily mount my 50 inch Samsung by myself with this mounting system. Somehow it made the process stress-free. I combined this mount will 8, 80lb Toggler drywall anchors for extra security since I was mounting without studs (make sure you do all of your research before attempting this to make sure it’s a safe option in your case.)

I purchased a similar one in a retail store and it was double the price (while on sale).  This comes in a plain brown box which I could care less about the packaging.  Quality is great and it came with everything we needed!  Would definitely recommend.
I bought this to install a tv on my patio for my elderly mother who enjoys sitting outdoors. Easy set up and very sturdy. Great purchase.
Three out of four screws that attach the two plates together stripped right out I had to weld the two plates together if you buy run a tap through the holes in plates cause manufacturer failed too

Good materials, instructions, etc.  Sturdy.  However you only have 6-8" of left to right variance.  Given the location of my studs (std 16" spread), I could not truly center my TV to the target location.

I really dislike that this product is a mount that's been cut in half to fit a smaller shipping box (i'm guessing on the reason for it).  It made for a very annoying installation and requires you level everything twice....

I was looking for a simple wall mount as nowadays I see lot of high priced Tilting mounts which I don't need. This is exactly what I expected and very simple easy to fix and mount the TV.  Worth for the money (which is also cheap when comparing to other similar products).

Great product at a low price! Would highly recommend to anyone looking to wall mount their tv on a budget. I have a 60 inch flat screen that is on the early side of when they were being introduced to the market, so mine was about 25lbs more than newer versions, but the mount has been excellent! Only advice I have, if you have an older flat screen with hdmi ports on the back instead of the sides, make sure to buy 90 degree adapters to plug in your cords!
We still have our tv on this so it works really good. Great product and cheaper than the stores. We had this product about three years now

I’m blown away you can get TV wall mount for 25 bucks now. I was really hesitant putting a heavy TV on this thing. If you secure it in the studs,  I don’t think you’ll have any issues.  I do wish it came out from the wall a little bit more so I could connect HDMI cables to the back of my tv without taking it off the wall.
I am giving 3 stars to this mounting system because the tilting is very limited. If you dont need a lot of tilting than it is a great mounting system.
Super easy to install. It took me about an hour.  I did need help on the last step to lift the tv onto the mount. It's a 65" tv and fits perfectly with room to spare.

I've never mounted a tv before, so I was cautious. It has held our 55inch beautifully and makes the room so much nicer than having a bulky tv stand. The installment was simple, and the mounting of the tv was convenient and easy. Thank you for taking away my fear of it falling with how sturdy your product is.

This thing rocks!  I have bought quite a few of mounts like this over the years and I was really impressed with this one. Had all the right features and didn’t feel cheap at all. Hardware was solid and install was a breeze. Highly recommend
Poor quality the frame didn't have 90° corners so it was impossible to level the LED screen. I broke the corners and welded  them square.

Supports my 65” Samsung tv. Easy to install, durable, and has an adjustable degree setting for multiple viewing angles. I wasn’t sure how good it would be because of the price but I’m glad I didn’t get a super expensive mount because this one is all you need. Comes with a kit of different sized bolts for tv compatibility and spacers so you can properly mount your tv. Recommend 10/10

This is a steal at $20  The kit has “everything” you could possibly need to mount your tv. At lease 6 different screw sizes, washers, expanders ect! Took no more then 20 minutes to install by myself. Love the angle, cuts down on glare.

Mounting or TV was 100% the best decision we made. It looks great now and this was as easy as it gets to install.  The hardest part was finding studs and getting this to drill into the wall but that's not the products fault. It did its job with flying colors.

This mount is well worth the price.  It is solidly holding our 65" TV.  It is well built and easy to install.  Don't be fooled by the package dimensions.  Once assembled, it measures 25.75 inches across.

This tv mount is great! Comes with template and level. Fit my Hisense 55” perfect. I used spacers because I was hiding stuff behind tv and wanted a little more room but definitely not necessary for this tv. I saved all the screws in case I get another tv and I only have to reinstall the part on the back of tv.
It’s soooooo easy to install and hold up nicely. I even used myself to test if the mount can hold up, not a single glitch. If a girl like me can install it myself, everyone can

I didn't have too much hope in this holding my 55 inch tv onto the wall properly, since it was so inexpensive. I gave it a shot, thinking I have nothing to lose , and can just send it back if it gave me a problem. Guess what? It's the best 20 bucks I ever took a chance with. It works great. Easy to install, and tv is hung securely to wall. Very happy customer!

Coming from a female who had never put a wall mount up, and is moderately handy, I was able to figure it out and get it put up in about an hour and a half. Now that I've done it once, If I had to do it again, it would probably take me less than 30. The most important part is to have the right tools.One comment I have is that in the directions, when putting the initial thicker bolts into the wall to put the frame up, it instructs you to use a much smaller drill bit than you need to use... I ended up using the size of the drill bit it asked for, and then going up a size at a time until I could get the bolt into the drywall and eventually into the stud behind (snugly). The drill bit I ended with was 3x thicker than the one the instructions called for. And I'm probably 95% certain I did it right...

Great bracket. Was easy to install and very sturdy. I have a 60 inch TV on my wall and I don't have to worry. It came with a host of different screw sizes and spacers. This means just about any tv should work.

Installing was the mount seamless.  This was a great deal especially since is comes with an HDMI cable.  I would recommend hooking up the cables to the TV and then hanging it if your ports/plugins are the back of your TV. On ours, it was difficult to get the cables plugged in after it was hung.  Not the mount's fault though!

Nice mount for the money. Plenty of holes to locate the beam. I also installed a power outlet right inside - no more messy wires. It’s pretty slim too.One small thing: for a larger TV (75+) the lace to unlock the latch may be too short and will require an extension. No too big of a deal but may annoy during initial try out.

This is a quality product with a tilt feature that the $100 box store version doesn't have. It is sturdy and comes with everything you need. I am currently using it on my 55" tv over thw fireplace. Very satisfied.
It doesn't have a whole lot of range of motion, BUT it's for our bedroom tv and we wanted it to be set in a specific spot.  Looks great.
This is a very strong sturdy mount.Came with HDMI cable, plenty of hardware for whatever solution you seek.
Nice mounting system very easy to set up. No balancing tv and mounting at the same time.  You mount back and click the tv part on it and done.

Pretty easy to install. My husband & I installed in about 30 mins & this was the first time we did anything like it. It came with a small level. You will need a stud finder. Make sure u drill your holes first! That will make it a lot easier. And use a ratchet to tighten the screws, instead of trying to drill them all the way in. Overall, we love it! Very sturdy & easy to install!

Works as intended but needed to buy extra bolts for it to work with extensions.  Used to mount a 65" tv above a fireplace.  The tilt aspect is nice, but may need extra bolts other than what was supplied with the mount.  Could beat the price tho.
went together without issue, and it came with TONS of extra hardware for various tv's and the different mounting options.  GREAT VALUE!
Took me maybe 20 minutes from unboxing to watching.  I ended up using #12 3inch long self tapping screws instead of the provided ones.
The tv mount itself is a fine product however my wife ordered the wrong one and to return it the cost to us is at least $30. Terrible return cost.

Great tv mount. I had one of the retractable mounts but didn’t like how far it made my tv stick out from the wall. I ordered this and, even with it tilted out, it doesn’t give your tv that bulky feel. Will order again if I’m ever in need of another mount.

Easy to use, and rock solid mount for my 65 inch tv. Plenty of mounting hardware and spacers to fit a wide variety of tv's. Pleased with this mount, and excellent price.Comes with an 8ft HDMI cable, and a small level. Havent tried the cable, but the level is trash, throw it away immediately.  It is not accurate as shown in attached pic

Worked quite well; make sure to attach your HDMI cables before mounting on the wall; kind of hard to get enough space behind TV to reach behind and plug in HDMI'S once mounted on the wall. Two people to mount larger than 50" TV's is also a very good idea. For the money, you get a very nice wall mount for your big screen TV.
Easy to install and very sturdy.  Just be sure to get a good quality stud finder and a socket adapter for a drill.  Makes it simple.
We installed an older smart 55 flat Samsung, it was so easy to work with all the parts supplied. Hard to believe all the parts for such small amount of money. Very pleased with purchase.

Solid wall mount, sturdy, easy to attach to the wall.  The unit comes with a lot of different bolt sizes for different TVs so it can be used with a lot of different brands and sizes. The included bubble level is ok, had a hard time keeping straight on the bracket.  The pull strings that allow you to pull down the locking barbs is a good idea but also hang down below the TV when mounted. Good value. Used it to mount my old 50" Sanyo tv that weighs about 50lbs.
Wasn’t too bad to install and definitely holds the 60” tv without issue. It’s sturdy and seems reliable. Bought 2 for 2 different rooms and glad We did.

I am really really annoyed. I bought this mount a while ago and finally installed it. Fairly easy but after I was done I thought it looked a little off level. I checked it with the level they provided (and I used during installation) and the bubble was right in the center. The next day, it still looked off so I got another level to double check and it's way off. Moral of the story: don't use the tools they provide you!

Perfect for my need, mounting a 43" 15 lb samsung led in our bedroom.  Needed something simple and close to the wall.  Seems to be made from quality materials and well documented.  Took me about an hour to install whille taking my time.

1st time ever mounting a time, pretty straight forward only took me about 20-30 minutes after figuring out the instructions, added some cheap led lights and now it looks amazing for under 50 bucks total!
This is super easy to install for anybody. I just didn’t like the fact that you have to cut/ tape the strings on the bottom latches so there not hanging in plain sight. Otherwise very simple.
Easy to install.  Really don't think this is going to keep the TV on the wall in a good earthquake.  Little hanging doodads are ugly; going to have to cut them off.
We bought this to mount a 32” tv on our back porch on a brick exterior wall. Works great, easy assembly, looks sleek. This is surprisingly a great product for the cost.

Bought this for my 70" LG. I bought the bigger size since the wall where I mounted the tv the studs were off-centered. This allowed me to slide the mount over enough that the TV mounted was centered on the wall.
This item worked well for our tv.  My husband placed tv on wall and it looks great. We’re able to also tilt the tv forward. Thank you
Installing was a breeze and looks great. Sits nice and flush on the wall and is really sturdy. Price point is great and does the job.

This is a very stressless install. The directions were clear and easy to follow, and the product itself is very well made and strong. I was worried bc the price was so low, but reading reviews made me willing to give it a try. I would recommend as long as you aren’t looking for a wall mount that moves!

It works great, but it is hard to get cables plugged it once you have the TV mounted.  You really need to have an extra person so you can partially mount it and the other person routes wires and plugs everything in while you hold the bottom out.  I'd still recommend it and buy another for the price.

It worked except the tilting feature. There are two screws for angle adjustment on each bracket (total of four). How could i reach the screw on the inner side once the TV is mounted on. Not mentioning it is difficult to even reach the screw on the outside (There should be some long rod like other design). Not impressed by the design. Took a lot more time than needed to install.

works well on my 47 inch Vizio.  Getting it perfectly level required slight alteration to the mounting holes on the bracket itself, but using a round metal rasp file solved the problem and resulted in a perfectly horizontal mount...  Good quality at a fair price.
I purchased 2 of these and let me tell you they work perfectly no complaints! Easy to assemble too just followed the instructions.

Exactly what I expected. This is a very sturdy product and the price is right on. Instructions are easy enough to follow. Holds my 48 inch Samsung without a problem and it seems as though it could hold a larger TV without any issues. The only con I can think of is the lack of a built in level, not a big deal but its the only way I can see improving this product.

I needed a mount that would fit on my oddly shaped walls, and on an older tv.  This one seemed strong, and simple to put up.  Came with a ton of different mounting hardware to fit whatever we would need, and went up easily.  Feels sturdy, and is close to the wall while giving just enough space for the cables going into the back of the tv.

The Mount was easy to install. You really didn't need any directions it was real straight forward. The only thing I wish I have been included was a stop for the TV on the mount because when you try to plug in the HDMI cables the TV would slide and you had to be extra careful and make sure you didn't push it off. I still like it.. I think it was well worth the money and I would buy it again.

It’s a good mount. My only two issues are that if at the 10 degree angle then the bottom part does latch right.  Secondly, you have to take it down to adjust to the angle. You cannot do it while it’s up. Otherwise very sturdy and easy to put up. For the price you can’t beat it.

Everything about this wall mount exceeded my expectations. The metal was solid, the hard ware was diverse, and directions easy to understand. If someone complained about this mount it has to be due to user error. Amazing product.

I was concerned at first when I ordered this mount, but I am very pleased with the overall outcome. I will buy again from the seller and should I find myself in need of another mount, this is the one that I will buy. It's sturdy, and easy to install!

I have purchased 4 of these now. After the first installation I was completely sold. The quality and cost are great. Compare to a tilting wall mount at the big box hardware store and you'll see what I mean.
This mount comes with all the hardware necessary to mount the TV. Other mounts I bought in the past did not have bolts to mount to TV. Easy to attach to wall and even easier to hang TV

This company makes good if not great Tv mounts.  I have several.  I'm a designer so I'm more aware of possibilities for improvement than most.  With this mount the first thing that should be redesigned are the cloth loops used to release the lower rail latches.  They work OK, but then don't want to tuck away out of sight.  After they're tucked away it's hard to retrieve them for unlatching.  They should be replaced by folding plastic finger loops that would click in up and down positions.

Easy to install. Works exactly as advertised. Solid construction for it's purpose. I used it to mount a 40" lcd television on the back porch. This mount's design makes it easy to remove the tv and bring it inside during the winter months. It came with almost all of the hardware I needed. I only needed two small washers to attach the tv to the mount because the mounting holes on the tv are not the same depth all around. The lag bolts that I used to mount the frame to the wall were easily installed and created a solid connection. I would highly recommend it, especially for the price.

The problem wasn’t with the wall mount but the studs in my bedroom were 24 inches apart in the wall mount was only 18 inches. My TV was a 50 inch TV but the back brace was not long enough for the studs in my wall.

Excellent quality and value. Comes with everything you’ll need. Unless of course you live in Florida like me, where wall studs are galvanized steel. I recommend heading to the hardware store to pickup Toggle Straps by the Hillman Group. You’ll need these to utilize the metal studs to support the weight of the TV.
The only thing I did not like was the plate being right IB the middle. Other than that it a great product very well made.

We've checked that everything is level- using both the level provided and our own level- some how the TV is still crooked.  Something about the way it actually sit in the mount is putting it off.  We've checked everything repeatedly.  Maybe ours is just defective- it would have been great otherwise.

After experimenting with various mounts, including ones from Monoprice, I have to say... This is by far the easiest and most elegant mounting experience I've ever had, period. It comes with a magnetic level and HDMI cable which are great extras, but it's real strength are the spring loaded bottom rail holders. This thing is extremely well designed, and you can't beat the price.

mounted a 50" TV. I'm going to devise my own cable management and will probably tape up the pull straps like others have mentioned.Only thing i didn't like was the screw holes on the part that attaches to the wall aren't reinforced. My TV is under 40lbs and not an issue. For a TV closer to the weight limit, i might be a little cautious.
My first t.v. mount and it definitely took me longer than expected but after all was said and done I thought to myself "that's it?". Really sturdy and easy to install.

Great product for the money!!  Using it to mount our 65” tv. Had a small issue with some screws stripping but one call to customer support and they had replacement parts in the mail that day.  Overall very happy!
Use a retchet set we tried using a drill before realizing these are bolts not screws. It doesn't say this in the instructions...lol but it's quick if you use the right tools

After looking in the big box stores and seeing their ridiculous prices, I decided to check out Amazon. This product cost a small fraction of the store brands and is very well made. Great quality. Very strong and comes with all necessary mounting hardware. Easy to install. I'm so glad I waited and purchased this and saved a bundle for a better product. If I ever need another mount I'd buy the same one again.

This tv mount is an absolute steal for the price. The directions are super easy to understand and the install was just as easy. The screws provided are very heavy duty and durable. You will need a couple additional tools that are not included such as a power drill with drill bits to pre-drill holes.

I have no idea why I purchased an expensive mount for my other TV now that I purchased this! It is every much a quality product as the Sanus mount I have, and just as easy to use. Very well made, very sturdy thick metal, quality finish and the instructions are clear and easy. If you're like me you read reviews to ensure you're spending money wisely and buying the best item for your money, you have your green light!

My issue is.. I wasted my money. I bought this for my tv, of course, but honestly I wasted my money. You need a drill and I dont have one and I really didn't understand the instructions clearly. Wish I knew I needed additional tools before I bought this.
This is proof that you don’t need to spend tons of money for a great product. Very easy to install. I will purchase again.
This bracket was so easy to mount, so easy to install tv on AND lock it onto.  We bought 115 of them for Vizio 55" TVs.  Could not have been easier to use.  Recommend to everyone.
didnt fit my tv even tho it said it did
Very easy to install. I have 5 other mounted tvs on different kind of mounts, this is the easiest to install.

It isn't as flimsy as some say.  It doesn't feel like super strong metal & I can see why some would say it's flimsy but your TV isn't come down if you install it right.  Very happy with it,glad I saved a few bucks by getting this one
The frame does come in 2 pieces but, is strong and solid after it is screwed together. Very easy to hang and handles my 55" with no problems.
Perfect for mounting my TV higher up to make room for shelving but was able to point it down at the perfect angle. Definitely sturdy for my TV

This is a well engineered mount.  It is set up to fit just about any combination of VESA patterns and mounting locations.  Very adjustable and easy to install.  There were a few mislabeled items in the bag and a missing set of washers (reason for four stars), but I had what I needed to finish the job.  We have a 65" Sony TV mounted on it and it is very sturdy.  Hard to beat for the price.  Recommended.
Exactly what I needed it to be. Was a little uneasy about it being a 2 piece mount but it works as it should.

Good product. Does the job as designed. It was helpful to have the larger wall bracket to hit 2 studs and then was able to slide TV over slightly to get back to center on wall. The release straps are very nice to ensure a secure attachment which won't come detached unless on purpose.
Between myself and my 2 adult kids, this is the 5th one we have purchased. Hardware is organized in individual packets, never a piece missing.
This brand is one of the best in wall mounts. They make a high quality product that is easy to install.

Unbelievably easy to install! Secure, strong and user-friendly. Is hidden by the TV but still looks great from the sides. We had spent hundreds of dollars in the past purchasing wall mounts from manufacturers or box stores where we purchased our TVs and these are definitely the way to go! The only brand we will ever buy from now on and already purchased other sizes for the rest of the rooms in our home!
This is a great mount!!! Very sturdy, very easy to install, and tilts as described!!! I got 2, very satisfied with my purchase!!!

Nice quality for the $. If you're not handy at doing anything around your house, hire a professional to mount this. This mount can be installed anywhere on your wall regardless of stud location. Can't hang center on your wall because of stud placement?, Spend a couple $ at Lowes and buy the appropriate drywall anchors! Considering this mount cost less than $20 I think I can handle that. Don't give this mount a bad rating because you're incompetent!

Seems to be a great product so far it fit my 65 in tv no problem came with everything you need the one thing that i would suggest is use the spacers that come with it even if you dont think you need them because it will help push the tv away from the wall a little more so that the cables in the back are not so smushed back there
Great mount. We have used for all our TVs throughout the house. The only brand it doesnt work super grest with it TCL. However, it comes with accessories that make it functional.

Easier to install than expected. Almost trivial. A 6 foot level is not required but made precise lines sooooo much easier to draw on my wall.Came with 2 straps for cable management which was unexpected and appreciated.

At first I was skeptical because of the reasonable price but I was pleasantly surprised by the quality. The directions were pretty easy and it took around 1.5 hours to install. Love how easily the tv can be taken off the mount. I would definitely recommend this mount for everyone
Very sturdy and is made out of the same material as the other expensive mounts. The installing is pretty straight forward. This mount does have a locking mechanism which is a very nice touch
This was the easiest TV mount to install. Super easy, lightweight, cost-effective, and works perfectly for my sharp 65 inch TV.
Calidad.  Bad as Mount  Ez to use.  Adjustable and solid.  I’ll b bying more in the future.  Get this item.  Werks grate  It’s a dreem

I mounted a 65" TV with this and it is very sturdy. It came with extra stuff including hardware for any model TV, and HDMI cable, extra  spacing washers to adjust the angle and a level to ensure that it is even. WHat a deal for less than $30!
Mounted this all by myself (mid 20s female). Easy install. Works great and has held my TV well. Why spend more money on other brands when this works just as well!
Comes with some tick ass screws/bolts to hold up and a nice little handly level. Worked great first try.

For the price, this is a great mount. My only complaint is that it does not prove enough clearance between the tv and the wall to get behind to install cables. My hand cannot fit between the wall and tv.

Worked like a charm.  15 minutes to install.  Lined up perfectly with 16" OC wall studs due to large slotted areas on metal frame.  Plenty of room for left or right horizontal adjustment of TV.  Vizio 43" mounted perfectly.  Very sturdy and I am confident that the bracket could hold much more weight than what I hung on it.  Included hardware and spacers finished the job in record time.  Would recommend to any of my friends.
We have purchased this item previously and we loves it! So we purchased again for a larger tv and still continues to be a great item!!!
I mounted a 55 inch tv on a slanted wall in my bedroom and so far so good, the tv currently has not fallen off the wall yet. Will keep you guys posted. carry on
Easy to install. Is exactly as described. Very strong. It worked well for my sons 42 inch plasma TV. Which the TV is very heavy.

Simple mount that easily attached to our tcl65r625. Only wish was that they included spacers that were halfway between the thin and medium size. We had to stack three thin spacers on two of the screws to make it work.

I have to say, out of all the mounts they have on amazon and all the mounts I have bought on amazon this mount is by far my favorite hands down. My only complaint is they need to offer this same mount for larger tvs. I buy at least one or more of these a week. I can't say enough the ease of installation compared to others in this price range does not even compare.
WOW no need to spend money buying over priced mounting, this one works. I mounted a 75” tv and it looks great!
Excellent low profile mount.  It does give up some flexibility in tilting to maintain the low profile, but it works perfectly for our requirements.
Excellent with extras that aren’t included with much more expensive mounts. I was happily surprised with how easy it was to install, and they actually provided a level which was a nice bonus.
easy to install, sturdy and well built; save yourself from paying someone $300+ to have someone mount your tv for you!
This is rugged and strong.  It comes with a level to get it straight the first time.  Easy to mount, has tilt feature and works great in the kids bedroom for their flat screen.

Purchased this to mount my 55” TCL 6-series TV to the wall. Great product. Great price. Grab a level. Mounted at eye level, because I don’t understand why people mount their televisions up high on the wall. What are y’all looking at? Birds flying high...
The included screws were too large to mount to the studs. Other than that, it worked out perfectly and I would buy this again.
Simple but sturdy and well made . Includes all bolts,screws and a level that you will need to install . Tilts just enough to provide a good viewing angle above the mantle .

Worked great! Everything you need is in box. While I did not use the HDMI cable, it is nice to see it come in the box. That would be an additional expense with other brand names. Level was helpful and was very accurate. Used it to level some other items afterwards.

Works great , easy set up . only thing is if your child shakes the tv cord , and it comes out you need 3 people to lift the tv off the wall and plug it back in , its not a fun job, I would recommended if you have kids purchase one with a swivel , so it moves out from the wall , especially with large sets
Good wall mount. Would buy again. You will need extra tools for this and a good understanding of how to use them.

Great mount for the price. Decent quality with the exception of the soft metal the lag bolts are made out of - be careful not to strip the heads. The extras it came with (velcro cable tie, level, HDMI cable) are a nice touch. You really can't go wrong, used it for a 46" Sony and it's plenty sturdy.

I have a 55 inch TV and it is holding it up just fine the tilt on its perfect however the strings on the bottom that you pull to get it to latch on the bottom stay hanging down there's nothing to move them up or hide them so that is the only thing I do not like but overall I would recommend

Very nice product.  Comes complete with all needed parts and seems very sturdy.  Hung a 55in LG 2018 TV with it with minimal issues.  Price is excellent.  I would buy this product again and recommend it.

You just can't beat this mount.  I paid $17 to get my 32" TV on the wall.  Installation was easy and it included everything I needed.Pay attention to the description.  I originally bought this to hang my TV on an internal wall, but wasn't able to because the studs didn't line up correctly.  Easy fix by doing a bit of rearranging and mounting to an outside wall, but I could've avoided it entirely by reading more closely.

TV is still on the wall a month later so I would have to say that the product works the way it is supposed to.  Can't comment on the installation since my contractor installed it for me....it did not take him very long to do it though.
Perfect and Easy Setup for the Price. If you don’t want a lot of Range this is PERFECT. It is so clean looking and very easy to install if you know what you’re doing.
Easy to install, very sturdy.  We have one of these for each of our tvs. Like how they can tip for glares

About 25% the price of one from BestByeBye. Comes with everything (I did have to get some concrete bolts for the wall I mounted to - bolts and drill bit were under $5.00. This comes with everything, even the level and an HDMI cord. The pull cords on the latches are genius. Cant for the life of me figure out why someone would pay more.

This is a good mount. I bought it because it holds the TV close to the wall and allows enough room for the 10 degree tilt. The installation was very straight forward and didn't take too much time. I had my TV on the wall in no time and I'm very happy with the purchase. I'd definitely recommend this mount to others.
This is truly a no frills mount, but it’s holding my 43” tv just fine. Plenty of tilt to fine tune the viewing angle. The price is very reasonable.
I just installed the mount and it took no time at all.  Maybe 20 mins max.  It was easy to do and came with everything you need, including a small level to make sure you are perfect.
I’ve had this tv mount for two years now. So far, it has held up well. My only complaint is that the screw to control the tilt fell out. Thankfully it hasn’t affected our viewing drastically.

This is a very rugged mount.  My only warning is that size of the wallplate gives very little room for side to side adjustment when mounting directly to studs.  It was perfect for the installation of my older 80 lb. flat screen.
Got this last minute for our 55" in our bedroom. Works perfect. Easy to assemble. Great price. Fast shipping.
This is a good  product if you want something for your TV and you don’t have a lot of money get this.
Easy to install & functions just as I need it to. I hate the strings hanging so I taped them to the back of the tv but otherwise it’s a great product.
Overall TV mount is really good and strong to hold my 65" TV. But now it's hard to access HDMI and USB ports on back of my TV.

We were looking for a mount to move our old 42" TV to a bedroom wall (so didn't need full motion support). This one fit the bill perfectly for the price. It's very well built, easy to assemble and install. Came with all the required hardware and easy installation instructions. The pull strap at the bottom that secures the TV in-place is a great touch!

Let's just say it took a little bit to figure it out since no instructions came with it and there were like 30 different bolts to it. Got together and hung it up and is holding but we will see since I had to guess on which bolts and spacers to use
As u can see in the pictures that’s how my package arrived. I’m still yet to install it. So I’m hoping everything is there.
When I gave 5 stars for easy to install, I mean for TV wall mount.  It is a bit of a job to install any wall mount. Good instructions and everything you need.
Strong and well built. Clear instructions. Love it. Provide the extra items that you may need. You even get a pocket sized level.
Easy to install and great designed product. This kit came with everything needed to install it. The instructions were very thorough.
Does not have range of motion. I honestly dont prefer it that way
Doesn’t have and easy leveling system. My last one did. So unless you get the mounting screws EXACTLY level you’re in trouble.
Easy to install.  Excellent instructions with recommendations on how to solve common issues you may face.One of the best I have ever read. And to think all for 25 bucks. Unreal.

Incredibly high quality for such a low price.  The instructions were so helpful and easy to read that it made me chuckle.  I didn't even realize that they included a level and HDMI cable when I ordered, so I was delightfully surprised.Also, mounting hardware supports M4, M6, or M8 sized sized screws, another nice touch.  I used this to mount a Sony 40" TV from 2011, so it's a bit heavier than models made today.  That being said, the installation seems very rigid and secure.  I wish all products came with this level of quality.
Very easy install and does exactly what is says it is supposed to do, feels very solid, took about a half hour to install and mount TV.

TV is on the wall and it should work just fine, having said that I don't like how the brackets attached to the TV attach to the mount.  They use sprins that aren't very strong. Doesn't take much force for them to come loose and the TV can easily be pushed side to side.  If you have kids (I don't) or a house prone to shaking don't buy this one.
This product was easy to assemble, and very sturdy. Held me 65” like a champ! Would definitely buy again.
Holds my very large TV up quite well. Instructions could have been a little clearer but you cannot beat the quality for such a low price
Took about 20 min in total to mount. Extremely well-built and the instructions made it a breeze. Glad I did not overspend with another brand. Fits my 58" just fine!
Bought for my 65” curved tv and it looks great. Sturdy material and I love that I can tilt it to reduce the glare.

There is no tilt, had it mounted on my wall and absolutely no tilt. The tv is just straight on the will with the massive glare and can’t see very well. I bought 2 more now disappoint because I don’t want these and I’m past my return time. If you were to hang this tv eye level than youWill be fine, but for up high not comfortable at all.

We loved how simple it was to install, the screws are rather large though so be sure you found the studs the first try. We do wish we could adjust the tilt more easily rather than with an allen wrench as our other mount does. Overall, great mount for the price! It works perfectly for our 65 inch tv!

We have our older 46" Sony Bravia in our bedroom now, we used the old wall mount for our new 55". That left us using the stand, which worried me. I ordered this wall mount in hopes that it would fit our old and considerably wider tv, and if not I could use it on one of my kids smaller tvs. Well, my hubby was iffy when we started to mount it, but everything fit, mounted securely to the wall with no problems! I plan to order a couple more for the rest of the tvs. Great buy.

Bought 2 of these! Mounted a 43” Sharp Roku TV and a 48” Visio Smart TV with ease. The package comes with ALL the necessary bolts and washers, a magnetized bubble level AND even an HDMI cable (with instructions). Note that this mount does NOT tilt but we knew that before we purchased. We didn’t need it to tilt as we mounted both TVs in each bedroom at the exact height.

What you get for the price can hardly be beat. Simple to install....if you know what you are doing. If you don't know, get someone who does to do it for you instead of complaining this is hard to install.

Easy to assemble and good directions.  Works great getting on and off the mount.  Using this in a smaller guest room, so just needed something mounted that could tilt down and this does exactly that.  Would recommend for this use.
This was a great find. The mount is incredibly reasonable in price and it has worked out great. It was mounted over our fireplace and holds our 65” Vizio. Very happy with this purchase.

This thing is great! For years we've had a huge 46" DLP in our living room and I have dreamed of the day when I could mount a flat panel on my wall; well that day has been realized! With the help of my new TV, my trusty cordless drill and this little wonder, I was able to secure my flat panel onto my living room wall and achieve some fraction of Nirvana.I will say that as far as the construction, the unit is in three pieces, and is pretty straight-forward to understand. I didn't consult the included instructions, but you might want to if you aren't familiar with VESA mounts or particularly mechanically inclined. I have two gripes with this, but they aren't so bad.
Very easy to install. Took a friend and I 10 minutes tops! It holds my 55" Samsung tv with no issues.

This wasn't the easiest nor the hardest to put together.. but it does its job! It has been hanging a large TV for a few months now without issue. We just do not like the straps hanging down but I'm sure that is an issue we could resolve on our own.
in the headline, honest positive review loved design, quality, price, makes tv look fabulous

Fairly easy to install. It took about an hour mainly because we were looking for the right tools to assemble this mount. Very strong & holds my 55’ inch tv perfectly! I also bought togglers for added support
Great value for mounting a tv. Very sturdy and tilts fine. Easy to install!!! I will never buy a box store mount again!

Worked great for us! Low profile. Tv is close to the wall.  We struggled for a few minutes to figure out which spacers to use and how to tilt it to adjust for it but aside from that it was easy and looks great !

Product is sturdy, well-made, easy to install and easy to use.  However, don't rely on the level supplied with the product.  After installing it using the supplied level, I had to dismount it and reinstall using one of my own levels.

My husband and I are so grateful we bought this wall mount, super easy to install, holds our 32” Samsung perfectly, and it’s super easy to pull the tv off the mount! Also, it’s really nice that we can angle the tv for when we’re laying in bed!

Nice product. Time will tell on how long it'll last. Material does seem a little light weight. But is definitely holding the TV up there and is a very nice, slim design. Holds tv nice and tight to the wall. Works great with our 55" Vizio
Had to buy some tools to get the job done but my fiancé and I were able to knock it out in about 30 mins or so. Not too shabby!  Ordering another for our teenagers room!
Awesome TV wall mount.  durable, strong and good quality.  I've bought three of them on Amazon so far.  They are oddly expensive at the stores, and cheap here.  Same quality though.
Easy to mount and do the job. Previously I bought a mount that had a bigger hangar and it seemed to be a little easier to place the TV on it. Still, a good product for the money.

Bought two of these for my 42'' tv's that I use for computer monitors. They're easy enough to put together and hang as long as you measure correctly and everything.The screws, nuts, bolts and tools all come in one long bag that is seperated by serrated tearing parts so its easy to keep track of everything.

This is a great, sturdy tv mount that comes with everything you need even bolts for hard to mount Samsung tvs. It worked perfect for our 75 inch and was so much more affordable than say Home Depot or Best Buy.
It's a great bracket, very sturdy and durable. Definitely recommend compared to some of the other ones I've come across.
Super easy to install and very good materials. I will use this to install all of my TVs from now on. It comes with levels and all of the tools that you will need.

Overall the amount was very nice and seems pretty heavy duty.  The only things I didnt like was there were no spacers that fit my 65" Samsung tv. Also the level wasn't very accurate.  I used my own level. Other than that, it worked out really good.

These mounts are great! The price is fabulous and the mounts are solid. Installation can be a little tricky and I learned on about my second one that you cannot rely on the small level they provide. I use a large 3-foot level and never have any issues. Once you understand the concept, installation becomes a breeze. Highly recommended.
Good instructions, plentiful installation hardware, well-made. Easy to both hang and remove the TV.
Great mount and amazing price. Sam's club wanted $80 for a mount similar to this. We mounted a new in 65" vizio and it looks amazing. So glad we purchased this mount and saved a bunch of money
strong enough but i would get one with a wider back plate, my50” tv just fit had to center it perfectly

I read several other positive reviews for this mount, but I was still a little apprehensive. The price was right, but I really didn't think it would be that easy to install. Turns out I had no reason to worry. The mount was very easy to install and looks great. The only problem I ran into was that the letters in the instructions did not correspond to the screw sizes on the back of my TV. Luckily there are several different sizes included, and the other screws did fit. The included HDMI cable is a nice bonus.

If I could give more than 5 stars for this I would. I had bought this TV mount almost a year ago and it took me a while to gather the necessary tools to start the work. I discovered that my studs are 24" apart not 16", like what this model is made for. I emailed Mounting Dreams and they sent me a Back Plate that worked for the 24" studs, and they sent it to me within 2 days. Absolutely A+++ service & product. This mount is very great value, they include a gift of a strong HDMI cable, cable tie, a bubble level. There are screws & washers for every possible outcome, with easy to follow instructions.

We were looking to hang a pretty light 32 inch TV in the bedroom. This unit was easy to assemble and is doing well. We ended up using toggle bolts as opposed to the stud bolts because it was just easier. Works perfectly.
Easy to install.  Basic TV mount with no unnecessary frills.  Works great at a great price.

Great value! We mounted 3 tvs in our home all were relativity close as far as the panel and studs were concerned my only warning would be make sure that your two studs are close to each other because the panel is not that large .. you may also want to note how wide the screws are behind your Tv because that will determine how much you'll be able to slide the Tv on the Mount to center it where you would like to have it on the wall. Great build
This is a great TV bracket but I wish the TV sat further from the wall.  It is difficult to reach the TV inputs while mounted on the wall.  Otherwise no issues.
Third wall mount I’ve installed. Third brand. Best of all. Excellent quality. Best release system.  Highly recommend this one.

This is a great t.v. mount came with a level, all the anchor you would need for every type of wall, real nice hdmi cable, and cut out for marking your wall for drilling.Very easy to hang your t.v. with the hooks that have a quick release for mounting and dismounting your t.v.
Disliked level if you do buy it use your own level and draw a line and use that other than that its ok I hung a 75 on it
Would liked additional holes so that more precise adjustments for mounting to studs could be achieved.

It’s a mount and it works. This is what I used to mount a 50 inch for my kids room and it works fine. I wish I bought something that tilts down because I mounted it really high . I used it in a metal stud apartment but you got to buy the right kits or get a pro to do it.
Adjustable and was blown away that it was priced right, but it came with a mini level, tv mounting spacers, screws.
Bought 2 of these for two rooms and both installed easily and are working great. Nice and level, too!
Works perfectly for my 60-inch tv. I love that it included a level and loads of options for compatibility.
Great product! Excellent Quality and material! Really happy with it! A bit difficult to install. Overall really happy with this product.

Got 2 of these bad boys and they do the job just perfectly! They’re holding our 55 inch flat screen in our room and our sons 45 inch in his! Does not swivel at all but for how cheap this product is. It’s worth every penny!

Excellent product, came with everything you could possibly need for just about any mounting situation. Even came with a small level! The drawstrings that release the bottom mount of the tv are adjustable so they don’t hang down and are out of sight. As simple as a tv wall mount is, this product has gone above and beyond! Highly recommended for anyone looking for a quality tilt mount.
Very nice mount, easy to install. Instructions are clear. Comes with a nice flexible hdmi cable and small level.

Personally works great for me. It was my first time ever putting up a TV and thankfully this was an easy install. Of course you’ll need other things like stud finder etc but over great the only thing I dislike about it is the amount of space it allows for the lift to be able to connect to a port. You would have to take it off the mount then again could just be the size of my tv.
One of the best mounts I have ever used - very easy to setup and getting the TV off and on is the simplest
Easy to mount and very sturdy. Comes with all the mounting hardware you need to install.
Works great! It comes with everything you could need, except a long hdmi. It comes with a very short one.
Took me a total of 10 minutes to install the mount, take the 50” TV out of the box and hang it!!!
I have been using this product for a good 6 or more years and will continue to use.thank you and keep up  the good work.
I bought a large wide screen TV and had it mounted with this purchase. It works great. The only issue is you can't tilt it, but I don't really care about that.
Very easy template to help with installation.  Easy to assemble.  Holds my 60" tv perfectly.

I still wish I would have bought a full motion like I have in the den as it's very hard to reach behind the tv on this mount to install anything as it's so close to the wall. Happy though for the price.

I used my own hardware because I had a non-standard wall mounting situation but this was easy to put together, simple to mount with one person, and is doing an excellent job holding my 55" flat screen.As it happens, I didn't have to tilt the screen so I cant comment on that hardware, but it did everything I expected/needed it to at a very reasonable price.

Great product and the countless reviews were correct. Limited range of motion, but knew this when purchasing. Did not want something to swivel. Very easy to install and mount came within template for wall and countless screws.

Went together well enough.  No matter what I do I can’t get the tv to level out.  So.  Buy something else.  This one kinda stinks.  Only reason I’m giving it 2 stars is because it’s cheap and keeps the kids tv out of reach of the kids.

Overall a good mount, and easy to assemble. My ONLY complaint is that its not easy to swap out HDMI/AV cables if the TV has the ports in the back. I wanted to add in an HDMI cable and I ended up having to dismount the TV because I couldn't reach the ports. The mount just doesn't have the flexibility to add cables it would seem. This is more because of the TV's placement of the ports rather than the mount itself though. Overall I would recommend this product.
I would recommend we are using this for our TV and have had no issues. Don't worry about how small it looks. It is a very sturdy TV mount.

Overall satisfied with the product. The only issue is that they don’t provide wall anchors (you have to contact them in order for them to send them). Since they weren’t already provided, it took me way longer and also resulted to me having to caulk and repaint my wall (pic is pre-paint).

Really impressed with how easy this kit made it to mount the TV on the wall. They provide plenty of hardware to fit your particular type of TV and mounting the TV to the bracket was straightforward and easy. Quality material, solid mount, plenty of hardware. I appreciated how easy this product made it to install a wall mount TV.
Great value and easy installation.I have installed a few TV mounts in my own home, as well as for friends and family. This was one of the easiest to work with and fastest installs I have done.
Perfect. Just enough flex left and right to be able to ensure TV is in center off room regardless of stud placement.

This is such a great TV wall mount and at a great price. I liked it so much after purchasing one for my new TV that I bought a second one to replace an inferior mount that my bedroom TV was on. Super easy to install, I would highly recommend it.

I liked that the instructions were easy to follow. I am a 59 year-old female and was able to put this together myself and hang the 50” tv myself. I also liked that the kit comes with it’s own level. The only tool I needed that wasn’t in the kit was the power drill and drill bit.
Not much to say about it. its currently holding up one of my TVs. I would recommend if you are looking for a very simple mount. Make sure you lock the angle down before you hang it... unlike me

Very happy!! Purchased three of these for my house and they were very easy to put together! Love that they come with a level and HDMI chord!! They also have the flexibility to lay flat or lean forward depending on how high you set your tv.

Very nice for the price, couldn't believe it! Not like the cheap ones that you get from the big box stores. And it comes with a pretty nice hdmi cable, awesome! Just be sure that you make sure that your mounting holes on your tv aren't too far apart, I have a 47" LG that this would not work on.
Great product! Easy to install by myself and looks great. Very low profile which is what I was going for and looks awesome.

Works as promised, plus a good price. Only issue I have is due to the shape of my TV and the location of the mounts on the back of the TV. I can only tilt it out a bit before the bottom of the TV hits the wall, but that is probably my fault for not getting a larger wall mount. Still, it holds a 49" TV to the wall with very little installation effort.

Why spend over $30 for any flat screen wall mount? This is all you need for any modern lcd/led since they are so much lighter. 16" wide to mount all 4 bolts to the studs. Very close to the wall and the bottom clips snaps right in for security.
I don’t recommend buying this unless you plan on putting a hole in your wall to run tables up and down.
Hands down the easiest wall mount I have ever installed. It came with everything I needed

I was very pleased with the Mounting Dream Tilt TV Wall Mount. Directions were clear and once I located the studs in the wall the process of hanging the mount could not have been simpler. All parts needed to hang the mount were included in the package. Great price also.
I like my TV wall mount. My handyman had it up on the wall in no time. I purchased a Samsung 75 Qled. It fit perfectly. Secure fit. Very happy with my purchase

Ordered this for the in laws 55 inch TV and was super simple to put together. You screw the wall piece together bolt to wall and hang the TV, pretty much that simple. We have the TV tilting down a little which is great for the location and comes with all the screws, bolts and spacers if needed. Also comes with an HDMI cable and a level. We are ordering another for our 32 inch TV in the bedroom since this one worked out so well.
Mount was easy to install. Holding strong. The hdmi and mini leveler is a great bonus.
If you got the smaller mount like I did, go for the bigger one you will need it to center your tv. unless the center of your Tv is exactly in between the studs.
Easy to install with beams. I had a hard time due to my walls but it was easy when I figured it out. Super solid, holding up a 100lb flatscreen and going strong!

Super easy to assemble. Direction were excellent and parts packaged individually and clearly marked. I was able To use two of the existing mounting holes from my old mount so I didn’t have to search for studs. I would recommend this product over any other.
Im sure this was probably a very fine wall mount, however mine came without any mounting hardware so I'll never know for sure, very disappointed.
Used this to mount a 65" tv above a fireplace.  So far so good!  I like how close this mount hugs the wall.
Installed and TV hung in 30 min. Great product, sturdy and great motion capability. Highly recommend.
Very easy to install and a great value. Not sure why it was so much less than others, but love a bargain

Great tv mount at a great price you won't find anything better in any brick and mortar store for what you pay for this. I have used this to hold a 40 inch plasma tv on the wall and it has worked like a charm. Love the tilting features it has and the way the locking mechanism works so if you need to remove the tv it is easy to do. I would highly recommend this product to someone needing a good tv wall mount.

Easy to install, sturdy construction and supportive for my TV. You may wish to have a few extra mounting pieces on hand just incase the set that comes with the kit is not sufficient. You may find you need more spacers than provided based on your TV brand.
Great system, Was easy to setup and mount!Watch YouTube videos to get a good idea.
I ordered this after a little holiday cheer last December and I hope to install it before this December but I am optimistic that it will work great.

You will not find a unit like this at a lower price as far as I know. It is strong and comes with everything you need to install on the wall. The lag bolts must go through a stud for strength. Holds my Dads 60 inch flat screen perfectly and can be angled down if you want.
Mounted wall bracket with no problem.  The bolts that attached the TV bracket were not long enough to us spacers that were provided.  Trip to big box DIY store rectified that.  Hung with no problem.
Took me while to assemble but I’m slow when it comes to building and putting things together but I did it and it hangs great, very durable and sturdy.
Arrived quickly and was easy to install and make adjustments. Highly recommend.

Solid, secure, and awesome. Inside the box the buyer is provided literally all the hardware you could need during installation: different screws, plastic spacers, washers, etc, even a leveler AND a high quality HDMI cord. I don't understand how they can afford to sell a quality product and ship it with all these bonuses at such an affordable price. "Mounting Dream" goes above and beyond. Very satisfied.
Easy to follow the instructions. Well-labeled parts. Well made and very sturdy and easy to use once installed. Quality seems very high.
Great wall mount, have a 65" tv and we finally decided to mount it on the wall.  Easy to install and sturdy!

So easy to install! Still take two people, unless you have three arms, to put TV up, but I guess a taller stronger person could. This was so easy I thought I was missing something! I will buy this again, and recommend to everyone. My son got one and told me I had to get one. The price is unbelievable for the quality.
Great product leap will use over and over again very sturdy for the price you can't beat it!!!
I mounted my 52” first gen Sharp flatscreen on the office wall. These first gems are much heavier for the size and I feel confident using this product to hang it.
Had television mounted in under half an hour.  Easy install, plenty of hardware for nearly any television.
Installed this mount in about 20 minutes and placed a 55 inch TV on it and it is very solid on the wall. Love the tilt feature and this is a very nice mount for the price.
For the price it works great. mounted a 42inch LED on it and it fit like a glove

Easy to install (make your marks and measure before drilling, don’t be dumb). After that it’s four holes and done.Mount is great. Tilt works perfect. If it wasn’t at such a great price i’d say something about the noise it makes when you are sliding the tv into a different position, but it’s $30 bucks.
Easy quick release if we need to take down tv, but it’s a good strong hold.

Works great. Holds my 40" insignia TV perfectly in my garage. The only reason I didn't give it 5 starts was because it seemed I had to use an excessive amount of force to get the bottom of the part that arrested to the TV to latch on to the money on the wall.
Wish I would have bought one that moved out from the wall.  It is really difficult to attach hdmi cable while it is mounted.  Other than that,  it works great.
Easy to install and comes with all you need to mount. It even came with an hdmi cable. I didn’t need it, but can you even have enough of them. Haha worth the money.
Easy to install, very sturdy for my 55+ pound TV. I have a 60" LG Flat screen that I moved to my bedroom. Keeps everything real close to the wall. Will buy again!
The installation is super easy. The package comes with multiple options to fit your tv based on its size and necessity.

I’m an electrician and have installed hundreds of these things. You can’t complain for the price. It’s a basic mount with a tilt function. There’s not much to say about it. As easy to install and as good quality as any other basic mount...but cheaper. Great deal.

Fit my Sharp 40 inch with no problem.  Attached to brick wall with cement screws and washers I had in the garage.  Noticed the offer to provide anchors via separate mailing too late, but not really needed anyway.  It’s mounted outside on the porch wall, hope it stays on in any strong winds we get here.  We will see.

Installed very easily,make sure it's mounted solidly.i have tongue and groove pine walls and its sturdy without being in the studs.holds my 60" sharp led perfectly.took about 30 mins total to install only because it's about 7' foot off the floor. I would recommend this mount to anyone!!
Worked very well. Came with everything needed and advertised. Pretty easy to install!
Works great for my old heavy 55 in lcd tv.I used my own wall anchors on the strong steel frame and added noise damping insulation.

I have installed many different types of TV brackets and this is the BEST!  I have purchased numerous of these, at different times, and they have been consistently great.  The price is unbeatable; simply compare to others.

This thing seems rock solid. I used to for a 65" TCL TV. Finding studs was the hardest part of the installation. I did use the provided spacers but have not tilted it because I don't need to. Don't put your TV above a fireplace like an idiot and you won't either. TVs should be at eye level.

I was impressed with the compact shipping size. Once unpacked, it was simple to assemble and mount on the wall. There are various metal adapters and bolts for different installation situations which I did not need. Took about 20 min to get my TV on the wall.

It's pretty light and was very easy to install. When this says "flat" it really means flat. Not much room for cables in the back because it really is flush against the wall.
