It doesn't bother me much because I really only use my TV for games and streaming Netflix/YouTube. Local store was tring to sell me the same type of product for $60. This is better.

I couldn't stand the fact that it comes in 2 pieces.  I'm guessing the manufacturer did this so they could make the package size smaller.  I've never seen a TV mount like this before and the 2 halves didn't line up correctly resulting in a crooked mount.  Had to make some adjustments to the bolt holes to make it straight.  Sorry I can't recommend this mount to anyone nor will I buy another one like it.
Purchased twice, easy to install and affordable. I plan on making three more purchases

Shipping was very fast, and is a very good quality product. I would have given it 5 stars but it is very hard to reach the tabs for the bottom when mounted with the angle and tight to the wall.  Installed in about 15 minutes with all the included hardware. I would purchase again.
Worked great, my boyfriend was easily able to set it up (with my help). Holds up my 52 in LG just fine. And it came with a cute leveler + HDMI

Great mount for my 55 inch tv! Very sturdy and very easy to install. Came will a level, hdmi cord, and all the necessary screws and bolts. And the price was great as well. I would definitely order this mount again. Great job Mounting Dream Team!

Built crooked. Wall mount was level but when brackets are installed on back of tv and the TV is mounted it is now unlevel. Checked and re checked. It's cheap for a reason...quality control. But was able to create a fix so there was a happy ending. 3* deduction is a must for a basic function.
Instructions may have been a bit vague at times, but it's not rocket science. I put this in my studded wall with ease. Easily mounts my 42 inch TV no problem. I can sleep easy knowing it will stick!

This took about 20 minutes for me to install.  I only needed a little help with the TV.  The straps hang down beyond the TV but was easily remedied with some tape.  The TV hasn't fallen so thats a plus.  It was easy to get the TV off and on as we had to adjust the angle once.  We installed a 55in TV.

Rather poorly made, and the hole spacing did not fit a standard VESA pattern on my TV (although, in fairness, perhaps the TV spacing was off - but isn't that why we HAVE VESA spacing standards?).Also, HUGE lag bolts for use in wood studs. Logical for a 70" plus monster, but way overkill for the bottom end of the range.

Simple to use.  Simple instructions.  Works as intended.Only negatives were that the TV brackets were hard to level together and the TV kept leaning left or right.  Had to keep taking them down and adjusting.  Also, the straps that hang out the bottom--do just that.  They hang out the bottom and past the TV, no fasteners or anything to hide them.  Nothing a couple zip ties couldn't fix though.

I hadn't installed a wall mount TV prior to buying this kit.  I found it very easy to follow all the instructions to get the job done.  Very solid and no worry about holding the weight it says.  Just need to ensure good anchoring in the studs.  All the hardware possibly needed was included.  Thanks.

I wasn't expecting much since these are so much less expensive that other manufacturers. However, I was pleasantly surprised. They are very strong and easy to install --- even comes with a level for installation --- and it's so nice to get the TV off the cabinet.

good kit but if you have coax and power recepticles behind your tv this thing is right up against the wall and doeznt give you any room for your internet wires also unless you bend them at a 90 degree bend which isnt good for your connection ,but over all good kit

Needed a mount for my living room tv and this worked perfectly I had purchased one at Home Depot for my bedroom double the price and this mounting dream feels like it’s beter quality and locks the tv into place much beter than the one I purchased at Home Depot.
Had a service {PULS} come and set up for me. The whole wall detector made me uneasy. Plus it was over the fireplace.
There was a delay in shipment and I inquired why, they were nothing but explanatory and professional and it want their fault. Product was as advertised and worked great

Awesome. Would recommend. I am really horrible at putting anything together, I couldn't figure it out if my life depended on it, but my boyfriend had no problem putting this together for me and it's great.
Great well-built durable product for the price. Was surprised at how well constructed and easy it was to install
Solid and well made. Easy to assemble and hang. Held a 55" TV easily
Super easy to install and came with some of the necessary tools like a level! Such a great deal!

Very please with this product and how quickly it arrived.  I placed the order for this late Saturday afternoon.  Was told it would be delivered Monday.  Much to to my surprise, it arrived mid afternoon on Sunday.  Very pleasantly surprised.  Instructions were easy to follow and everything needed was in the box.  Very pleased with this product!
It works, however, you have the tilt the mount before installing the TV.  Also, the straps to release the TV are way too short.  Once your TV is up, don't plan on moving it.
It was easy, secure, and is sturdy. I would buy again if I needed one.
All the options for various sized screws.  Really good instructions.  I just installed two different ones - the instructions were far superior on this one.

This kit worked well and if you are a DIY person it had everything you could need in the box including a level, cables. etc.  So if you were up for the challenge they make it as easy as possible to do the job.
It works great! The directions can use a little work but the product is sound! I have a 55” curve Samsung and it was a breeze!
Easy to install, looks great. What a cost effective way to mount a TV.
Thumbs up.. had lots of hardware to install your TV and even a template which made drilling holes a piece of cake ... Would buy another one.. tack my money !!!
I liked the price "vest buy" wanted 110$ for the same thing!!! works well !!!

I didn't expect much because of the cost but I only needed to mount a 32" TV in a spare room... needless to say, I was pleasantly surprised.  The included level was actually useful and it included great instructions and plenty of mounting hardware.  I can't tell you how well it would do with a big tv but it did fine with a 32" tv.

This is a really good deal.  I hung up my 40" LED TV with this and I am very happy that it came with a magnetic level and a ton of different bolts to make sure you hang your tv without damaging it.  It's lightweight but sturdy.  I only recommend buying a stud finder or some wall anchors to make your install easier.  I have plaster walls so I used wall anchors because the studs are 5 feet apart in my walls.

I was amazed by how easy it was for me and my husband to install our flat screen TV on the wall ourselves with this mount.  He attached the rectangle to the wall (but the included level did not work so well so we used a full size one).  Then together we lifted the TV and hung it on the mount.  Adjust the tilt and done!  Took about 20 minutes (most of that time was measuring and drilling the holes in the wall).

This is very easy to install fits my TV perfectly and the directions are very clear this is the first time I've hung a TV on my wall and I'm glad I chose this one along with that it comes with a very nice HDMI cable and plus who doesn't want an extra HDMI cable laying around. An amazing for the price
Very nice setup, come with HDMI cable and all the fasteners for all different size tv.Great prices for the value.

Antenna was easy to mount to the wall and to adjust the TV's position (32", older and a little heavier).  My only issue was that the selection of screws was not quite right.  The short ones were too short and the long ones were too long, easy to overcome with a trip to the hardware store.  A bonus was that one of the other screws was exactly what I needed for a separate project.
i purchased to hang our 59 inch samsung tv. Very solid product. Easy install. Came with a small level, although i prefer to use my own level. I would definitely buy again.

So much of a waste of money did not have all the screws and neither anchors for the screws to be mounted two trips to Home Depot and a waste of money on taskrabbit to mount it will not purchase this again
The mount actually doesnt tilt side to side like I thought it would. Otherwise easy to install and mounts to the wall well.

I'm not a review writer but thought this product deserved it.  This product is fantastic.  If you do not need an articulating mount (this one is tilt only which is more than enough for most), then there is no need to shop around.  This mount is perfect.  Also, I was really impressed with it's thoughtful, elegant design...simple and extremely effective.  The quality of all the hardware is excellent and it installs super easily.  The bonus HDMI cord is really nice and the cord is good quality.  Very well done and a pleasant surprise.  We bought 2 of them.  One for a 50" and one for a 55", both LG, LED TVs.  Not to mention the price is unbeatable.

Easy to install. It's very light compared to my previous wall mount. I installed it myself. Right now our 65" Sony TV hangs securely. I also got this because I'm drilling a hold behind it to run cables though the wall.
Overall love it.Stud finder is a must
Hung a 55 inch TV and has everything you need including a leveler although I used mine.  great price!
This product adapted to my Samsung TV without any problems. It was very easy to install and well made.
This is just what I needed and really easy to install. This item came quickly the instructions were clear and it was easy to install our 16 inch LED TV on the wall.
Lots of options on tilt angle. High quality materials. Everything included. Even wall mounting hardware.

Great tv mount! It’s been in our wall for over 2 months and it’s holds really well our 65 inch TV. It’s very sturdy and it’s definitely easy to install once you find your studs and level it ! Overall great product and quality
Bought this for my bedroom to mount a 43" tv to the wall. Was easy to install and feels very sturdy.
I had this installed and installers were impressed with it. This is my second one that I bought for our TV's

This is the fourth time I’ve bought this wall mount, and I keep coming back for a reason. Easy to install, sturdy, everything you could ask for. I’ve mounted a 65”, 2 55” and a 40” all with no problems at all. I’ve had the oldest mounted for over a year, and still no issues. Great purchase

I can't believe how much they wanted for TV mounts at a local large chain store that is known for low prices. Over 100 dollars!  Thought there may be some catch to this being so much cheaper but there was no catch. Works great!

The item was just as described. Unfortunately I give 3 stars cause the spacing on the mounting bracket doesn't allow you to hit 2 studs and have the tv mounted in the middle. Had to hang 2x4s and then hang the mount to get location right.

Bought two of these, very easily mounted to two very different TVs: a 32" WEstinghouse and a 55" Vizio. Very easy to hang to thew all, too, but that's probably because we were hanging it onto shiplap.
Installer had put together and on wall within 30 minutes.  I was shocked!  Looks great and he said it was a good product

This is a good quality product and very easy to install. I have purchased and installed four of these. Everything is laid out very nice with all of the mounting hardware separated and plainly labeled. Will definitely purchase again when I need to mount another TV or monitor.
All parts were included for easily assemble.  Very reasonable price.  Well built.  I bought 2 for use on my Samsung 65” 4K TV.  I am very pleased with the product and highly recommended.

The mount was easy to install but when you open the box, there are more nails than needed that will throw you off because you are not going to use even half the nails and screws it came with. Its very nice that they include the balancing bar. I really like it, it doesn't look sturdy but it feels sturdy. I'll let you know, so far, its good. You will need a nail stud so you get the wood behind the wall, the nails for that is pretty big which will keep your tv sturdy.Would recommend it.
Using this in our bedroom for a 43" Samsung tv. Had it mounted and tv hung in less than 20 minutes. No complaints here!
I don’t know how much you can write about a TV mount.  A friend easily installed it and it is very sturdy! This is the best value for a tv mount that I have found!!

After comparison shopping we got this mount for our 65-inch tv. the wall mount fit fine between the studs, and because of stud placement we have had to slide our tv all the way to one side of the mount to keep it centered where we need it, and the mount has performed fine. we did not need to tilt our tv, but the mount does allow for a generous tilt of the screen, if desired.

The HDMI cable that is included costs more at Walmart than the whole mounting system. It's easy to install and works like a dream. I've never mounted a TV before and I had this thing unboxed and the TV on my wall 30 minutes later.

This is my 3rd mount and I have nothing but positive things to say about this product. The first one I bought was a few years ago and they continue to improve and what was already a great product. The assortment of mounting hardware is crazy and they toss in a HDMI cable to boot- not super high end, but good enough to do the job.
It does its job.Works perfect and it took me about 20 minutes to install from start to finish.
This mount is great! Comes with everything plus more! Very sturdy very easy setup!
Bought one just to try it out. Now I have all 3 of my TVs mounted, safely and secured! Great price and even better quality.
Very well made and easy to mount. Mounting screws to the tv need more information as the sizes and which to use is guesswork
Very nice packaging and overall quality. I was very surprised, they are made in Vietnam not China. I guess that makes the difference?

I have 7 TVs hung in my house and this wall mount was by far the easiest one to put together. I was nervous due to it being much cheaper then my other ones, but this one was by the best. I highly recommend.
The mount itself is pretty good, but it is hard to take the tv off of it as the cord is in a hard to reach place. Otherwise, it seems to be good.
My husband installed this. It was so easy. Our TV looks great on the wall
Highly recommend I have a 60 inch TV and this was very quick and easy to install and looks and fits perfectly!

Wow, talk about a great price for an amazing t.v mount!! I paid $16.00 for this product.  I had been pricing them and they run between $65.00-$89.00 so I decided to look on Amazon and boy what a difference in price and its an amazing product its mounting our 50 inch television.
I've hung 4 TVs with same company brackets.  They've all worked great.  32in, 48in, 65in and another 32in.  Easy invention and instruction
great product, sturdy and easy to install. great for the price
It was easy to install. It takes two people to take down the TV. Happy with price - good value.

For the price this is a great wall mount option.  It came with mason inserts for installing above my fireplace and following the instructions, which were easy to understand, I was able to install the wall mount and set my tv on it without any issue.  I am currently looking into buying another of these to mount another tv I have.  Good quality product for an awesome price!

Mounts the TV fine. But there is no room for error when trying to mount your TV centered. If you don't mount it centered then your TV will be off center when mounted bc thee is no room to slide it along the base. I drilled another hole into the base to be able to hit the stud to make it centered. Otherwise the product is fine and does the job in allowing me to mount the TV to the wall.

Exactly what my TV needed to be mounted.  Was great that it fit so many sizes, so no worries if I didn't measure exactly right.  I wasn't looking for something that would allow my TV to tilt, so not a big deal that it barely tilts.
My handy man hung this. Very sturdy. Very easy to take to down for painting etc.

I have bought 2 already. I love mine. Heavy duty steel materials. Very well made. Works perfectly. In box: dream mount,  all the mounting materials and screws plus a level. Excellent directions. I installed it myself and gave it as a gift to my friend including installation. It really made her happy.
You get what you pay for. This is cheap and not made with quality material

Just realized it has a bottom locking mechanism which is very assuring because I’ve always feared it coming off on the other ones I’ve bought. Set up was way quick. I wouldn’t mind if it came with the drill bit but honestly the magnetic level and all the bolts were high class. Took me 10 minutes to install.

My friend installed this and felt that they included WAY too many parts to mount the TV. I think it's because we didn't tilt the TV just have it flush up against the wall. Took no time to install. Holds my 60" Vizio like a champ. The straps makes it easy to remove if you need to adjust. I'm satisfied!

Great mount for the money! Works just like any other mounts that is triple the price and comes with a bubble level and hdmi! Since LCD tv are much lighter now a days you don't really need a bulky mount (always make sure to bolt it down on the wall stud of course). This TV mount is more than sturdy enough to hold up the recommended tv size and weight.

Similar amounts in the store or at the very least $60. This mount was so easy to use it came with a level and all the necessary mounting hardware. Lag bolts, anchors, shims, and even an extra HDMI cable.The instructions were clear and I have hung a lot of TVs and this was the best mount I've ever used. I will be buying another one for my next TV

This arrived on item, it included the hdmi cable and a level. The instructions were very good! Also included was hardware for just about any kind of set up a person might  have.  I don't usually take the time to write product reviews, in this case  I made the exception, good job!
Holds a 55 inch really easy. Lots of parts to make sure it fits. Installation not to difficult on a scale from 1 to 10 1 being least difficult and 10 being most difficult it's about a 5. Tiltls down.
I like the positive attachment feature. Travel trailers have a tendency to ride rough and this mount will keep my TV secure on the wall. No need for straps, etc.

This was easy to install with the instructions and some common sense. It came with a level which is great. They used to come with an hdmi cable and now this didn’t. So I gave it 4 stars. If you use a drill w a screwdriver head and put your screws into the wood beams in the wall it will stay on the wall forever. Very sturdy.

Keeps the TV flat and super low profile against the wall. Easy installation, and easily modifiable when you want to slightly slide the TV left or right. Also has a tilting feature, but have not tried that out as we don't need to tilt our TV.

When you order this product and open the package, it tells you that you have to order a separate kit for concrete wall installation. They should let people know in advance. This is extremely inconvenient.

Product was easy to install and is very sturdy. The clips on the bottom of the bracket are awesome since it just "pops" into place. The level it comes with is not actually level, so bring another level with you during the install to verify level.

After looking for a wall mounting system for my 50" Samsung TV in retail stores, I visited Amazon and found this.  Due to the price discrepancy on what appeared to be a very similar bracket, I was somewhat skeptical/reluctant to order.  However, as it was a minimal expense, I ordered it from Amazon.  The item arrived the next day and I was amazed at not only the quality matching or exceeding retail brands costing 5X's more, but the support items including multiple mounting screw sizes, level, quality HDMI cable, and clear concise directions.  This is a great item at a great value.
I used this to mount a 39" tv on the wall in our workout room.  It was very easy to install, came with all the necessary hardware, and is very sturdy.  I am very happy with it.
It worked really well, was easy to install and it is nice and sturdy.
Kind of my fault but not super happy with this. I bought a different mount as this one doesn’t move side to side and it’s super far pushed out from the wall.
easy to install im 63 on disability and was able to put it up with no problemsonly wish it was a bit further out from wall
This works great for hanging our 65”. The installation was a little bit more than we expected but didn’t take too long.
Very easy to assemble. Brings everything you’ll need. Excellent quality
Absolutely the most simple and easiest wall mount ever. Installed in 15 minutes.
Very easy to hang with the template they give you. Feels very durable, not thin and flimsy like some wall mounts. We hung a 50” tv and im guessing we did a great job because its still hanging!
This mount was so easy I put it togather myself all screws and parts included
Takes some careful reading of instructions to install, but it holds my 55" TV very well.
great price and well made. mounted a 55" TV to it, no problem. Comes with all the harware you need. The tilt option is absolutely necessary for light glare. Very easy to install.

Besides the amazon driver making a u turn all ratchet in front of my car I was glad I received a text stating my package was delivered (which it wasn’t) but we pulled up and the same time. My brother got out of my car (didn’t show any ID) and this thot just gave him my package because he said my name! The ghetto ugh I was so annoyed
Works fantastic one of the easiest installs I have done and I have several mounted TVs

It holds my 43 inch flat screen up, but I can’t position my TV where I want it. The studs in my wall are located further apart, and this mount is short. It also was a little challenging trying to plug cords in since it doesn’t tilt much.
Done in 15 minutes simple to use! Hardest part was finding the studs. After that it was down hill.
This Wallmount does not fit my 65" TV per the advice of the seller.
This was the perfect deal. Easy to setup and very sturdy. I'd purchase again.It works perfect for my SMSNG/ 55inch Curve TV.
Was installed within ten minutes all alone for a 47 inch tv.

VERY VERY Sturdy! Turns out I had 18" studs so I mounted the center hole on a single stud with a top and bottom bolt. Placed the tv mounts on the wall mount and I weigh 235lbs and I held on and hung from the mount with only 2 bolts holding it on. It DID NOT bend or move the slightest bit. This thing is VERY VERY well built. For under $20 you will be hard pressed to find a better mount. I have seen $50-100 mounts that not as good of quality as this.
We purchased two of these and they work great. Instructions were complete and all accessories were labeled. Tilt feature is easy to adjust
It comes with all the tools, including a level, to get this think mounted correctly. Husband and I were able to do this easily ourselves.
Got this gift for my brothers new tv, he loves having his tv on the wall. great product!
I think this is the best when you don't need swivel. I only needed tilting downward, and the mount is tight and firmly attached to wall stud. Don't forget to prepare the stud finder by yourself.

Very sturdy mount.  It took my husband and I about an hour to mount our 47" TV and most of that time was finding the studs.  Using a socket wrench to tighten the bolts made everything super easy.  While I do love the pull strings at the bottom to add more security for the TV, because our TV is a 47" the strings hang slightly below the TV.  We'll have to figure out a way to hide them.  Super slim clearance (1.5") so we used the included spacers to make the wall clearance about 3" for easier reach to the inputs.

Super easy to install! The only tools needed are a  Philips screwdriver and a pencil. A drill might be necessary. The product was up on my wall in 20 min and it looked great! The only drawback is that the tilting mechanism uses a hex wrench and you need to eyeball the tilt on both sides of the brackets. Otherwise, this is a great product.
I don’t think this mount was made correctly. No matter how much we adjust it, the TV is still not leveled.
I love these slimline mounts.  Absolutely great.  Everything you need is in the box.  If you want your tv mounted close to the wall you can't go wrong with this product.
I love these slimline mounts.  Absolutely great.  Everything you need is in the box.  If you want your tv mounted close to the wall you can't go wrong with this product.
easy to install works good for what we wanted does not tilt that much
Was gift to my son in law for TV on his new deck!!! I’m thinking 5 stars for all above because he uses TV during day and takes TV inside for night.
Outstanding product. Don't hesitate to purchase this item. We had to install into brick & did somwith ease. Super sturdy & well made. So thankful for this!

This was so easy to mount on the wall.  The instructions were clear and it came with all of the hardware I needed.  My only complain would be that the bolts going into the wall stripped really easily and we had to use a socket to get them into the wall.
Not too difficult to install, though I did have to look up a video on YouTube to figure it out. Sturdy, I’m not afraid of my tv falling off the wall.
Very easy to hang yourself. My husband and I put it up in our living room in an hour, and it looks fantastic. GREAT value for the money.
Great mount for the money. The extra pull tabs for adjusting is a nice touch. Install is similar to every other mount in a good way.
Arrived new in box; However the portion that is assembled at the factory was missing screws. Therefore the mount could not be assembled.
Very sturdy. Very easy to install. With some TV mounts I’ve been scared that my TV might fall after touching it. With this one it truly feels like my TV isn’t going anywhere.
Very sturdy mount for the priceThe included level and cable was a nice touch.

Quality and function all seem good. The amount of mounting options is impressive. Only issue is that the bracket release straps were poorly done. Both parts had broken rivets. So i added some thread and they work ok

Was packaged and manufactured to a high standard. Worked perfectly to mount a TV in my house. Incredible value - this isn't the first TV mount I've bought here from this manufacturer and I'm really pleased with their products.

I was definitely a little skeptical about this mount since it was not very expensive. But it works great! We have a 60 inch TV and the mount is very sturdy. You can slide the TV from left to right to center it and tilt it to adjust for the right position. It comes with plenty of extra pieces as well in case you move it or loose any.
It's a cheap product that feels like it's build to survive a war.  Love it!
I actually bought 3 of these. Bought one and like it so much I did two others afterwards.  Love it! Super easy, super strong.
It is long enough for 16" OC studs. Easy to install as well.

This is the easiest now I have a robot and put together, I would recommend this to anyone who was the first time installer. Once you figure out the screws and the placement on the wall it is super easy.

Great inexpensive mount ! Highlighly recommend for anyone who doesn’t want to move their tv far from the wall. I have two and they are both easy to install and get the tv on and off with safety latches.

Very well built and easy to install. I mounted it to my brick fireplace and had no problems. One bit of advice though. Unless you have tiny hands (I have catcher mitts!) attach your cables before you hang your tv.I have a 65 inch Vizeo and it fits just right.
This is the 2nd one I bought and that should tell you something.  It's an unbeatable price for a TV mount.  Installs like an other mount.  No complaints!
This bracket worked very well for our 65” television that was mounted over a fireplace. It was inexpensive compared to many others, very easy for our son to install, and works great!
I’ve ordered more than one and need 3 more... I’ll be back. Excellent product and price.
It worked just like we wanted.  We hung a 55" TV with this mount and it worked great.

The stand itself is great. It comes with a LOT of hardware to cover most TV's. You will need a drill to install this correctly. The spacers didn't exactly fit as intended, but there's enough of them in different sizes to piece together and make a good fit. I was a little skeptical about hanging my 36" on the wall but surprised at how well these work. The price was great. For the 60-100$ wanted for a similar product at walmart I was very happy with this all around.

I bought this wall mount after reading the reviews and I have to say that I was surprised at how sturdy it is. I was a bit skeptical that it would be able to hold up a 45 pound display, but it did not falter. I did have to use an old installer trick as the holes did not line up exactly with the studs in my wall, but it's still up and so is the display.
Good TV Mount but not good for a RV.  The spring loaded mounts (on the bottom) are not tight or strong enough to keep the TV on the mount during travel.  :(
Install is very easy and I’m very happy with how everything turned out. I have already bought a second one for my basement TV.
Solid build quality. I used it to hang up my LG CX 65”. Easy to follow instructions and there’s a bonus HDMI included. Worth every single penny.

I have a TV that is about 10 years old. While it should fit within the constraints of this mount, I ended up having to return this one for a bigger size. It just wasn't wide enough. I'm not sure if the measurements have changed over time. The bigger version is great and holds up my 97 lb, 50" TV like a dream.
Very easy to install with thoughtful design. Fairly low profile yet feels sturdy.
This did what it was supposed to do. Now the key is for your, or your installer, to make sure they know what to do with it. :)

Looks great and was very easy to install! Came with strong lag screws and an hdmi cord as well! I was very nervous about hanging the tvs up but after seeing how easy this was and how strong they are firsthand, I'm going to order more of these for the other tvs in the house.

My TV is 32 inch. Although it says it’s for 32 inch, it really would be better with larger TVs.  I’m stuck with these little handle straps hanging down that probably wouldn’t show if you had a bigger TV.

Mounted 50 inch tv with this with no problems love how it locks only problem is the Allen screws on the back brackets to get the angle you want u need tv on mount. But with tv on n being a flush mount it only gives you 1-2 inches or room to get hand and Allen key in to tighten bolt. But once u got it just sit back n enjoy
The max width of mounting plate is 16inches and must be on studs if that doesn't center tv where I want you've got real problem s
Comes with all the bells and whistles to make installing a breeze.
Easy installation, love that I can slide my tv further to the right or left and it tilts down which is perfect.
This is one of the best mounting bracket on the market. Installation take about 15 min. The package include all necessary parts you might need. AAA+

It's a very sturdy mountand easy to assemble but when trying to unmount it tends to get stuck and takes a lot of work to get the tv free. It'd be perfect if it didn't get stuck when trying to unmount.

Works great! Easy to setup. Even includes a level so you don't have to go find yours.Mounting tip: Don't angle ALL the way down, or else it will not clip into the wall mount correctly. This is easily fixed my lessening the angle by a couple of millimeters.
I bought this to mount my 65" TV on the wall. it's durable, strong and very easy to install. Their customer service support via email is fast and very helpful. Thank you!!!
Bought 2 of these for a clients tv project. They both installed easy and fit the TVs they were designed for.
Seems sturdy, level is actually usable. Could use some more Tilt. Like the pull down releases.
Easy to install. I feel secure hanging my tv on this mount.
We were pleasantly surprised how easy this was to install. We ended up buying a second mount from mounting dream for our bedroom.  Highly recommend!
Came with everything you could need! Different screws depending on what your TV takes, a magnetic level, an HDMI cord and elastic cord organizers?! Amazing!!!
Clear instructions and very easy to mount a 65" TV and easy to remove.

This thing was a GIANT pain in the rear last night. How are you supposed to loosen the tilt screws when you can't even get a hand in between the TV and the mount once it's on the wall? We took our new TV on and off the wall no less than 5 times trying to see if we were missing a step but we weren't. We finally loosened the tilt screws before we mounted the TV and that worked. The directions left much to be desired. Now that the TV is up it looks nice and hopefully we won't have to fool with taking it down for a LONG time.
It was so easy to install.  Everything you needed was in the box.Great product and purchase!
Really great packaging - they provide multiple mounting screws and spacers. Worked great for a 50 in Hisense using 200 x 200.

This is  decent enough mount, compatible as listed for my application.My issue with it is that it does not tilt 15° as indicated.  If you attempt to do so, the locking mechanism does not clear the frame when you attempt to install the TV.  It is a simple design flaw.  The tilting mechanism changes the distance from the top mount catch to the locking jaw since it swings out on a pivot.  The length is shortened by about a quarter inch.  This causes the locking jaw to not clear the frame.
A good solid mount =; easy to install and it hold steh TV securely. I especially liked the way it hangs the TV, no need to us my  extra long Snap On screwdriver to tighten the mount.

The added ability to tilt the screen up and down is a nice feature. The hdmi cable that comes with this is not great of course. It worked fine until I tried to stream movies and there was no sound in them. Switched to a better cable and it fixed the sound issue. Great tv mount though.
Excellent quality tv mount. It has everything you need . Easy to mount.

It somewhat works,  has the correct bolts for my 65" Visio,  pretty secure even though there is a plastic  part on the bottom hook that was broke off on mine that made it useless.DO NOT DEPEND ON THE LEVEL THAT COMES WITH IT, lol its junk,

The item is very well made. It holds our 46" Insignia easily. I needed a larger wall plate, which I read other reviewers mention they requested, so I emailed their customer service, and they responded from China very quickly. They sent a 24" wall plate to me for free, and they paid the shipping fee of nearly $22! Thank you so much. I don't normally leave reviews on here like I should, but this company is wonderful. I've bought three mounts from Mounting Dream, and will recommend them to others.

Purchased this for my large flat screen.  and the weight of the TV has the Tv kind of angling downwards.  It needs something to help keep it more upright, but this basic wall mount doesnt have it.  Would buy it for smaller TV but not at 65 inch
had geek squad come mount it for me but they said  they liked the mount alot and it seemed to go up easy because it was on the wall in a matter of minutes.

I have a lot of experience hanging flat screen TV's and to be honest I was a bit hesitant to order a $16 mount.  I pulled the trigger for a job in my garage and I must say that I was very impressed.  I ordered a second mount based on my satisfaction and used it for a project in my office.  Highly recommend this mount, I used it to hand a 32 inch and a 40 inch.
Great price and qualityEasy to install
You can’t beat 18$ for a quality wall mount for newer small screens!! Surprised by the quality of the build and accessories came with it.

Good mount, very close and flush to the wall, so you'll have to know to install the cables and move them behind the wall if needed. I like the clip options on the bottom which makes it easier to mount.The HDMI cable wasn't a bad choice either, but won't do for the highest 4k quality. Using it for my PS4.

This item is great for the price with ONE ISSUE.  Because of the way it secures to the frame on the bottom (locking mechanism) it can only be tilted about half of the 10 degrees.  otherwise it won'd lock to keep it from lifting straight up.We adjust our to 5 degrees and it's fine there.
Bought for our new house because the stud spacing was different. Worked well.
Used it to install a 55" LG tv. It looks great on the wall. Easy to install, and very sturdy.

I hung my Westinghouse 55 inch and it looks incredible. The instructions were super clear and it came with all the right hardware. The only extra thing you need is a power drill with 7/32 and 3/8 bits and of course a stud finder. It went up quickly and efficiently. You really can't beat this quality for this price!
It was easy  to put up just make sure you find thee beams in the wall so it won't fall but other then that I would recommend it 👍👌
There was barely enough of the bracket to hold a 60 inch samsung.  not sure if 70 inch tvs have the same mounts but may need to order a bigger one

Sturdy and works as advertised for my 50" TV.  Adjustable to TV of different size and different VESA mounting dimensions.  I was able to install and mount the TV by myself.  Screw rectangle bracket to studs on the wall.  Screws brackets with hooks to TV.  Lift TV and hook onto the rectangle bracket on the wall.

Unfortunatety I'm not able to use this mount. Although it meets the requirements, my new tv has a hump towards the bottom of the tv. This prevents the mounting rails from sitting flat and is not usable. It's not really the manufacturers fault.
Was really pleased with how easy it was to set up. You just get the bracket level and then the tv basically clips right onto it.

I recently bought a 50" TV for about $300....and they wanted almost 1/3 of the price of the TV for the mount! I've seen standard TV mounts go from $80+ in stores. This mount gets the job done. My TV is mounted and appears to be very sturdy.

Really liked how the bottom portion locked in automatically when hanging TV.  Note to others: Do not use the included level, it is a piece of junk.  I used it and ended up with mount being unlevel on wall.  Thought I was crazy for a while until I used another level and found the one included was way off.  If it wasn't for this I would have rated this 5 stars.
Super clean and extremely easy to install with the stencil.
Super easy to install, within 30 minutes mounted and tv put back on. And that’s two girls doing it. If need to mount another tv will buy this product again.
It is so easy to install this mount and it supports wide variety of TV and Monitor sizes. I bought two of them and have not realized any issues yet.
Holds my 65" very well I doubt it will fall down.

Nice Kit.  Had no trouble installing.  Comes with lots of screw and washer options.  Very sturdy.  I don't think the fact that it starts out as 2 pieces is a problem.  You just tighten the screws that hold them together real well, and use a small level to level the set.  It does move left and right freely (up to a point), but that doesn't seem a real problem.
This wall mount for the TV is cheaper than what I could find in the stores and it got the job done. Would buy again for another TV if I needed it.
60 inch Samsung, easy to install. Finished install looks and works great

The two piece design is problematic, especially given the sloppy machining. The two pieces, when attached to each other with the provided screws and predrilled holes, are not square with each other, leaving the assembly in a slight inverted ‘V’ shape. So... the left side can be level, or the right side can be. Just not both at once. No way to achieve a level TV. On my way to Wally World for alternatives.  :-(
Well constructed.  Installation was easy (with help from my brother).I found I did not need to tilt my TV, so I can't report on that.
Fast delivery and complete with all things included
It was easy to install and even came with a level.

This fit my samsung 50" perfect. I sunk two larger wood screws in a single stud, through two holes i pre drilled. It seems strong enough for 10 times the weight.The tv mounts and easily dismounts when you realize your floor isnt level.
It comes with multiple screws for different TVs and sizes. Also came with a mini level. Mounted a 55” vizio perfectly.

I have a 49” TV. The wall plate is not long enough for the TV(it is about an inch short). Probably because my TV is about 10 years old at this point-an old Vizio. I will now have to disassemble everything to return it.

I like it.  The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because it is kind of hard to get the left and right side to be straight when putting the mount together.  It comes in pieces and you have to assemble it.  I put a level on it and then made sure it was straight before completely tightening.  Hard to beat for the price though.
Super easy to install. Very sturdy on the wall and once clipped on there's NO wiggle! I'm very happy with this mount.
Got this for a TV that we use in our game room mounted to the wall easily and securely very pleased great value

Works perfect with large 55" TV.  I suggest using the large spacers and longer bolts that come with it when placing TV on the bracket.  This allows you to actually fit your hand behind the TV to plug/unplug your HDMI cords.  I also love how the brackets allow the TV to slide horizontally which allows for perfect centering along wall.
Mounted a 58-inch Panasonic Plasma with this wall mount and all I can say is that I am an impressed and happy customer. Would definitely buy this brand again if needed.
Easy to install with paper template. Fit my 65" LG perfect.

Worked perfectly on our 60” Sharp Aquos tv. (Lc-60e69u model) It’s an older model so it’s HEAVY and the mount is incredibly stable and strong. Just make sure you get all bolts into studs. For the money you really can’t beat this tv mount.
I will never buy a mount from anywhere else! We moved 3 times since the purchase of this and every time easy to install and use. Very sturdy!
I had to re-order this mount because it was missing a part but they got it to me quickly and I'm very happy with it.

I have two of these mounts and they are currently holding a 55 in and a 50 in TV.  The product is very easy to install, sturdy, and extremely cheap.  That being said I would not trust the level that comes in the box.  Compared to my nicer level, both of the ones that came with my mounts were off by quite a bit.  Also the HDMI that it comes with is a nice bonus.
Description said that it was aTilting tv mount. It is NOT!  just stationary, now it’s hard to get to the cables in the back of the tv. Hired a handy man to install it, so stuck  with it

Works like it should but the string to pull the lock breaks easily. Broke the first day after trying to reposition the tv. Now i have to grab the tv and push it up and then out to get it off the mount.
I've moved this TV mount twice and it's worked great in two different spaces. Very easy to assemble, sturdy and gets the TV close to the wall.

This is a great buy! We bought 2 holds our 55 and 65 inch TVs perfectly. Really easy to install.  Loved that it came with a little level (used it to get other mounted items straight!) def recommend this product.
DO NOT USE THE LEVEL THAT COMES WITH THIS KIT.Otherwise everything is very good quality.
Very sturdy. This product was very easy to both assemble and mount. It includes all the typical spacers for every type of screen.
Fantastic wall mount that is easy to install for an affordable price.I've recommend this product to friends and family and will continue to purchase this mount in the future as needed.
Very simple to install. Good instructions. This was the first time I hung a flatscreen. Had the help of my son in law. But still, very simple. Whole thing took about 30 minutes.

Sturdy and has clear instructions. It comes with lots of different size screws and spacers to fit a variety of different TVs. There's no need to spend more on wall mount if all you need is a little tilt. You can find several how to videos on YouTube for tips and pointers. I cut a piece of cardboard the size of my TV and poked holes where the mounting screws would be so I knew exactly where I wanted my TV hung on my wall!  Exactly what I wanted.
Easy set up. I cheated and had a new wall to install on. I put 2x12s and an outlet so it made the set up fast and easy. No missing the stud
Kit came with everything necessary to put it up even if you’re an amateur. It arrived quickly and was easy to install
For less than 30 bucks you can look like the future from 2002

I have an older smart tv that is 42 in and about 15-20 lbs, i'm not sure how much but it is heavier than newer flat screens so I was looking for sturdy wall mount and this did not disappoint and the hdmi cord is great quality-very happy with this purchase!
Very easy to install.  Very easy to hang the TV and adjust viewing angle.  Quality product!!
Did not fit my tv like it claimed. Very misleading. Now I can’t return it and I’m stuck with an unusable mount!
Came with everything needed to mount. Even included a level.  Several options for the tv as in spacers and screws.

This tv bracket is really sturdy and easy to install. It was easy to adjust to fit the wall studs and looks great. I originally purchased a less expensive bracket from Walmart but it was flimsy and didn’t adjust to fit the width of my wall studs so I returned it.

Super Impressed...despite being a budget TV mount it exceeded my expectations. It is intelligently designed, easy to install, came in a small package, and seems very sturdy. The only drawbacks I see were that the included lag-screws were overkill for my application and the washer/spacer/bolt combination didn't seem to fit my Vizio 47" without modification.Great product, I strongly recommend it.

You would need a wrench to fit the bolts tight. Due to the size of the bolts you cannot just use a power drill. But once finished, the mount fits perfectly and is pretty robust.The mount is not meant for a range of motion/tilt but if you are looking for something flat this one does the trick beautifully.
The mount is very sturdy, easy to install and holds my LG 55" tv just fine.  The package includes more installation hardware than you will need, a nice problem to have.  Recommend this item.
I like how cheap the product cost. Usually the saying goes “you get what you paid for” but this is comparable to any $60.00 Walmount

This is a great mount! Came with everything necessary, even extra! Was able to easily mount a 60" screen. I want to give it more stars, but the clips from the pull tabs snapped off almost instantly. Doesn't affect the mount though...yet. ;)

Was hesitant to get this because of the low price. I used this on a 55' plasma TV. Turns out it worked out perfectly and the installation was easy peasy. The hardest part was drilling through the brick on my fireplace. Once I got this installed it was very stable and I have no concerns for coming off. The only hard part is tilting once the TV is on there. Definitely need 2 people for this. All in all I am delighted and so happy that will work perfectly

This is the easiest mount to install.  You always need some type of device that connects the flat panel TV to the bottom rail of mount to secure it.  Most mounts use security screws accomplish this, which are effective, but difficult and sometimes impossible to reach to tighten, resulting in a unsecured mounting.  Mounting Dream mounts use spring loaded clamps that are easily access by a small loop of fabric.  My wife and I practiced mounting the TV to the mount a few times before the mount was on the wall.  Then, we carefully lifted the TV, each one of us on a side and had it securely connected to both the top and bottom rails in seconds.Plenty of fasteners and shims included to accommodate a variety of televisions, including curved panels.
Really strong and week built.  I researched Amazon for over an hour and this is the one I chose.  I'm glad I did.  It's super strong and very well built.  This is the best one and a great price.
Great product hapo it came with level but it didnt even bother to include any anchors for the screws just incase the screws didnt attach to anhthing in the wall
First time using this particular brand.  Install was straightforward though a tad tricky on this brick.  Not a lot of “give” if you need to finagle wires.  Overall good value for price paid
This mount is perfect. It set up super quick and easy and is so close to the wall. Love it
This was the easiest TV wall mount I've ever installed, and I've installed several. It mounted quickly, easily, and securely.
These are such a great tv mount. Love how easy they go up, they fit a few tv’s and love the straps for release!
Good quality and easy to install.....Will use again in the future
These mounts are easy and great.  They look good.  The snap in bottom bracket makes mounting the tv so easy.
Super easy to install. Didnt get confused at all. Never put up a wall mount before so I was worried about that. But it was so easy to do.

Overall great mount for our 55” TV. Nothing’s perfect but so far we haven’t had any issues. Definitely follow all instructions as my installer didn’t put the spacers in right away and needed to go back to go so.
Was to heavy foe our walls.  Anyone purchasing needs to know they will have to anchor on the other side of dry wall
Very easy to install. Very well made. The level is awesome. All the extra parts were great but wish it came with cinderblock anchors. I liked it so much I ordered another one.
Holds my 65" Television no problem. Comes with all assorted hardware and spacers to work with different TV's.
Used this with a 55" TV on a sloped wall and it works great!
Much better than the cheap cheetah  one that I had bought previously.  Way Faster and less screws to assemble and a more solid structure

Although I will not take them up on the offer to replace broken parts, it was good to see they stood behind their product and offered to take care if the customer.

Mounted a TV so that the kids can have it in their room and not rob space on top of the dresser. Super simple setup. Connected kids computer and xbox. I have no cable management in mind so forgive me that please.
I currently have 6 of these in use in my house.  I love them.  Theyre so easy.  Only mount i'll buy from here on out.
Easy to install.. Top quality material..
My house could fall down but the tv will still be attached to the wall!

Very easy to install, holds the TV, and seems very sturdy.  The two little pieces of ribbon are a nice touch to lock the TV into place so its safe and doesn't fall, but the ribbons are a little long, so I had to find a way to tuck it into the back of the TV  Instructions were easy to follow, but I would recommend at least two people installing this together.

Tengo 4 meses ya de haber comprado este producto, mi primera impresión fue de satisfacción, ya que al abrirlo me di cuenta de que era de excelente calidad y facil de ensamblar, asta él momento no e temido ningun problema con este producto y estoy seguro que ni lo tendre. :3
Easy to set up, they have a YouTube video to see instruction, they put so much extra stuff I’m surprised they make profit lol good product, easy buy.
Great just need better screws and drywall studs!
This was easy to install, just make sure it’s on a stud! It has worked great for us!
easy to install and reasonable price. it's a very solid product

So far so good. I used this on a Samsung 6 series 55” TV. Samsung actually includes spacers/inserts for the mounting screws with some of its TVs. These fit perfectly with the TV mount and the whole process took less than 45mins!For the price and what you get (6ft HDMI cable, torpedo level) you cannot go wrong with this mount!
Excelente ! Soporta la tv de 65 pulgadas sin problema 😍
comes with all parts to fit various TV's as described. Would buy again. Mounted a 55 inch LG TV no problem

Nice mount for the price. What made it difficult to install was the level that was supplied with the mount. It was a cheap plastic level that was not level at all.

I agree that the mount was easy to install and very easy to attach the TV.  The range of motion is limited but not bad.  Also the straps that lock in the clips are not easy to hide once you get the TV up.  I would definitely buy this again.
The easy installation and the range of motion was awesome
super easy to installeasy to use
IT ACTUALLY SUPPORTS MY 85 INCH TELEVISION WITH NO PROBLEM

SUPER easy to install and great value for the price

The unit had an assortment of different fasteners for a range of different mounting configurations. Everything in the box needed to mount and hang tv came in the box. Able to hang a 55' tv by ones self in less than 30 minutes.

Sturdy and easy to install. Holds my 65" LG TV with no issues.
Mounted my 65” TV with no problems. Make sure to have the necessary tools as listed in the instructions. I watched a how-to YouTube video first. Great price and they included an HDMI cable!

Great quality, very easy to install and very sturdy. Comes with everything you need, even a level and new HDMI cable.
This is by far the best tv mount I've ever purchased. Living in California with earthquakes this locks my tv on the mount without any worries and easy to remove if necessary.
Relatively easy to install. Works as expected.
The mount is great, but it’s so tight against the wall, it doesn’t leave space for the HDMI cord to plug into the back of your TV.

Works but should very clearly state in title that it only accomodates 16" stud spacing. Check your spacing before buying or you'll end up spending double the mony and increasing distance from wall to buy the expansion kit. good product for the money- we purchased two and my hubby installed them quickly.

This is a great tv mount, especially for the price! We did have to get screws and anchors because they are not included but we’ve had no problems with it!
Good price.  I can't ever get the clips to attach to the bottom of the mount from the TV, but it doesn't effect anything so still giving 5 stars.

Good mount, easy to follow instructions. Used to mound a 50 inch TV to wall and feels secure.

Great Mount for new Vizio 55" tv I just purchased.  Huge difference in prices for what appears to be more or less the same thing, so saved almost $40 getting from amazon vs retail. Be prepared to drill holes and screw into 2x4s. This thing isn’t going anywhere! Just as described!

This is a great buy . Easy install and can tilt forward and back.  Best for the money

Really strong... I bet I could hang my kitchen stove off this rack.  With the widest one, I was able to catch three studs.  More importantly, I was able to center my TV on the wall.  Very pleased with this purchase.

much more durable and adjustable than the similar product that I got at Walmart and it only cost half as much! the supplied level and HDMI cable were pretty handy as well.I'll definitely be getting more of these.
My husband loves this mount! It came with a lot of spare parts to fit different types of tvs. And the installation was easy. It’s a winner!

Easy to install and well made.  No complaints, and I would buy again.  Lots of extra parts that I didn't need in my case, but if you need them for your particular tv, it's nice to know that they are probably there.

Seen lots of mounting kits that are very expensive so I was a little leary but this is perfect! Great for the price! Easy to install and works great. FYI It does tilt but not that much & it recommends locking into a position....which is fine for what we wanted.
Great value, great mount!  Love the lower release pulls!  Worked perfectly for the 2 55inch LED TV's I mounted.
The only mount for larger tvs that would mount on a wall with 25 inch stud spacing.  Easy to install.
One of the best tv mounts I have ever purchased.  Easy instructions and simple installation.  Buy it.

Perfect for our 55” Samsung spare tv we had under the bed. I wanted To remove the mirror/dresser combo and use the tv we had just collecting dust. This bracket was easy to install and easy to hang the tv.
Great product cheaper the in stores and way better quality
Great product. Beats the big box stores

High quality. Study and my 55" Vizio 4k is on the wall with no worries. Easy to install once you find and measure for your studs. The level that came with it was accurate when compared to my big level. Would recommend.
Wasn’t hard to put up. Found the studs, screwed it on and works great.

I would recommend this product to anybody looking to mount their TV, it is really good quality, feels heavy and the material is amazing. Really glad that I bought this. :)

Love it! I have waited years to get a wall mount for my TV and I’m sooo happy I chose this one! I have a really big tv I believe it’s 65in and this works perfect! And I was happy to see I got an HDMI cable as well as a little level for install. Great buy! Amazing product for the price!
The directions are printed on a piece of packing plastic.  It is very hard to read. Perhaps a piece of paper would be a better option

I purchased this to hold up my 55" TV (weighing approximately 37lbs). I had it mounted by myself in under an hour. Worked great. I don't know what more I could say :)
Great product. One of if not the easiest to mount. Product arrived packaged nicely, took no more than 15 from opening to mounted and Tv up.

Bought this to mount a TV on my deck. Perfect solution for price.  I did not realize it when I bought it, but this mount has quick release so it is simple to detach the tv to be able to store it inside away from elements when not in use.

Mounted this on my brick fireplace for a 50" TV about 6 months ago. Easy to install, but I used my own level and bought wall anchors from Home Depot that are made for masonry after reading some of the reviews on here.There's enough room behind the TV that I slid my cable receiver and all the cables back there too. The mount is nothing special, but it's exactly what I needed. If you need to adjust the tilt, though, you will need to remove the TV from the mount and adjust it. There's no easy way to adjust it while mounted.
I really love it. With the pulling straps that lock the TV in place, it makes it so much easier compared to older systems where you need to tighten a screw on each side.
Bought for my daughter's tv for her bedroom and it works great
It was missing some screws. We got different equally sized ones and it was all good after. It is holding our 70 inch LG fine.
Did this all by myself for a huge TV!.. was super easy to get everything set up!
Very easy to install. Comes with a level and an HDMI cord. I used 4 heavy duty drywall anchors rather than drill into the beams.
Bought to hang my 55inch tv on the wall and I love this product it looks great and is easy to install

Mixed feelings. It was cheap which I liked. It is sturdy, but it is also cheap. The bolts were a little funny and I had to cut my plastic washers to fit the size. On top of that it is imbalanced.... not matter what I do the tv is alway crooked. Re hang it three times.

Very simple to mount and attach to wall, very few main parts to keep track of, and they send tons of hardware with it for all situations. Only part that isn't their fault, but worth noting is this a very close to wall mount. Meaning if you plan on hiding cords or plugging in your tv behind this mount, think again. If you want something as close to the wall as possible and you'll be plugging in around the TV, this is great! IF you are hiding cords, get flush type plugs (less than 1.5" from wall to tv) or buy something else.
Easy to install and position, very sturdy, and a good amount of tilt. Worked well for installing our bedroom TV above a bookcase!
So awesome that I bought a second one. This is a wall hugger with a tilt you preset before hanging the TV. The specs are accurate.

Well made, easy to install with the correct tools.  A real bargain!

It did the job without any problems.
Easy to install, easy to mount TV! The spring latches have straps to pull on that makes it very easy to attach the TV to the mount when it's on the wall.
Very solid. Lots of holes to put the screws through so getting it into the studs was easy.  Very happy.
Very simple design and easy to install. Took me 30 mins from when I opened the box till i was watching shows again on the telly.

Used this to mount a 65" LG TV, worked great. Only complaint was where the rear ports were on the TV made it tricky to mount since I obviously did not want the HDMI and other ports to be blocked.

This is great! We had a glass TV stand before and weren't sure if we would like the TV on the wall. WE LOVE IT! Opened up our living room and created so much space. We have had this wall mount for about 3 months now and haven't had any problems.

Once the tv is put on its very hard to adjust the tilt if you have a big tv. Other than this it is perfect as far as sturdiness and completing its purpose. I have a 65 inch qled tv and its just right.

Super easy to install. I did have to remove the middle plate on it because my power outlet and wires coming out from my wall in the middle of the plate section. I used a larger level and it worked perfectly.
This wall mount is simple and was easy to install.

This is the first TV I've ever hung and it was very easy. The template that comes with the pack is very helpful to ensure you hang it correctly. Couldn't have asked for a better kit and seems very sturdy for my 65" TV.
Went up quite easily. Is still in place. No issues. I even had space to mount my cable box.
Very nice,  very sturdy. Install was very easy. I made a great choice.
Awesome mounting system. Very easy to install and you cannot beat the price!
I have 2 of these. Best mounting system I have used. These are well made for the price

It works. The thing I was most impressed with was the HDMI chord it comes with. Its pretty nice. The only thing I would worry about is that it is not made for regularly spaced studs. I had to do some improving in order to not have to buy the extra piece they sell that you have to have if you have regularly spaced studs. Its too narrow. Also, the level it comes with was way off. I would not use it to try to get the mount straight. You are better off just eye balling it.
Great product and price. Very easy to install
It is easy to install, seems sturdy, and performs exactly as advertised.
One of the better and easiest TV mounts I have ever used. comes with all the hardware you would ever need. Plus the leftover hardware and spacers will prove invaluable for other projects.

Took about an hour to hang and install TV. Holds a 50" Insignia wonderful. My husband is very excited about how sturdy it is and the tilt factor. No complaints. For the price you can't go wrong. Easy to install and all features of pricier ones with same if not better functionality.
Very easy to put together and to attach to wall, even easier to mount TV to product.Holds our 55 inch TV with ease.
Easy to install and provides a very slim profile against the wall.
Works great to hold our 50" Vision TV.  Seems sturdy would definitely buy again.
I'm very happy with the bracket, instructions were clear, installation was simple, and the TV is mounted. We put up a 65" TV and the bracket was able to more than handle it.
Perfect for the price you pay. Very light and easy to install. Only problem that some people might have is that it does not tilt very much but it works for me.

The product itself is fairly sturdy and fit my tv well. The only problem I encountered was when I had to place it onto the wall. When it came down to put the screws in the wall they completely failed. They wouldn't go into a stud and had difficulty going through drywall.  So after 5 failed holes in the wall I bought some wood screws and toggle bolts. Those worked perfectly and completed mounting the tv. So my suggestion buy some wood screws and toggle bolts and you'll be all set if you're mounting it onto wall like mine.

Easy to attach to the wall and looks great. Holds my son's 32-inch smart tv with no problems, and there is a slider so you can adjust the tv over if you want to. I am totally worry free that my T.V. will fall off.
Very sturdy and easy to install. Good value for money!

Mount arrived in excellent packaging and excellent shape. It's pretty straight forward and not too complex. I wanted this mount for a 40 inch LG flat screen in a small camping trailer. I needed the ability to remove the TV from the mount easily to transport it in the secure box that it came in while traveling long distances. The mount is solid and the arms just make it to the 400 mm distance of the LG TV mount points. The two spring activated release pins don't hold the TV perfectly solid as there is a small amount of play in that area at the bottom. However it doesn't seem to be a problem as the TV overall is held very secure otherwise. In fact, we have trailered the unit on our first trip without removing the TV and there were no issues at all. The TV releases easily by pulling down on the two straps at the bottom which was my main directive. The TV is free to slide side to side however which may not be good if your mounts are less than 400 mm apart. As such this side movement was eliminated on ours by simply bending the top hooksout about 3/16 of an inch which then rests them against the stay on the main frame so there is no movement. If this was mounted on a wall in a room, there would be no issue at all obviously. The fact that it also came with a 6 foot HDMI cable didn't hurt either as I connect my PS4 with it in the camper.

Bought 2 48" TVs at a box store on Black Friday and, luckily, my son urged me NOT to buy my wall mounts, there (they wanted about $90 each for them), but rather to get something through Amazon.  The price of this one was so reasonable, that I had some misgivings about the quality.  No need for qualms, this unit (I bought 2) is completely adequate for my Samsung TVs.  Granted, these TVs are not heavy, but these mounts could have taken on a much heavier load just fine.  There are some clever strap loops, that remind me of subway handles that hang from the roof. These hang down, but are not visible in that they do not hang below the bottom of the TV.  However, they are "release" grips. When mounting, it's not uncommon to put the TV up on the mount and take it down a few times as you fool around with the hardware and, in my case, shelf brackets below for a DVD player.  But these mounts lock in place, and you have to have a way to release the lock to take it down. These straps make it easy to feel up under the TV and pull the two releases to take the TV down. Pros: quality parts, nicely finished (no sharp edges) all parts lined up just fine.  Even includes an HDMI cable! that easliy covers the cost of the mount by itself! (The cable is rather stiff - but who really cares much).  Great price.  I didn't try the tilt function, didn't need it.) Possible Cons: The TV can slide left or right on the mount so you can center it perfectly, but I didn't see a set screw that locks the mount once you find your sweet spot, so it can still slide if bumped.  I don't bump into my TVs much, though, so that's minor.

Well, this is a simple mechanism and seems to work fine, but it doesn't really fit well with the Samsung UN32J5003 32-Inch 1080p LED TV. Because of the irregular back, the spacers are necessary, but due to the depth of recess of the inserts on the TV, there is only a little less than a single turn of thread engagement! This doesn't inspire confidence, so I had to mill the spacers down to a size that lets the bolts get a better grip (with added lock washers, which are not included but are a good idea).Also, on that TV model, it is necessary to saw off an inch or so of the vertical members to they won't be visible above or below the TV. For both these reasons, I don't think this product is a good fit with that specific model of TV. This is NOT a comment on construction quality, which is nice and solid (and I like the pull cords to undo the latch - nice touch).

The mount spans 16" on center, so anything more than that requires a different mount.  I used it on a Vizio 32" LED LCD TV, and the vertical brackets are almost too long.  The mount comes with a plethora of screws and spacers.  When it is clipped to the mount, it doesn't feel nearly as sturdy as other mounts I have used (Ikea, Sanus).  You also need to tilt the TV after it is mounted, otherwise it won't clip to the bottom of the mount for whatever reason.  There are black straps that are pulled down to unclip the TV mount from the wall mount, that's all well and good, but then they hang down unless you tuck them up under the TV.  Once the TV is mounted and secured, it moves around too much for my liking.For the money, this mount will work.  I would't trust it for a heavy TV, and there is no way a TV smaller than 32" will work, because you will see the vertical brackets.  I did not test the HDMI cable that came with it, but it looks like a quality cable.

Awesome price, great for mounting a small-medium sized TV.  I have a 55" and the back brackets fit on the last bolt hole.  Also comes with a ton of different sized bolts, spacers in case you have a TV with a weird shaped back, HDMI cable and a little magnetic bubble level which I saved for using on any future wall mounting brackets since its really convenient.To all the other reviews on here with people complaining about lack of adjustability or its too small, the product dimensions are listed.  You can take this thing called a tape measure and see if you have the right stud spacing before ordering.  Also it says right in the description that if you need more adjustability use a different mount and even gives a part number.  Taking away stars on a product because you lack 2nd grade reading comprehension is not exactly fair...

I was able to get my tv mounted using this mount, but some of the instructions make it very difficult. I'm very handy, so I'd like to think that this isn't attributed to assembler error.You have to drill pilot holes in the studs and then screw the mount into those pilot holes. The bit that the manual suggests for the pilot holes is way too small for the lag bolts that come to mount it. I ended up drilling over and over and over in my wall to try to make the pilot holes big enough for the lag bolts. Even after I got my pilot holes the right size, the lag bolt's threads were so far apart that it just didn't quite grip my stud and self-drive like they needed to. I ended up having to use my own bolts that had thread that was closer together.

We purchased a new 50" TV for the bedroom and decided to wall mount it rather than sit it on the dresser like the old unit. We did not need the mount to swivel so we wanted one that was economical and easy to install. After reading the reviews in Amazon, we settled on this one. It was easy to install because it had a one piece mounting plate (which made it simple to ensure levelness and centering with the studs. The big decision was where and how high to install the mount. We tried different heights with pieces of masking tape on the wall to represent the corners of the TV. Once you commit to its placement, the installation took only about 15 minutes. We are very happy how it turned out and the sturdiness of the mount. And it only cost about $16 and came with an HDMI cable.
Very pleased with this product.  Installation very straightforward.  Mounted into studs.  TV easily shifted to center between windows.  Bonus level and HDMI cable a plus.

But my favorite feature in all of their mounts similar to cheetah mounts by the way. Is the spring loaded locks. Install always requires a do it yourself and make sure to always check for live wires when drilling or nailing into housing walls. It is a good quality mount and they have been consistent in their manufacturing process. Not as high quality material as other mounts but I have never had any issues or defects another feature is the Allen key screws for tilt adjustment that way no one else can adjust the tv but me. It is about 3 inches from the wall to the back of the tv. I always love the included bubble labeler and the hdmi cable is okay I never use it though. Other than that everyone keep mounting their Dream TV

Good wall mount that is easy to install and comes with all the hardware necessary. The hardest part of installing the mount was finding the studs in the wall. Once that was done, the product was up in no time.Even though it's a great mount, there are a couple of issues to be aware of. The first is that the mounting holes are exactly 16 inches apart, since most studs are about 16 inches apart from each other. This isn't an issue if your studs spaced perfectly, but if for some reason you need even a half inch more, you're stuck with putting this in the drywall. The other reason is that if you have a larger tv, it can be hard hang the hooks in the right place. The first time we put our 40" tv in, we thought we were good until we double checked the back and one of the hooks was hanging off to the side. There isn't much room left, and if left unchecked this would have left the tv hanging on a small hook.
Good if studs are in the center if your wall. No availability to adjust horizontally

The product has serious design flaw.  Whoever designed it did not put any thoughts about adaptability on different studs distance, resulting the product being quite picky on the studs distance.  If my studs were spaced even half inch farther, I would have to just return this.It was thanksgiving and my family were so excited to have the new TV so I installed it by all means.  The spacing of my studs is so on the edge that the mount just would not work according to studs finder.  I had to pin probe the drywall the old way mm by mm.  In the end there is less than 5mm left on stud to each pilot hole.  Was worried like hell about damaging my stud the whole process.  Still not completely in relief.

I am so glad this thing worked out. Companies are ripping people off with what is really a very simple mounting device. Super fast installation! No instructions required (included). I purchased this for a single mother friend of mine that needed a mount for her new TV installed right before her party New Years Day. She had me order it Tuesday! Amazon delivered as promised on Thursday and I had it up before guests arrived Friday in less than 20 minutes. That's un-packaging, determining where to place the bracket, drilling the 3 anchor holes, hammering the included wall anchors in, mounting the bracket with the included sturdy Phillips head anchor bolts, installing the 2 quick release arms that attach to the back of the tv and then setting the tv onto the wall bracket. Super easy and smooth as butter. I will be ordering another for my kids room soon. As others have noted, there is VERY little play on this mount. If you want to be sure you can align the TV accurately in the middle of a wall, be prepared to mount a plywood panel behind the actual TV mount - it's very unlikely that you'll get it to align otherwise. However, mine was just two inches off center once I had it up, and in terms of use it's fine. Like most cheap mounts, it doesn't give you much room behind the TV - if you have a lot of connectors, and if any come out at right-angles to the TV, instead of being edge-connectors, you'll almost certainly need to invest in some right-angled adaptors for your cables. The 'lock' mechanism is a cute design, but leaves the release straps hanging below the TV. I solved that just by tying the ends together. YMMV.

Mounted a  Flat Samsung 55" in a master bedroom. For the low price you pay for this wall mount unit you will not do better. Quality is good, I didn't look at the instructions because real men don't need instructions, real men never get lost and real men think an inch is bigger then it is. That being said, the wall unit mounted without problems and it does tilt down, included is a level and HDMI cord if needed. The TV locks into place and with a pull of two cords unlocks to be removed.  Get another person to help you lift the TV into the mount. About a half hour DIY job once you fine the wall studs.
This was extremely simple to install. Fantastic instructions with labels on every piece for easy to follow directions.
